title: Secrets of Lost Civilizations
body:
Michael Tellinger, author, scientist, explorer, has become a real-life Indiana Jones, making groundbreaking discoveries about ancient vanished civilizations at the southern tip of Africa. His continued efforts and analytical scientific approach have produced stunning new evidence that will force us to rethink mankind’s origins and rewrite our history books. 

Michael’s research is supported by sophisticated scientific measurements, and he presents evidence that this vanished civilization had an astute knowledge of the laws of nature and the generation of free energy from Mother Earth for all their needs. The civilization used the power of sound and frequency as a source of energy, which underpins the scientific conclusions reached by Michael. 

The purpose to which they put this energy is a highly intriguing question.  In his book Temples of the African Gods, Michael Tellinger reveals how these discoveries will be the catalyst for rewriting our ancient human history.
teaser: Michael Tellinger, author, scientist, explorer, has become a real-life Indiana Jones.

title: Secrets of the Cosmos
body:
Paul Von Ward is an author, scholar and interdisciplinary cosmologist. He believes a cosmology based only on a single discipline omits many areas of the human experience of the universe. Paul’s own views of the cosmos and our part in it are compelling and provocative.

Paul Von Ward’s previous public career included roles as Protestant minister, U.S. naval officer, American diplomat, U.S. State Department official, and the founder/CEO of Delphi International. Paul holds graduate degrees in government and psychology from Harvard and Florida State University.
teaser: Paul Von Ward believes a cosmology as a single discipline omits areas of universe.

title: UFO Cover-Ups
body:
Is our government hiding real-life X-Files? UFO historian Richard Dolan is considered an expert in these government conspiracies. He explain's to Regina Meredith how the end of UFO secrecy will forever change civilization.

Richard M. Dolan, co-author of A.D. After Disclosure: The People’s Guide to Life After Contact, is considered an expert on UFOs and the related government conspiracies.  He has also published a 1,000-page study about UFOs and the National Security State – a two-volume historical narrative of the national security dimensions of the UFO phenomenon from 1941 to the present. Dolan has appeared on numerous television documentaries for the History Channel, Sci Fi Channel, as well as BBC and European networks.
teaser: Is our government hiding real-life X-Files?

title: Pharmaceutical Fraud
body:
Who is in charge of your health?  Is the pharmaceutical industry endangering our health for the sake of profits?  Yes, say investigative reporter Jon Rappoport, who calls drug companies medical cartels. Be sure to watch this replay of Jon’s riveting conversation with Regina Meredith. 

Jon Rappoport has worked as a free-lance investigative reporter for over 30 years. He has lectured extensively all over the U.S. on the question: Who runs the world and what can we do about it? Over the last 30 years, Jon's independent research has encompassed such areas as deep politics, conspiracies, alternative health, the potential of the human imagination, mind control, the medical cartel, symbology, and solutions to the takeover of the planet by hidden elites.
teaser: Is the pharmaceutical industry endangering our health for the sake of profits?

title: Technologies of Ancient Egypt
body:
Were the pyramids built to provide a highly technical society with energy? Engineer Chris Dunn, author of Lost Secrets of Ancient Egypt, who studies the structural secrets of these ancient sites, says yes. Chris has studied and concluded that the pyramids must have originally been built to provide a highly technical society with energy — in short, it was a very large machine.

Christopher Dunn has an extensive background as a craftsman, and has worked at every level of high-tech manufacturing. Chris's pyramid odyssey began in 1977, considering that these edifices may have had an original purpose that differed from conventional opinion. Chris concluded that they must have originally been built to provide a highly technical society with energy. Chris’s book, The Giza Power Plant: Technologies of Ancient Egypt, describes a holistic energy device that is harmonically coupled with earth and its inhabitants.
teaser: Were the pyramids built to provide a highly technical society with energy?

title: The New Money
body:
Is it time to rethink money? Stephen Belgin, co-author of New Money for a New World, thinks so. He shares how we can restore the environment and create meaningful jobs by revamping our monetary system. Be sure to watch Regina Meredith’s challenging and thought-provoking interview and discover why Stephen believes that complementary currencies can alleviate many of the major issues of our world and bring about new opportunities for all.

Stephen Belgin is the founder and President of Qiterra Press. He is a self-described passionate student of systems thinking and what is truly possible. A near-death experience in the 1970s began a journey that spanned much of the globe and a wide variety of disciplines, including medical research and communications. Most recently, he spent a decade working with Bernard Lietaer to create New Money for a New World, one of a number of upcoming books from Qiterra Press that speaks to societal transformation and the solutions that are within our grasp.
teaser: Is it time to rethink money?

title: UFO Sightings
body:
Are we alone in the Universe? Physician and author Dr. Lynne Kitei thought so until she, along with 10,000 other people, saw UFO lights over Phoenix. Hear her discuss with Regina Meredith how this changed her life forever.

Dr. Lynne Kitei is an internationally acclaimed physician and health educator who pushed aside her successful medical career to pursue The Phoenix Lights book and internationally award-winning Documentary project. She was leading the cutting edge era of early disease detection and prevention as Chief Clinical Consultant of the Imaging-Prevention-Wellness Center at the world renowned Arizona Heart Institute in Phoenix, Arizona until coming forward, after seven years of anonymity, as a key witness to the historic and still unexplained mass sighting throughout Arizona on March 13, 1997.
teaser: Physician and author Dr. Lynne Kitei discusses her findings on The Phoenix Lights.

title: The Wall Street Cartel
body:
Is it only a matter of time before the world’s monetary system collapses? Yes, says analyst Andrew Hoffman, who recommends a return to the gold standard economy. Be sure to watch this replay of Andrew’s compelling conversation with Regina Meredith.

Andrew Hoffman, CFA, is Marketing Director at Miles Franklin. For a decade, he was a U.S.-based buy-side and sell-side analyst, most notably as an II-ranked oil service analyst at Salomon Smith Barney. Since 2002, his focus has been entirely on Precious Metals, and since 2006 has written free missives regarding gold, silver and macroeconomics under the moniker "Ranting Andy." Prior to joining the company, he spent five years working as an Investor Relations officer or consultant to numerous junior mining companies.
teaser: How have government, investment firms and banks contributed to a precarious economy?

title: Secret Societies
body:
Are we living in a free society or are we being manipulated by those secretly in power? Investigative reporter Jon Rappoport explained the hidden traditions limiting our freedoms in a enlightening conversation with Regina Meredith.

A free-lance investigative reporter for over 30 years, Jon Rappoport lectures all over the US asking: Who runs the world and what can we do about it? Over the last 30 years, Jon's independent research has encompassed such areas as deep politics, conspiracies, alternative health, the potential of the human imagination, mind control, the medical cartel, symbology, and solutions to the takeover of the planet by hidden elites.
teaser: Uncover the hidden truths of secret societies.

title: The Truth About 9/11
body:
Did the planes crashing into the Twin Towers hide the use of Direct Energy Weapons? Was there a cover up or is this another conspiracy theory? Dr. Judy Wood, a former professor of mechanical engineering, discussed the anomalies that point to this conclusion during a lively conversation with Regina Meredith, on the anniversary of the New York terrorist plot.
Dr. Judy Wood earned a Ph.D. Degree from Virginia Tech and is a former professor of mechanical engineering. In the time since 9/11/01, Dr. Wood has conducted a comprehensive new investigation of what physically happened to the World Trade Center skyscrapers. Was this an inside job to test Directed Free-Energy Technology on 9/11? Join the 9/11 truth movement, and see the irrefutable proof the US government is trying to hide.

Dr. Judy Wood earned a Ph.D. Degree from Virginia Tech and is a former professor of mechanical engineering.  In the time since 9/11/01, Dr. Wood has conducted a comprehensive forensic investigation of what physically happened to the World Trade Center site on 9/11.
teaser: A structural engineer discusses her findings on the Twin Towers' collapse.

title: Micronutrients That Heal
body:
What’s the next step in natural healing? In an interview with Regina Meredith, Compton Rom discussed the scientific research and indigenous culture teachings to create brand-new, all-natural treatments made with effective botanicals, minerals and herbs.

Compton Rom is with Ascended Health, a company that creates effective, all-natural organic products that help our bodies heal themselves. These products are based on the belief that high vibrational energy imprinted on the ingredients help facilitate putting you in a higher vibration.
teaser: Explore natural healing of micronutritents from botanicals, minerals and herbs.

title: Corporatocracy
body:
Was the recent global economic meltdown caused by Corporatocracy, an economic and political system controlled by corporate interests? John Perkins, author of Hoodwinked, uncovers what can be done in an interview with Regina Meredith.

John is a founder and board member of Dream Change and The Pachamama Alliance, nonprofit organizations devoted to establishing a world our children will want to inherit, has lectured at more than 50 universities around the world, and is the author of books on indigenous cultures and transformation.
teaser: John Perkins shares his perspective on politics, corporations and our global economy.

title: Bosnian Pyramids
body:
Who built Bosnia’s newly discovered pyramids? How were the pyramids’ underground tunnels filled in 5,000 years ago? Researcher Semir Osmanagich shares his intriguing findings from this notable archeological site in an interview with Regina Meredith.

Born in Bosnia and living in Houston, TX, Semir Sam Osmanagich is an author, researcher and businessman who discovered an ancient pyramidal complex in Visoko (Bosnia-Herzegovina). The collection of five colossal stone structures in the shape of the pyramid includes an extensive pre-historical underground tunnel network. He has established non-profit and non-government Archaeological Park: Bosnian Pyramid of the Sun Foundation to pursue the excavation and geo-archaeological work.
teaser: Uncover the mysteries behind pyramids found in Bosnia.

title: Unearthly Phenomenon
body:
Who built the ancient pyramid in Alaska and is it an energy source? Investigative journalist Linda Moulton Howe shared her findings in an interview with Regina Meredith.

Linda Moulton Howe is an American investigative journalist and documentary producer-writer-director-editor who is currently based in Albuquerque, New Mexico. She reports her findings on earthfiles.com.
teaser: Who built the dark pyramid found underground in Alaska?

title: Banking Reform
body:
Is the latest recession proof that it’s time to rethink the privatization of banking? In an interview with Regina Meredith, reformer Ellen Brown explains why states need to take back control of our troubled monetary system.

Ellen Hodgson Brown is an American lawyer and author who since 2008 has become a well-known monetary reformer, mostly because of her book The Web of Debt. She has also written several books about alternative medicine.
teaser: Take a closer look at how the privatization of banking has affected the economy.

title: Tesla Technology
body:
Has the alternating current technology developed by famed engineer Nikola Tesla found a new champion? Scientist Patrick Flanagan, a child prodigy of electronics, shared his latest research with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Patrick Flanagan invented the Neurophone, an electronic nervous system excitation device that transmits sound through the skin directly to the brain. The invention earned him a profile in Life magazine, which called him a “unique, mature and inquisitive scientist.”
teaser: Learn the latest information about technology created by Nikola Tesla.

title: Secrets of the Pyramids
body:
Were the ancient Egyptians more technologically advanced than we are today? Researcher Dr. Carmen Boulter shared her remarkable findings with Regina Meredith.

Creator of The Pyramid Code series and author of Angels and Archetypes: An Evolutionary Map of Feminine Consciousness, Dr. Carmen Boulter has done extensive research in the archives of the Egyptian Museum, gaining official access to the original field notes of excavations done around the pyramids in the early 1900s. Over the past decade, Carmen has been a university professor developing online curriculum. Her latest achievement is Interactive-U.com, an online learning and social action network.
teaser: Were the ancient Egyptians more technologically advanced than we are today?

title: Secrets for a Long Life
body:
Does the health of our cells hold the key to human longevity? In an interview with Regina Meredith inventor Patrick Flanagan shared his compelling discovery of what he calls the ultimate antioxidant: negatively ionized hydrogen.

Dr. Patrick Flanagan invented the Neurophone, an electronic nervous system excitation device that transmits sound through the skin directly to the brain. The invention earned him a profile in Life magazine, which called him a “unique, mature and inquisitive scientist.”
teaser: Does the health of our cells hold the key to human longevity?

title: Lemuria and the Origins of Civilization
body:
In an interview with Regina Meredith, spiritual archeologist Klaus Dona shared how new technology has revealed buried artifacts that contradict our history books.

Klaus Dona, of Vienna, Austria, is one of the world's leading experts on Out of Place Artifacts, unique ancient remnants from long-departed people and civilizations that appear to connect us with advanced visitors from the cosmos and beyond.
teaser: New artifacts being discovered are contradicting our history books.

title: The Rise of Big Brother's Brother
body:
What would 1984 author George Orwell think of today’s constant surveillance technology? In an interview with Regina Meredith, investigator David Icke explained just how far governments are going to know everything about you. 

David Icke (pronounced "Ike") is a former Professional Soccer player, journalist, network anchorman with the BBC, spokesman in the 1980's for the British Green Party, and since 1990, a full-time investigator of who and what is really controlling the world.
teaser: David Icke explains how far governments are going to know everything about you.

title: Psychic Spies & Remote Viewing
body:
Did the U.S. Army teach soldiers parapsychological skills such as remote viewing, invisibility and phasing? Retired Lieutenant Colonel Jim Channon, whose work was the basis for the movie The Men Who Stare at Goats, shared his story in an interview with Regina Meredith.

Jim Channon, a Lieutenant Colonel in the United States Army, now retired, is a futurologist and military theorist. A remote viewing expert, Channon is primarily recognized for creating the First Earth Battalion Operations Manual.
teaser: Did the U.S. Army teach skills like remote viewing, invisibility and phasing?

title: Season of the Apocalypse
body:
Is it the end of the world as we know it? Author and filmmaker Jay Weidner took a deeper look at the true history of the 2012 Mayan prophecies in an interview with Regina Meredith.

Called an “authority on the hermetic and alchemical traditions” and an “erudite conspiracy hunter” by Wired Magazine, Jay Weidner is a renowned author, filmmaker and hermetic scholar. Director of the documentaries Kubrick's Odyssey, Infinity; The Ultimate Trip, he is also the producer of the popular 2012 The Odyssey and its sequel, Timewave 2013.
teaser: Take a deeper look at the true history of the 2012 Mayan prophecies.

title: Radical Passion
body:
How can we turn the Dalai Lama’s teachings into true spiritual activism? Andrew Harvey, author of Sacred Activism, explains how you can co-create a new world in an interview with Regina Meredith.

Marianne Williamson, author of The Age of Miracles, describes the Open Minds guest this way: "Every age has its teachers who keep the eternal truths alive for all of us. In the case of Andrew Harvey, the light he sheds is like a meteor burst across the inner sky."

Andrew Harvey is Founder Director of the Institute of Sacred Activism. It is an international organization that invites concerned people to take up the challenge of our contemporary global crises. By becoming inspired, effective, and practical agents of institutional and systemic change, they begin to create peace and sustainability.
teaser: How can we turn the Dalai Lama’s teachings into true spiritual activism?

title: Surviving Modern Medicine
body:
From medical school to private practice and finally legislation, the modern medical industry seems to only have its own interests at heart, no matter the consequences to patients. Homeopathic pioneer Harvey Bigelsen explains how pharmaceutical propaganda is keeping us from curing chronic diseases in this interview with Regina Meredith.

As a tireless advocate for homeopathy and biological medicine, Dr. Harvey Bigelsen has courted controversy and endured legal persecution, while helping to change the public perception of healthcare. A true pioneer, Bigelsen co-authored the Arizona Homeopathic Medical Practice Act, a law which gives homeopathy equal legal status with allopathic and osteopathic medicine.
teaser: A homeopathic pioneer explains how pharmaceutical propaganda keeps us from cures.

title: Chemtrails: Poison in the Sky
body:
Every day, thousands of airplanes zip across the sky leaving visible trails in their wake. Are these jet planes secretly leaving dangerous chemicals in the sky for military purposes? Michael Murphy, filmmaker of the documentary, “What in the World are They Spraying?,” shares his thoughts in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Michael Murphy is a journalist, filmmaker and political activist from the Los Angeles area whose work focuses on issues that go beyond the interest of the corporate mainstream media. Michael's work includes co-producing the documentary “What in the World are They Spraying?” and several other short films that address controversial political issues.

Watch Michael Murphy’s Film:  Why in the World are They Spraying?
teaser: Do jet planes secretly leave dangerous chemicals in the sky for military purposes?

title: Secret Chemtrail Agenda
body:
In our first interview with Michael Murphy, we discovered that jet planes are zipping across the sky spraying chemicals. Our investigation continues as we explore the possibility that the government might be trying to control the weather with secret spraying of particulates. Michael Murphy, filmmaker of the documentary Why in the World are They Spraying?, shares his thoughts about the Secret Chemtrail Agenda in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Michael Murphy is a journalist, filmmaker and political activist from the Los Angeles area whose work focuses on issues that go beyond the interest of the corporate mainstream media. Michael's work includes co-producing the documentary What in the World are They Spraying?, and several other short films that address controversial political issues.
teaser: Explore the possibility of government-controlled weather.

title: Defying Darwin
body:
What are our history books leaving out?  The origin of mankind is a greatly contested issue in recent times. Researcher Michael Cremo, author of Forbidden Archeology, is defying Darwin as he brings forth another challenge to the prevailing theory of evolution. He explains his theory that mankind is a lot older of a species than we may have previously thought. He supports his theory with archeological research and the sacred historical writings from the Vedic wisdom tradition in an interview with Regina Meredith.

Michael A. Cremo, also known as Drutakarma Dasa, is an American Hindu creationist whose work argues that humans have lived on the earth for billions of years. He is best known for being the author of Forbidden Archeology and co-author of The Hidden History of the Human Race with Richard L. Thompson.
teaser: What are our history books leaving out about the origin of mankind?

title: Emergence of the New Human Part I
body:
Now, more than ever, it’s becoming vitally important that humanity reach a new level of consciousness. Spiritual development leader Jim Self explains how we can prepare for this in a time when we are all desperately in need of greater spiritual growth and personal awareness in an interview with Regina Meredith.

For over 27 years, international speaker, author and leader in the field of spiritual development, Jim Self has been leading seminars on personal energy management and the Tools of Mastering Alchemy. Since childhood, Jim has had the ability to recall his experiences within the sleep state. Over the last ten years, this awareness has expanded into relationships with the archangels, ascended masters and teachers of light.
teaser: It’s becoming vitally important that humanity reach a new level of consciousness.

title: Healing: A Criminal Offense
body:
Is corporate greed keeping less expensive, more effective medical treatments from the public? Steven Ross, researcher and author of And Nothing Happened, cuts through the medical jargon to reveal an elaborate plot to make healing a criminal offense in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Steven A. Ross, PhD is co-founder and CEO of the World Research Foundation. For nearly 40 years he has researched and lectured around the world. He has delivered over 200 lectures making presentations to various worldwide government agencies, hospital networks, and has been interviewed on more than 150 radio programs and 15 regional and national television programs. He has been an expert witness for the City of Los Angeles and consulted for the insurance industry.
teaser: Is greed keeping less expensive, more effective medical treatments from the public?

title: Forbidden Archeology
body:
Researchers have uncovered archeological evidence suggesting that mankind may be millions of years older than previously thought. This controversial field of forbidden archeology provides a new perspective to an age old question. Author Michael Cremo shares his groundbreaking research that challenges the Darwinian evolution theory in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Michael A. Cremo is and independent historian of archeology who argues that humans have lived on the earth for billions of years. He is best known for being the author of Forbidden Archeology, and co-author of The Hidden History of the Human Race with Richard L. Thompson.
teaser: The controversial field of forbidden archeology has uncovered new evidence.

title: Time Travel: Paradox of Technology
body:
Human beings from 1,000-3,000 years into the future are coming to our present time via the 5th dimension to promote our spiritual growth and promote their own advancement. Author Bruce Goldberg explain why these visitors are coming and how you may already be in contact with them in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Bruce Goldberg holds a B.A. degree in Biology and Chemistry, a Doctor of Dental Surgery from the University of Maryland School of Dentistry and has a Masters degree in Counseling Psychology. He retired from dentistry to concentrate on his thriving international hypnotherapy practice in Los Angeles, California. He is the author of 21 best-selling and award winning books, including Past Lives, Future Lives.
teaser: Human beings from 1,000-3,000 years into the future are coming to our present time.

title: Time Traveling Gods of Egypt
body:
Ancient Egypt excelled in architecture, mathematics, and medicine. New evidence suggests that these advances were not independently achieved. Author Bruce Goldberg explains his findings that show people from the future, as well as extraterrestrials, helped develop ancient civilizations in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Bruce Goldberg holds a B.A. degree in Biology and Chemistry, is a Doctor of Dental Surgery from the University of Maryland School of Dentistry, and has a Masters degree in Counseling Psychology. He retired from dentistry and since then has concentrated on his thriving international hypnotherapy practice in Los Angeles, California. He is the author of 21 best-selling and award winning books, including Past Lives, Future Lives.
teaser: New evidence from Ancient Egypt suggests advances were not independently achieved.

title: Wall Street Wizard: Predicting the Future
body:
Are your investments headed in the right direction? Astrology has guided the fortunes of the world’s leaders, their countries and people from all walks of life. With today’s volatile economy, it takes a Wall Street wizard to explain what’s happened and what’s yet to come. Astrologer and author Monte Farber weighs in on the state of the market and where it is headed in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Known to many celebrities as "The Best Astrologer in the Hamptons," Monte Farber has had more than two million copies of his 40 books, divination systems, DVDs and Meditation CDs published in fourteen languages around the world.
teaser: Astrology guides fortunes of the world’s leaders and people from all walks of life.

title: Emergence of the New Human Part II
body:
As more people reach new heights in personal awareness, there are still many who are not ready for a new epoch of expanded consciousness. Spiritual development leader Jim Self offers techniques for reaching a new level of consciousness in part 2 of this interview with Regina Meredith.

For over 27 years, international speaker, author and leader in the field of spiritual development, Jim Self has been leading seminars on personal energy management and the Tools of Mastering Alchemy. Since childhood, Jim has had the ability to recall his experiences within the sleep state. Over the last ten years, this awareness has expanded into relationships with the archangels, ascended masters and teachers of light.

To view the beginning of this conversation, click here.
teaser: Techniques for reaching a new level of consciousness in part 2 of this interview.

title: Wilhelm Reich's Findings on Orgone
body:
From political intrigue to pushing the boundaries of scientific investigation, Wilhelm Reich left behind a legacy of controversy and conspiracy. It may be that his discoveries have been dismissed unfairly. Research scientist James DeMeo, Ph.D., validates many of the late doctor's findings on orgone (life) energy in this interview with Regina Meredith.

A research scientist and former university professor, James DeMeo, Ph.D. is now director of the Orgone Biophysical Research Lab. His interdisciplinary work focuses on everything from cross-cultural, historical studies on the effects of drought and deserts, the origins of warfare and social violence to laboratory experiments on cosmic cycles and life-energy subjects. He has also done extensive confirming research on Wilhelm Reich's sex-economic and orgone biophysical findings.
teaser: Wilhelm Reich left behind a legacy of controversy and conspiracy.

title: History of Eros Part 1
body:
With so many conflicting messages bombarding us, it is easy to be distracted from the central message in Christ’s teachings. Andrew Harvey, who is resurrecting a new form of Christianity, explains how we can rediscover Christ’s mystical teachings on love and begin to heal the cultural rifts tearing our world apart in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Andrew Harvey is Founder Director of the Institute of Sacred Activism, an international organization focused on inviting concerned people to take up the challenge of our contemporary global crises by becoming inspired, effective, and practical agents of institutional and systemic change, in order to create peace and sustainability. Andrew continues to study a variety of religions, including Hinduism, Buddhism, and Christianity and has written and edited over 30 books.
teaser: It is easy to be distracted from the central message in Christ’s teachings.

title: History of Eros Part 2
body:
As we become emotionally disengaged from everyone and everything, we are all becoming desensitized to the plights of the world. Is civilization doomed or can the birth of a new humanity save us all? Andrew Harvey, founder of the Sacred Activism movement, explains how you can reignite passion in an active way to create the world you dream of in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Andrew Harvey is Founder Director of the Institute of Sacred Activism, an international organization focused on inviting concerned people to take up the challenge of our contemporary global crises by becoming inspired, effective, and practical agents of institutional and systemic change, in order to create peace and sustainability. Andrew continues to study a variety of religions, including Hinduism, Buddhism, and Christianity and has written and edited over 30 books.
teaser: How can you reignite passion in an active way to create the world you dream of?

title: Mystery of the Templars
body:
The origin of the Knights Templar is as full of political intrigue and mystery as the rest of its history, real or contrived. Because of their complex roots and secret doctrines, the mystery of the Templars and their deeds persists in the hearts and minds of historians and conspiracy theorists, alike. Perhaps the Templar’s greatest accomplishments are yet to be revealed. Freddy Silva, best-selling author of First Templar Nation, exposes the Knights’ greatest and least known secrets and what  led him to uncover the actual location of the fabled Grail.

Freddy Silva is one of the world’s leading experts on ancient knowledge, sacred sites, and crop circles, and a leading researcher into the interaction between temples and consciousness. He is a best-selling author, and director of several documentaries. He lectures internationally on a variety of topics on ancient wisdom and earth mysteries.
teaser: The origin of Knights Templar has both political intrigue and mystery.

title: Ancient History of Astrology
body:
From the dawn of mankind images of gods and demons permeated throughout the ages. Some of these images took form as the 12 astrological signs. The origin and history of these signs reveal that there may be much more to this ancient system than we could have ever realized. Seasoned astrologer Monte Farber shares the meaning and power behind a person's rising sign and tells the untold ancient history of astrology in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Known to many celebrities as "The Best Astrologer in the Hamptons," Monte Farber has had more than two million copies of his 40 books, divination systems, DVDs and Meditation CDs published in fourteen languages around the world.
teaser: What is the the untold ancient history of astrology?

title: Fiscal Cliffhanger
body:
From the budget sequesters to the volatile state of the job market, our daily news is filled with reports of impending financial doom for the United States and the rest of the world. Very few of us realize the full picture and the true implications of what is really going on. Andy Hoffman gives us an unflinching look at the current state of our economy and reveals the deceit behind mainstream media's "official" story in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Andrew ("Andy") Hoffman, CFA joined Miles Franklin as Marketing Director in October 2011.  For a decade, he was a U.S.-based buy-side and sell-side analyst, most notably as an II-ranked oil service analyst at Salomon Smith Barney from 1999 through 2005.  Since 2002, his focus has been entirely on Precious Metals, and since 2006 has written free missives regarding gold, silver, and macroeconomics.  Prior to joining the company, he spent five years working as an Investor Relations officer or consultant to numerous junior mining companies.
teaser: An unflinching look at our economy and reveals the deceit behind mainstream media's "official" story.

title: CIA Whistleblower
body:
The war on terrorism is a hornet’s nest of politics and ideological values in American today. With new conflicts arising, we still do not know the political machinations that led to the invasion of Iraq. Someone discovered these secret motivations and was punished when she tried to warn the world. Now, she is revealing her ordeal. CIA whistleblower, Susan Lindauer, offers an insider’s view of the politics that led to the invasion of Iraq and the events of her incarceration in this interview with Regina Meredith.


As a U.S. Intelligence Asset, Susan Lindauer covered anti-terrorism at the Iraqi Embassy in New York from 1996 up to the invasion. Independent sources have confirmed that she gave advance warning about the 9/11 attack and that War with Iraq would have catastrophic consequences. This led to her incarceration and a long legal battle with the Justice Department.
teaser: What happens if you warn the world about a government secret?

title: Homeland Psychiatry
body:
Incarcerated under secret charges and denied due process, one person experienced homeland psychiatry first-hand. In this startling interview, CIA whistleblower, Susan Lindauer gives us a harsh lesson on the dangers of the Patriot Act and government collusion with the psychiatric industry in this startling interview with Regina Meredith. 

As a U.S. Intelligence Asset, Susan Lindauer covered anti-terrorism at the Iraqi Embassy in New York from 1996 up to the invasion. Independent sources have confirmed that she gave advance warning about the 9/11 attack and that War with Iraq would have catastrophic consequences. This led to her incarceration and a long legal battle with the Justice Department.
teaser: Denied due process, one person experienced homeland psychiatry first-hand.

title: The Future of Education
body:
With ever increasing costs and decreasing quality of education, more and more people find themselves inadequately prepared to be independently successful with a college degree. A brighter future lies ahead as new educational platforms, using computer technology, are emerging.  Professor of educational research, Dr. Carmen Boulter shares her insights into where education is headed, and the importance of social action and online learning in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Carmen Boulter is a Professor at the University of Calgary in Canada. She teaches in the Graduate Division of Educational Research in the Faculty of Education.  Carmen"s research examines ESL/EFL teachers’ use of multimedia in the classroom in universities around the world.  She has developed several styles of ESL/EFL instructional websites for students and a series of online video tutorials to train ESL/EFL teachers to make their own multimedia curriculum.
teaser: Hear insights into the importance of social action and online learning.

title: Inside the Financial Chaos
body:
There is no doubt that the economies of the world have become increasingly turbulent over the past few years. It appears that these financial markets have become managed systems for geopolitical reasons that a majority of the population does not understand. Catherine Austin Fitts offers a finance industry insider’s advice on how to protect your assets while navigating from the old world of financial chaos to a new economy where everyone makes money in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Catherine Austin Fitts is the president of Solari Inc. and publishes the Solari Report. Her extensive experience with Wall Street and Washington D.C. enables her to offer a unique perspective on how to navigate the opportunities and risks in the global financial system and political economy.
teaser: How to navigate from the financial chaos to a new economy where everyone makes money.

title: Alchemy of the Nine Dimensions Part 1
body:
We are not alone in our universe, or beyond. We are part of a network of nine dimensions that coexists and interact with each other. Exploring these realms of consciousness is becoming even more essential to our evolutionary survival as a species. Barbara Hand Clow explains how to navigate the nine dimensions, contact and work with inter-dimensional beings and lead a fuller, more conscious life in this interview with Regina Meredith.
Barbara Hand Clow is an internationally acclaimed ceremonial teacher, author, and Mayan Calendar researcher who has taught at sacred sites throughout the world. Her numerous books include The Mayan Code, The Pleiadian Agenda, and Alchemy of Nine Dimensions. She writes and talks about a variety of topics, including the Akashic Records, cosmology, sacred geometry, and channeling alien past lives. Discover a new era of human consciousness.
Barbara Hand Clow is an internationally acclaimed ceremonial teacher, author, and Mayan Calendar researcher who has taught at sacred sites throughout the world. Her numerous books include The Mayan Code, The Pleiadian Agenda, and Alchemy of Nine Dimensions.
teaser: We are part nine dimensions that coexist and interact with each other.

title: Alchemy of the Nine Dimensions Part 2
body:
The conversation continues as to nature of the multi-dimensional world we live in. This time, we venture beyond the energetic limitations of time-space, as we know it, and explore the higher energetic realms.  We can access these realms by studying ancient belief systems, sacred geometry, labyrinths and the practice of yoga. Barbara Hand Clow expands on the impact of the fourth dimension on our lives and how we can access the higher dimensions to take back our own in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Barbara Hand Clow is an internationally acclaimed ceremonial teacher, author, and Mayan Calendar researcher who has taught at sacred sites throughout the world. Her numerous books include The Mayan Code, The Pleiadian Agenda, and Alchemy of Nine Dimensions.
teaser: The conversation continues as to nature of the multi-dimensional world we live in.

title: Mysterious Origins of Humans
body:
The origin of the human species is more complex than western religion or Darwinism suggests. When we look to ancient and eastern cultures, the legends of Mu/ Lemuria and Atlantis offer an even more complex picture. There are lessons to learn and contracts to fulfill based upon the agreements we made before we were born into our specific theatres of incarnation. Historian, Raymond Tarpey reveals the mysterious origins of humanity and the roles we agreed to before our lives on Earth in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Raymond Tarpey is a trained historian in Mayan/ Aztec history and spirituality and holds a degree in Chinese History and Language. His extensive research on the spiritual legacies of China, Japan, the Anasazi and the Inca, as well as  the Edgar Cayce readings, led him to do major research on the Crystal Skulls and the lost continents of Atlantis & Mu/Lemuria. Raymond also does Mayan Calendar Readings for souls interested in accessing their 'American Spirit Dimension'.
teaser: Legends of Mu/Lemuria and Atlantis offer a complex picture of Humanity's origins.

title: Edgar Cayce's Atlantis
body:
Hailed as the spiritual and technological pinnacle of human history, the rise and fall of Atlantis was filled with political intrigue and cultural drama. While legends report that Atlantis is gone, Edgar Cayce, the sleeping prophet, offers hope that their crystal technology is not forever lost. Historian Raymond Tarpey offers insights to Edgar Cayce’s readings on the lost civilization of Atlantis and where its people and secrets are today in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Raymond Tarpey is a trained historian in Mayan/ Aztec history and spirituality and holds a degree in Chinese History and Language. His extensive research on the spiritual legacies of China, Japan, the Anasazi and the Inca, as well as  the Edgar Cayce readings, led him to do major research on the Crystal Skulls and the lost continents of Atlantis & Mu/Lemuria. Raymond also does Mayan Calendar Readings for souls interested in accessing their 'American Spirit Dimension'.
teaser: Edgar Cayce offered hope that crystal technology was not forever lost.

title: The Mindful Carnivore
body:
Many of us are so blithely disconnected from our foods that we are unaware of what it takes to bring meat to the table. Reports of cruelty, chemical additives, and unsanitary facilities motivate many meat eaters to become vegetarians. There may be a way we can have a compassionate connection with our food, even when it comes from an animal. Author of The Mindful Carnivore, Tovar Cerulli tells of the emotional and spiritual dilemmas he faced as a longtime vegan who later decided to hunt for his own meat, in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Tovar Cerulli became a vegetarian at twenty when he was moved by the compassionate words of Buddhist teacher Thich Nhat Hanh and concerned about the ecological impacts of the meat industry. After a decade as a vegan, he returned to omnivory and decided to take his dietary ethics for a walk in the woods with deer-rifle in hand.
teaser: Hear the emotional dilemma and the spiritual discovery of hunting.

title: The Sovereign Mind
body:
In a recently banned TEDx video, it was suggested that mind-altering plants may have initiated, and continue to, enhance human consciousness. This notion is taken as a grave threat by the government and the media. Graham Hancock argues that we are entitled to adult sovereignty of consciousness as a path to piecing together the lost reality of our human history in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Graham Hancock is the author of the international bestsellers The Sign and The Seal, Fingerprints of the Gods and Heaven's Mirror. His public lectures, radio and TV appearances have put his ideas before audiences of millions. He is recognized as an unconventional thinker who raises controversial questions about humanity's past. Although best known for his non-fiction writings his most recent books are novels. Entangled was published in 2010, and War God: Nights of the Witch, set amidst the cataclysmic events of the Spanish conquest of Mexico, was published in the United States in July 2013.
teaser: Are we entitled to adult sovereignty of consciousness?

title: Don’t Believe the Hype
body:
In the 1980s, drugs, poverty and unrealistic materialism were destroying inner-city communities. One producer brought conscious music back to the people and empowered a new era of activism. Hank Shocklee explains his mission to bring together higher consciousness artists who inspire change in their communities and the world in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Hank Shocklee is a worldwide role model for pushing the envelope and breaking new artistic boundaries. His ideologies and techniques are studied among a wide cross section of people that include universities and media policy makers. Shocklee has garnered a collection of Platinum and Multi-Platinum albums as well as 14 Grammy Nominations and numerous Soul Train Awards. Currently, he is developing a series of projects which he calls the Future Frequency.
teaser: Hear about a mission artists who inspire change in their communities and the world.

title: Art of Divination
body:
Since the beginning of time, many systems have been developed to connect with the divine and reveal the mysteries of what is yet to come. In our modern era, we have unprecedented access to these tools and their practical use to gain divine insight. Paul O'Brien, author of Divination offers an overview of the history and use of divination in this insightful interview with Regina Meredith. 

Paul O'Brien, author of, Divination: Sacred Tools for Reading the Mind of God is the founder of the Divination Foundation and the host of Pathways, a radio interview program focused on personal and cultural transformation. He currently writes the syndicated advice column Paulo’s Perspective and his Decision Maker’s Blog— both dedicated to helping people make better decisions and improve their timing.
teaser: We have unprecedented access to divination tools and their practical use.

title: I Ching and the Future of Divination
body:
I Ching is the oldest and most revered of all divination tools. With timeless wisdom and insights that are still profound in today's world, the I Ching has not changed over the centuries. Paul O'Brien, an I Ching expert explains different divination tools before delving deep into the history and uses of the I Ching, including his modern reinterpretation of the hexagrams in this interview with Regina Meredith.
 
Paul O'Brien, author of Divination: Sacred Tools for Reading the Mind of God is the founder of the Divination Foundation and the host of Pathways, a radio interview program focused on personal and cultural transformation. He currently writes the syndicated advice column Paulo’s Perspective and his Decision Maker’s Blog — both dedicated to helping people make better decisions and improve their timing.
teaser: Delve deep into the history and uses of the I Ching and hexagram reinterpretation.

title: Second Wave Spirituality
body:
Can the religions of the world make the shift from exclusive religious thought to a radically new paradigm of inclusiveness and social activism? Chris Saade personally grew up amidst the violence of Beirut and saw the destruction that stems from religious exclusivity and spiritual indifference to social ills. He shares what he learned from his experiences and how an inclusive second wave of spirituality can bring the greatest hope for our future in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Chris Saâde is a pioneer spiritual teacher, leadership trainer, psychological & spiritual coach who passionately pursues the merging of psychology, spirituality and the pursuit of social and ecological justice. He is the co-director, with his wife Jessie, of The Olive Branch Center where he teaches courses on engaged spirituality and the mysticism of inclusion.
teaser: An inclusive second wave of spirituality brings the greatest hope for our future.

title: Frequencies of the Heart
body:
Imagine a frequency, emanating from the silent place in our hearts, reminding us of our capabilities and overriding the programs that keep us asleep. This frequency has captured the attention of technicians and by the duly authorized agents of the Committee of the Majority. Brenda Williams recounts her journey to discover the Triad Wave and how she is bringing it to popular culture and “bringing the children home” in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Brenda Williams is a catalyst for change, a creative thinker who mirrors a personal understanding of life’s challenges and models solutions that can work for anyone…in real time and real life. She is an author, producer and creative engineer within the field of sound/no sound vibrational/frequency application. Since 1994, Brenda has been sharing her discoveries and expertise with others.
teaser: What is the Triad Wave and how does it “bring the children home?”

title: Higher Self Emerging
body:
We live in a world where many people simply accept what they are told to do and what to believe. It can be difficult to separate from this paradigm and live an authentic life. Terry Patten explains how we can use our higher consciousness to break free from the cult of the world, live authentically and rise to meet the unique challenges of our times in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Terry Patten is a leading voice in the emerging fields of integral evolutionary leadership and spirituality. In his cutting-edge writings, talks, and teachings, he not only inspires transcendental awakening, love, and freedom, but also calls us to accept and incarnate our full humanity. This expresses itself in a profound sense of purpose, spiritual inspiration, and evolutionary activism.
teaser: Rise to meet challenges of our times by using our higher consciousness to break free.

title: Astro-Legacy of the Boomers
body:
Born in the years following World War II, the baby boomers are the largest birth group of all time. They witnessed some of the most influential events in American history, including the death of JFK and the fall of Nixon. Perhaps Pluto, the great transformer, played a significant role in the identity of the Me Generation. Astrologer Robert Phoenix lays out the astro-legacy of the baby boomer generation and reveals what's in store for them in the next ten years in this revealing interview with Regina Meredith.

As an astrologer, writer and radio host, Robert Phoenix has been doing tarot, astrological and psychic readings for 20 years. His methodology blends mundane astrology, mythology and Jungian psychology to provide spiritual guidance. He describes the process as a conversation taking place between his and his clients’ higher selves.
teaser: What is the astro-legacy of the baby boomer generation?

title: Millennial Shadow of Pluto
body:
Born just in time to experience ecological decline, financial chaos, and the upheaval of governments worldwide, the Millennial Generation is having a rough ride. However, their shadow of Pluto in Scorpio may give this generation the greatest potential to bring lasting change to the world. Astrologer, Robert Phoenix, discusses the quirks and kinks of this generation and how they will begin to reshape our future in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

As an Astrologer, writer and radio host, Robert Phoenix has been doing tarot, astrological and psychic readings for twenty years. His methodology blends mundane astrology, mythology and Jungian psychology to provide spiritual guidance. He describes the process as a conversation taking place between his higher self and the clients’.
teaser: The Millennial Generation’s strength comes from their shadow of Pluto in Scorpio.

title: Shadowy Schemes of the Banking Elite
body:
Originally, the World Bank was founded to offer financial aid to developing countries of the world. It did not take long for the distribution of these funds to become corrupted by politics and selfish interests. As a World Bank attorney, Karen Hudes saw the shadowy schemes of the banking elite, first hand and brings forth a sobering message for the whole world in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Karen Hudes worked in the US Export Import Bank of the US from 1980-1985 and in the Legal Department of the World Bank from 1986-2007. In 2007 Karen warned the US Treasury Department and US Congress that the US would lose its right to appoint the President of the World Bank if the current American President of the World Bank did not play by the rules.
teaser: The shadowy schemes of the banking elite brings forth a sobering message.

title: Sacred Bond between Animals and Humans
body:
Animals are a vital part of our planet and an integral part of many homes. Though we share our lives, we lack a connection with our domestic companions. We can develop a spiritual rapport with our pets to overcome the language barriers and have a life-long friendship full of joy and understanding. Even in the last moments of their lives, this spiritual connection can bring them peace and serenity. Animal intuitive, Linda Bender explains how we can engage with animals, on a spiritual level, for the benefit of home and planet in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Linda Bender’s love of the natural world began in her childhood backyard. Her rapport with animals inspired her to earn a doctorate in veterinary medicine and her enduring interest in spirituality led her to study energy medicine. This combination culminated in the founding of the Mind the Gap Wellness Center in Cincinnati and a pet therapy program through the Ohio Mental Health Association and From the Heart nonprofit, as well as an upcoming book on the sacred relationship between humans and animals.
teaser: How can we spiritually engage with our companions to better understand their needs?

title: Sacred Sites of Consciousness
body:
Sacred sites have long been the focus of intrigue and mystery for countless generations. New information is coming to light, revealing that these locales actually have a measurable energy which connects the earth to the sun through magnetic portals. Freddy Silva explores what this connection means and how these sacred sites of consciousness can bring about spiritual transformation to everyone on the planet in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Freddy Silva is one of the world’s leading experts on ancient knowledge, sacred sites, and crop circles, and a leading researcher into the interaction between temples and consciousness. He is a best-selling author, and director of several documentaries. He lectures internationally on a variety of topics on ancient wisdom and earth mysteries.
teaser: Sacred sites connect the earth to the sun through magnetic portals.

title: Angels of Atlantis
body:
Bearing various names of splendor, these advanced Light Beings have moved through the ages, since before the fall of Atlantis. Hidden from our view, they have patiently waited until we call on them in times of great need, such as this current era. Stewart Pearce has helped numerous people to connect with these unique Orb Wanderers – The Angels of Atlantis - and in this interview he shares how you can call upon them for a very unique purpose. 

Stewart Pearce, author of The Angels of Atlantis, The Alchemy of Voice, The Hearts Note and the Angel Heart Sigils Oracle, is an international Sound Healer, Master of Voice, and Angel Medium. Stewart also has world-renowned status as a voice & performance coach, with a career spanning over three decades. His current work includes coaching people to understand that we each have a unique signature sound - the song of our soul -  leading to the I AM PRESENCE.
teaser: Bearing various guises and names, advanced beings have walked among us.

title: Spiritual Companions
body:
Animals, like people, are spiritual beings.  While we may not be able to fully understand what our pets are trying to tell us, we can tune into their energies and receive clear messages about their wellbeing. Gail Thackray explains that we can create a deeper level of understanding with our pets when we learn to connect with them on a spiritual level in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Gail Thackray is a medium who connects with spirits on the other side and communicates their messages to the living. Her passion is helping people open up spiritually and connect to their inner self while aligning with Source. Her clients learn to manifest a better life by manifesting what they want more easily and quickly.
teaser: Tune into your pets' energies and receive clear messages about their wellbeing.

title: Astrology and Sacred Architecture
body:
Looking up into the night sky, we can easily be overwhelmed by the cosmological wonders that stretch out before us. Little do many of us realize, that these infinite wonders are reflected by the lives we live. A.T. Mann has studied our intricate connection with the cosmos and explains how astrology reveals that we are inextricably intertwined with the sacred architecture of the universe in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

After a career as an architect, A.T. Mann experienced a profound transformation. As a result, he became an astrologer, author and publisher. He has written on astrology, psychology, healing, prophecy and reincarnation. He is currently working on a documentary about the meditation and neuroscience, and another on The Sacred Language of Trees.
teaser: The infinite wonders of the universe are reflected by the lives we live.

title: The Hidden Power of DNA
body:
What does it mean to be human? Is it something in our molecules or our unique expression of consciousness? The answer to these questions lies hidden within our DNA. William Brown explains how the unused DNA in our bodies can be unlocked to reveal the greatest secrets of being human and our connection with the universe in this interview with Regina Meredith.

William Brown is a biophysicist and research scientist at the Resonance Project Foundation and Hawai’i Institute for Unified Physics. He investigates the biophysics of living organisms to understand how biological system interface with a universal information matrix at the molecular level. This has led to a revolutionary way of viewing the biological system with remarkable implications for therapeutics and regenerative applications.
teaser: What does it mean to be human? Is it in our molecules or expression of consciousness?

title: Healing Urantia
body:
The mysterious Urantia Book has had a profound impact on thousands of readers around the world since its publication in 1955. In the last few decades, however, the revelation’s original celestial authors have returned to guide our planet—which they call Urantia—through this dangerous period of our history. Byron Belitsos explains how we can use their ongoing celestial guidance to heal our broken planet and create a sustainable civilization in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Byron Belitsos is the award-winning founder and CEO of Origin Press. He has been a student of The Urantia Book for nearly four decades, coauthoring five books on its teachings including his most recent title, Healing a Broken World. In addition, he has brought the teachings of the Urantia Revelation to a worldwide audience through his many writings and speaking engagements.
teaser: Urantia Book’s inter-dimensional consultants continue to guide us.

title: The Road to Enlightenment
body:
After experiencing a Kundalini awakening forty years ago at age twenty, Martin Birrittella was determined to make enough money to support a life of meditation and spiritual contemplation.  This road was not always easy, and he learned many important lessons from it. Now, Martin Birritella shares his understanding of free will and focused awareness so that we all can pursue the road of enlightenment in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Martin Birrittella, author of Field of Love, began meditating in college and has since devoted himself to a spiritual life. After founding several successful public companies, he retired at 41 so he could devote himself to his spiritual practice. The effects of his devotion are found in his paintings, writings and his work with others who share his approach to the practice of self-inquiry.
teaser: Understand free will and focused awareness to pursue the road of enlightenment.

title: Financial Reality Check
body:
There is no doubt that 2013 has been a financially turbulent year. While several controversial economic issues were dominating our mainstream news media, many others passed by unnoticed. Can we really trust what we were told about the world’s economic recovery? Andrew Hoffman gives us an update on the financial dealings of 2013 and offers insight into the murky machinations of the financial elite in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Andrew ("Andy") Hoffman, CFA joined Miles Franklin as Marketing Director in October 2011.  For a decade, he was a U.S.-based buy-side and sell-side analyst, most notably as an II-ranked oil service analyst at Salomon Smith Barney from 1999 through 2005.  Since 2002, his focus has been entirely on Precious Metals, and since 2006 has written free missives regarding gold, silver, and macroeconomics.  Prior to joining the company, he spent five years working as an Investor Relations officer or consultant to numerous junior mining companies.
teaser: Hear insight into the murky machinations of the financial elite.

title: Project Pegasus Revealed
body:
While many of us struggle with the complexities of ordinary consciousness, other people naturally have the ability to see beyond the limits of time and space. Andrew Basiago became aware of these abilities at a very young age and was tapped for military use. Now, he reveals the secret programs that he was once a part of, with Project Pegasus in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Andrew D. Basiago is a prominent figure in the truth movement who is leading a campaign to lobby the US government to disclose its secrets on time travel, teleportation and the US presence on Mars. He served with Project Pegasus at the dawn of the time-space age and was one of humanity’s early Mars explorers.
teaser: Some of us naturally have the ability to see beyond the limits of time and space.

title: Dangers of the Smart Meter
body:
Would you allow a device into your home that had known health risks, increased your monthly bills and made it easier for you to be spied upon? Despite documentation of detrimental health effects, these devices are still being forcibly installed in people’s homes. There may be a connection to the military officials who have testified that they now have the ability to spy on people through household appliances. Josh del Sol, producer of the film Take Back Your Power, brings to light the physical and societal dangers of smart meters in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Director and Producer of Take Back Your Power, Josh del Sol is passionate about the growing movement of social awakening. He has a vision for a more equitable and transparent social structure with foundational values which honor the sanctity of life and human rights. Josh finds inspiration in those of courage who speak truth to power, from a place of non-violence and vision, laying the foundation for necessary solutions.
teaser: Smart meters are being forcibly installed into people’s homes.

title: Navigating the Healthcare System
body:
The implementation of the Affordable Care Act, also known as Obamacare, has sent shockwaves through both ends of the political divide. Despite the political bickering, the state of health for a nation is related to the effectiveness of its healthcare system. Dr. Carlos Santo guides us through an overview of Obamacare and offers a physician’s view of navigating complex healthcare systems in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Dr. Carlos Santo, a graduate of the Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine, diligently works to spread the message of natural health and healing to his many patients and students. His private practice is deeply steeped in the traditional principles of Naturopathic Medicine where he is always seeking to reach the cause of illness. Dr. Santo has had the distinct privilege of working under a number of great masters in the arts of Chinese Medicine, martial arts, and yoga.
teaser: A physician’s view of navigating complex healthcare systems.

title: Accessing One Mind
body:
We all share in the illusion of separateness when, in fact, we are inseparable from the mind of the earth, the animals and our fellow humans. This becomes evident when we examine stories of compassion, risk and personal sacrifice. Science may offer an explanation as we start to understand the theories of entanglement and holography. Dr. Larry Dossey explains the interconnectedness of all life and conveys the importance of consciously accessing the One Mind in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Larry Dossey, author of One Mind: How Our Individual Mind is Part of a Greater Consciousness and Why It Matters, is responsible for changing the way the medical profession and the world look at prayer in medicine. This distinguished physician has become an internationally influential advocate of the role of the mind and spirituality integrated with healthcare.
teaser: The interconnectedness of all life conveys the importance of accessing the One Mind.

title: Decoding Sacred Architecture
body:
If we are carefully observant, we will see repeating patterns of angles and ratios throughout all of nature. Ancient illuminated orders knew of these patterns and incorporated them into their sacred architecture. Throughout the ages, these secrets were nearly lost. Scott Onstott became aware of natural repeating patterns at a young age and, as a trained architect, his passion is decoding sacred architecture. He shares his insights with Regina Meredith.

Scott Onstott received a degree in architecture from the University of California at Berkeley and worked in a number of prominent architecture and engineering offices in San Francisco. In 2009, after a series of epiphanies, he went in a new direction and stared creating an epic documentary called Secrets in Plain Sight. The recently released sequel, Secrets in Plain Sight 2, is a continuation of that mind-expanding exploration of sacred geometry.
teaser: Patterns were incorporated into sacred architecture, the secrets lost through time.

title: Reprogramming Your Mind
body:
The mind is an amazing tool for transformation and manifestation. Whether one’s life is ideal, or not, it is still the result of the mind’s ability to manifest belief patterns. If it is running belief patterns of failures and self-doubt, then that is the life that manifests. Nick Delgado has developed a new focus technique to overwrite these outdated beliefs and replace them with scripts full of confidence and success in this interview with Regina Meredith.

 

After a frightening mini stroke at the age of 23, Nick Delgado devoted himself to becoming healthier; a fitness role model that would lead others to great health. Nick Delgado graduated from the University of Southern California and served as Director of the Pritikin Better Health Program of the Nathan Pritikin Longevity Center. He is one of the world’s primary experts on anti-aging and an inspiration to those athletes who think their career ends at age 40.
teaser: An ideal life is the result of the mind’s ability to manifest belief patterns.

title: Stories of Otherworldly Contacts
body:
Since the surge of UFOs in the 1950s, the remnants of information we have about otherworldly contacts is the culmination of ever vigilant researchers. They strive to pierce the veil of secrecy and definitively prove that we are not alone. Researcher Paola Harris has collected an immense body of research on UFO phenomena and exposes the growing agenda for managing off-world contacts.

An Italo-American photojournalist and investigative reporter in the field of extraterrestrial related phenomena research, Paola Leopizzi Harris is also a widely published free-lance writer and author of Exopolitics: Stargate to a New Reality. She has studied extraterrestrial related phenomena since 1979 and is on personal terms with many of the leading researchers in the field.
teaser: An immense body of UFO research exposes the agenda for managing off-world contacts.

title: Hijacking the Weather with Dane Wigington
body:
Life on earth thrives in a delicate balance of natural forces which maintain the ideal conditions for that life. Mounting evidence reveals that governmental and military geoengineering programs have thrown this balance into disarray. Despite the environmental devastation, our media continues to reassure us that these strange weather patterns are perfectly normal. Leading the charge against geoengineering is Dane Wigington who reveals why our weather is being hijacked and how we can take up the fight to reverse the damage in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dane Wigington has an extensive background in solar energy as a licensed contractor in California and Arizona.  After noticing a significant drop in solar uptake and a decline in forest health, he began to investigate the cause and found that the problems stemmed from aircraft spraying. Now, he is the lead researcher for Geoengineering Watch and has investigated all levels of geoengineering from chemtrails to HAARP.
teaser: The delicate balance of natural forces that gave rise to life on our planet is being thrown into disarray by worldwide geoengineering programs.. Leading the charge against geoengineering is Dane Wigington who reveals why our weather is being hijacked and how we can take up the fight to reverse the damage.

title: An Honest Look at Radiation with Dr. John Apsley
body:
We need to take an honest look at the radiation contamination from Fukushima and many other nuclear sites around the world. The situation may be far worse than we have been told. If we are to begin reducing global radiation levels, we need to find real solutions that are simple and inexpensive. Dr. John Apsley reveals how we can detox from radiation and reverse chronic degenerative diseases using only natural potent substances in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. John Apsley is a physician, author and researcher, who for the past 30 years, has specialized in regenerative medicine to reverse chronic degenerative disease through accelerated tissue repair. Dr. Apsley’s expertise derives from his studies on the long-lived cultures which regenerate themselves upon the pillars of a pristine environment, a super nourishing dietary and spiritual harmony. His latest book is: Fukushima Meltdown & Modern Radiation: Protecting Ourselves and Our Future Generations.
teaser: We need to take an honest look at the radiation contamination from Fukushima and many other nuclear sites around the world. The situation may be far worse than we have been told. Dr. John Apsley reveals how we can detox from radiation and reverse chronic degenerative diseases using only natural potent substances.

title: Taking our Place in the Cosmos with Tom T. Moore
body:
The answer to the great question of being alone in the universe may soon be revealed. Earth is a gem in the universe and our uniqueness is a source of attention for other civilizations. Ancient history hints about higher forms of life controlling human destiny for their own gains. As we stand at the dawn of a new era, these ancient agendas are changing dramatically. Tom T. Moore traces the history of extraterrestrial influence upon our civilizations’ progress and explains what we can expect with the coming unveiling of humanity in this interview with Regina Meredith.

For over 25 years Tom T. Moore has been president and CEO of his own international motion picture and TV program distribution business. His three, The Gentle Way, books provides a simple, yet powerful tools for everyday use that are a giant step forward from The Law of Attraction. His latest book, First Contact: Conversations With An ET, details Mr. Moore's telepathic communications with a member of a first contact team coming to earth in 2017.
teaser: As we stand at the dawn of a new era, the ancient extraterrestrial agendas are changing dramatically. Tom T. Moore traces the history of extraterrestrial influence upon our civilizations’ progress and explains what we can expect with the coming unveiling of humanity.

title: Asking the Angels with Tom T. Moore
body:
What if the answers you need are already with and within you? We may feel that we are alone and helpless through the most desperate moment of our lives. The truth is we are never alone. To get the help we need, all we have to do is to have the courage to ask. Tom T. Moore explains how to receive the most benevolent outcomes, for yourself and others, by learning how to ask the guides and angels that walk alongside each of our lives in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

For over 25 years Tom T. Moore has been president and CEO of his own international motion picture and TV program distribution business. His three, The Gentle Way, books provides a simple, yet powerful tools for everyday use that are a giant step forward from The Law of Attraction. His latest book, First Contact: Conversations With An ET, details Mr. Moore's telepathic communications with a member of a first contact team coming to earth in 2017.
teaser: We may feel that that we are alone and helpless during the desperate moments of our lives. The truth is that we are never alone. Tom T. Moore explains how to receive the most benevolent outcomes, for yourself and others, by learning how to ask the guides and angels that walk alongside each of our lives.

title: Astrology and the Rising of Kundalini with Barbara Hand Clow
body:
Have you ever wondered how the movements of the planets can affect your life? Within each one of us, Kundalini energy is continuously swelling. As we reach the latter half of our lives, the movements of Saturn, Uranus and Chiron call upon this energy to rise. This can create turbulent personal and emotional changes such as midlife crises. Barbra Hand Clow, author of Astrology and the Rising of Kundalini offers, advice for gracefully transitioning through these grand passages of life in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Barbara Hand Clow is an internationally acclaimed ceremonial teacher, author, and Mayan Calendar researcher who has taught at sacred sites throughout the world. Her numerous books include The Mayan Code, The Pleiadian Agenda, Alchemy of Nine Dimensions and the soon to be released, The Ruby Crystal.
teaser: As we reach the latter half of our lives, the movements of Saturn, Uranus and Chiron call upon Kundalini to rise. This can create turbulent personal and emotional changes such as the midlife crisis. Barbra Hand Clow offers advice for gracefully transitioning through these grand passages of life.

title: Secret Powers of the Vatican? with Barbara Hand Clow
body:
Some secrets are too dangerous to reveal openly. Will we ever know what lurks beneath the gilded facade of the Vatican City? Between the lines and between the words, we may find a truth that is far stranger than any fiction. In her soon to be released book, The Ruby Crystal, Barbara Hand Clow spins a tale of power and secrets hidden within the Vatican, which may be all too true in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Barbara Hand Clow is an internationally acclaimed ceremonial teacher, author, and Mayan Calendar researcher who has taught at sacred sites throughout the world. Her numerous books include The Mayan Code, The Pleiadian Agenda, Alchemy of Nine Dimensions and the soon to be released, The Ruby Crystal.
teaser: Between the lines and between the words, we may find a truth that is far stranger than any fiction. In her soon to be released book, The Ruby Crystal, Barbara Hand Clow spins a tale of power and secrets hidden within the Vatican, which may be all too true.

title: Adamski’s Otherworldly Revelations with Glenn Steckling
body:
Our inner struggles of asserting egoic control over others versus forging a universal connection is reflected by our governmental institutions worldwide. The future of humanity is not just a matter of technological innovation, but one of spiritual advancement. Glenn Steckling conveys the messages of George Adamski concerning the presence extraterrestrial intelligence on earth and their influence over the development of humanity in this interview with Regina Meredith.


Since his father, Mr. Fred Steckling passed away in 1991, Glenn Steckling has assumed the responsibilities of his family's work in the field of UFO and ET research. He continues to present the materials discovered and bequeathed by his family from well over sixty years of research. He is now the Director of the George Adamski Foundation, one of the oldest and longest standing UFO organizations.
teaser: The future of humanity is not just a matter of technological innovation, but one of spiritual advancement. Glenn Steckling conveys the messages of George Adamski concerning the presence extraterrestrial intelligence on earth and their influence over the development of humanity.

title: Surviving the Next Mass Extinction with David Christopher
body:
Five times catastrophe has struck our planet, resulting in mass extinction events. With each calamity, the planet proved itself indestructible and a new era of creation began. Evidence suggests that we are now beginning a sixth cycle of destruction and creation. What is our place in this transition and how can we adapt to a newly emerging world? In this interview, David Christopher offers sage advice for those seeking the wisdom underlying this turbulent transition.


David Christopher has long been intrigued by the integration of 21st century science with a spiritual sensibility toward the creation of the Universe. But this story lacked the lyricism of the liturgy and the scriptures that he was familiar with in his youth. This inspired him to write, The Holy Universe: A New Story of Creation for the Heart, Soul and Spirit, and to teach the importance of telling our collective story.
teaser: Five times catastrophe has struck our planet and evidence suggests that we are now beginning a sixth cycle of destruction and creation. What is our place in this transition and how can we adapt to a newly emerging world? David Christopher offers sage advice for those seeking the wisdom underlying this turbulent transition.

title: Intergalactic Ethics with Ted Peters
body:
Astrobiologists and UFOlogists do not necessarily agree about the presence of extraterrestrial intelligence on Earth. But they do agree that intelligent life could evolve throughout the cosmos. The time will come when we will encounter such life and must face certain theological and ethical questions. Ted Peters explains the moral and religious dilemmas we will face when mankind finally openly encounters its first extraterrestrial intelligence in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Ted Peters, is a professor of systematic theology at Pacific Lutheran Theological Seminary and the Graduate Theological Union in Berkeley, California. He has authored, co-authored, edited, and co-edited more than two dozen books with topics ranging from sin and evil to the future of God and to points where science and religion clash and cooperate. His new venture as an author is a series of espionage thrillers with an enigmatic heroine, Leona Foxx. Ted will publish a new book--UFOs: God's Chariots?--in April 2014 with New Page Books.
teaser: The time will come when we will encounter such life and must face certain theological and ethical questions. Ted Peters explains the moral and religious dilemmas we will face when mankind finally openly encounters its first extraterrestrial intelligence.

title: The Amicizia Project with Timothy Good
body:
Since the 1950s most technological advances coincide well with Moore’s law. That is, computing power doubles every two years. Yet we must question why space travel and energy sources are limited to decades-old technology.
