Timothy Good reveals details of the Amacizia Project from the 1950s, where mankind became the benefactor of off-world advanced technology; technology which has since been hidden deep within black projects in this interview with Regina Meredith.


In 1955, Timothy Good's passion for aviation and space led him to become interested in UFOs and the alien presence on Earth. In 1961 he began to conduct his own research. Since then, he has amassed a wealth of evidence, including several thousand declassified intelligence documents. Timothy Good's first book, Above Top Secret: The Worldwide UFO Cover-up, became an instant bestseller, and is regarded widely as the definitive work on the subject.
teaser: Timothy Good reveals details of the Amicizia Project from the 1950s, where mankind became the benefactor of off-world advanced technology; technology which has since been hidden deep within black projects.

title: Dark Encounters with David Marler
body:
After 65 years of UFO investigations, the general public is still in the dark about what is really going on. Every day someone, somewhere, reports a new encounter and the tone of these reports grows darker. David Marler presents little known details of past contacts and explains darker messages from the increased sightings of triangle-shaped craft in this interview with Regina Meredith. 


In 1990 he joined The Mutual UFO Network as a Field Investigator Trainee and has since served as Field Investigator, State Section Director and Illinois State Director. He is currently an independent UFO researcher who strives to have an open mind regarding the UFO phenomenon. His latest book is titled, Triangular UFOs: An Estimate of the Situation.
teaser: After 65 years of UFO investigations, the general public is still in the dark about what is really going on. David Marler presents little known details of past contacts and explains darker messages from the increased sightings of triangle-shaped craft.

title: Communing with Spirits of Nature with Linda Shaylor Cooper
body:
An unseen world of living beings thrives in the natural world which surrounds our own. Insulated by modern conveniences and scientific materialism, mainstream society has become oblivious to our connection with this subtle web of life. Linda Shaylor Cooper invites us to explore the worlds of magic and wonder hidden the gardens and natural areas everywhere in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

At an early age, Linda Shaylor Cooper found herself questioning life and its mysteries. She was fortunate enough to meet a spiritual teacher who opened her eyes to the unseen aspects of life, which included the nature spirit realm. Along with her intense focus on gardening came the realization that the nature spirits were working with her as her gardens vibrated with a magical quality.
teaser: An unseen world of living beings thrives in the natural world which surrounds our own which many of us are oblivious of. Linda Shaylor Cooper invites us to explore the worlds of magic and wonder hidden the gardens and natural areas everywhere.

title: Channeling Metatron on Humanity with Joan Walker
body:
In an unprecedented live channeling event, Joan Walker channels Metatron, who reveals the true origin and destiny of humanity. It is important to discover the truth of where we came from if you want to better understand the future of humanity. Though we may seem to be simply floundering through the history of a meaningless universe, we are really individualized expressions of the divine seeking a return to Source. Please join this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Joan Walker, a gifted channel for the archangels and ascended masters, has used her gift for many years. At the specific request of Archangel Metatron, and under the guidance of the archangels and masters, Joan is developing some basic teachings that anyone can use to express their true divine nature for both their own personal evolution, as well as that of the collective.
teaser: In an unprecedented live channeling event, Joan Walker channels Metatron, who reveals the true origin and destiny of humanity. It is important to discover the truth of where we came from if you want to better understand the future of humanity.

title: Channeling Anna on Gender Transition with Joan Walker
body:
In this live channeling event, Joan Walker channels Anna, who discusses the balance of masculine and feminine, and reveals the future of human gender as we progress into higher dimensions of existence. What we think of as masculine and feminine is just a transitory manifestation of humanity in the third dimension. As humanity evolves beyond the third dimension, our notions and expressions of gender will undergo a dramatic change. See the discussion in his interview with Regina Meredith.


Joan Walker, a gifted channel for the archangels and ascended masters, has used her gift for many years. At the specific request of Archangel Metatron, and under the guidance of the archangels and masters, Joan is developing some basic teachings that anyone can use to express their true divine nature for both their own personal evolution, as well as that of the collective.
teaser: In this live channeling event, Joan Walker channels Anna, who discusses the balance of masculine and feminine, and reveals the future of human gender as we progress into higher dimensions of existence.

title: Two Souls in One Lifetime with Nicolas David Ngan
body:
We may be spiritual beings having a human experience, but what if multiple spirits share a single human experience?  Occasionally a soul agrees to leave its body so that another soul can complete its mission for that lifetime. These new souls are called walk-ins and they can bring profound lessons for all of humanity. Nicolas David Ngan, a walk-in himself, explains what happens when two souls agree to share a single lifetime in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Nicolas David Ngan has developed a powerful, profoundly transformative body of Soul Contract work at the Center for Conscious Ascension in conjunction with Dr Ahlmeirah Ariel Hallaire. They are regarded as world leaders in this field and have been working at the cutting edge of raising human consciousness for over 20 years. Together they have helped thousands to understand their lives, embody and express their higher consciousness and transmute their emotional separation programming.
teaser: Occasionally a soul agrees to leave its body so that another soul can complete its mission for that lifetime. These new souls are called walk-ins and they can bring profound lessons for all of humanity. Nicolas David Ngan, a walk-in himself, explains what happens when two souls agree to share a single lifetime.

title: Decoding your Soul Contract with Nicolas David Ngan
body:
The power to change your life lies within the secret code of your name. Each one of us has a unique set of talents, challenges and karma that can help or hinder the fulfillment of our purpose in life.  The terms of this soul contract can be determined by deciphering the code hiding within a name. Nicolas David Ngan explains how to reveal the secrets of your name and how changing your name can change your life in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Nicolas David Ngan has developed a powerful, profoundly transformative body of Soul Contract work at the Center for Conscious Ascension in conjunction with Dr Ahlmeirah Ariel Hallaire. They are regarded as world leaders in this field and have been working at the cutting edge of raising human consciousness for over 20 years. Together they have helped thousands to understand their lives, embody and express their higher consciousness and transmute their emotional separation programming.
teaser: The power to change your life lies within the secret code of your name. Each one of us has a unique set of talents, challenges and karma that can help or hinder the fulfillment of our purpose in life. Nicolas David Ngan explains how to reveal the secrets of your name and how changing your name can change your life.

title: Big Money and the Threat of Global Collapse with Andrew Hoffman
body:
The influence of big-money weaves a delicate tapestry of international commerce. With the tug of a single loose thread, this intricate financial network could fall apart. While many nations count on the stability of this structure, a few high-stakes players are betting on its collapse. Andy Hoffman gives us an economic overview of several key nations caught in this financial web and highlights the instability of our global economy in this interview with Regina Meredith.


Andrew ("Andy") Hoffman, CFA joined Miles Franklin as Marketing Director in October 2011. For a decade, he was a U.S.-based buy-side and sell-side analyst, most notably as an II-ranked oil service analyst at Salomon Smith Barney from 1999 through 2005. Since 2002, his focus has been entirely on Precious Metals, and since 2006 has written free missives regarding gold, silver, and macroeconomics. Prior to joining the company, he spent five years working as an Investor Relations officer or consultant to numerous junior mining companies.
teaser: The influence of big-money weaves a delicate tapestry of international commerce. With the tug of a single loose thread, this intricate financial network could fall apart. Andy Hoffman gives us an economic overview of several key nations caught in this financial web and highlights the instability of our global economy.

title: Balancing Feminine and Masculine with Cate Montana
body:
Many of us grew up in a culture that taught us to cling to the structure of the masculine while shunning the emotions and chaos of the feminine. However, it is never too late to discover the unique wisdom and strengths in both of these forces by bringing balance to the yin and yang within. Cate Montana reveals the life-long journey that led her to embrace and embody her own feminine and masculine strengths in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Cate Montana is a freelance writer and editor who specializes in the re-awakening of feminine consciousness, metaphysics, physics and the meeting ground between science and mysticism. Her work focuses on self-realization, the physics of consciousness, and implementing feminine values and sustainable lifestyles. She is the author of of Unearthing Venus: Search for the Woman Within  and co-author of The Heart of the Matter: A Simple Guide to Discovering Gifts in Strange Wrapping Paper with Dr. Darren Weissman.
teaser: It is never too late to discover the unique wisdom and strengths of feminine and masculine forces by bringing balance to the yin and yang within. Cate Montana reveals the life-long journey that led her to embrace and embody her own feminine and masculine strengths

title: Ancient Giants in America with Richard J. Dewhurst
body:
Long ago, North America was home to an advanced race of giants who built great mounds, mummified their dead and raised megalithic structures. Archeological finds support the indigenous lore of these pre-human civilizations, yet the evidence is buried away and considered a forbidden matter. Despite this suppression of information, Richard J. Dewhurst has uncovered proof that ancient giants once ruled America in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Richard J. Dewhurst is the Emmy Award–winning writer of Dear America: Letters Home from Vietnam, an HBO feature documentary. He is a graduate of NYU with degrees in journalism, film, and television, and has written and edited for the History Channel, the Arts & Entertainment Channel, PBS, Fox Television and Fox Films, ABC News, TNT, Paramount Pictures, and the Miami Herald.
teaser: Long ago, North America was home to an advanced race of giants who built great mounds, mummified their dead and raised megalithic structures. Despite the suppression of information, Richard J. Dewhurst has uncovered proof that ancient giants once ruled America.

title: Higher Consciousness through Forgiveness with James V. Hardt Ph.D.
body:
Every new brain function discovery accompanies the growing awareness that we know precious little about human consciousness. We know that we can train our brains with tools like neuro-feeback to improve overall brain function. However, a recent discovery has shown a surprising new way that we can dramatically enhance our mental capabilities. Dr. James Hardt explains the neuroscience behind achieving the highest levels of consciousness using love and forgiveness in this interview with Regina Meredith.

For over 30 years James V. Hardt Ph.D. has been studying the electrophysiological basis of spiritual states and has dedicated his life in the research and development surrounding brain wave training. He has developed technology that has demonstrated significant effectiveness in healing and transforming core dimensions of personality, reducing stress and anxiety, reversing key aspects of the brain’s aging process.
teaser: We know precious little about human consciousness. However, a recent discovery has shown a surprising new way that we can dramatically enhance our mental capabilities. Dr. James Hardt explains the neuroscience behind achieving the highest levels of consciousness using love and forgiveness.

title: Reclaiming the Apocalypse with Carolyn Baker Ph.D
body:
There is no argument that we are in turbulent times. With the state of our environment, economy, and energy in decline, it appears that the collapse of industrial civilization is imminent. These challenging times present us with the perfect opportunity to change our lifestyles and build stronger communities. Carolyn Baker Ph.D. offers hope for the future by helping us to see that the coming collapse is actually an opportunity for deeper spiritual growth.

Carolyn Baker Ph.D. was an adjunct professor of history and psychology for 11 years and a psychotherapist in private practice for 17 years. She has written several books including Collapsing Consciously: Transformative Truths for Turbulent Times and Navigating the Coming Chaos: A Handbook for Inner Transition. Carolyn offers life coaching, workshops, and speaking engagements nationally and internationally.
teaser: There is no argument that we are in turbulent times. These challenging times present us with the perfect opportunity to change our lifestyles and build stronger communities. Carolyn Baker Ph.D. offers hope for the future by helping us to see that the coming collapse is actually an opportunity for deeper spiritual growth.

title: Power for the People with James Martinez
body:
With dwindling resources and increasing costs, our reliance on carbon-based fuels is coming to an end. Fortunately, new developments in low-energy nuclear reaction (LENR) technology will put a safe and efficient form of power back into to the hands of the people. James Martinez explains the efforts to bring LENR technology into the mainstream for the benefit of economy, environment and social change in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

James Martinez is a Media Ecologist, Radio Talk Show Host and pioneer in media. His career in radio began in radio on the Republic Broadcasting Network and later The Achieve Radio Network.  He’s appeared on National and International radio for his humanitarian work in finance, Cold Fusion and media ecology.
teaser: With dwindling resources and increasing costs, our reliance on carbon-based fuels is coming to an end. Fortunately, new developments in low-energy nuclear reaction (LENR) technology will put a safe and efficient form of power back into to the hands of the people.

title: The Untold Story of Humanity with Paul Von Ward
body:
The origin of humanity is a long enduring mystery and has been subject of never ending debate. With a myriad of creation mythos conflicting with physical evidence, discovering the truth may come only by bridging science with metaphysics. Paul Von Ward has pieced together details from our ancient past and offers a completely different view of how humans originated on this planet in this interview with Regina Meredith.

As an interdisciplinary cosmologist and independent scholar, Paul Von Ward is internationally known for the hypothesis of an AB (advanced beings) intervention in human development; his theory of natural spirituality in an evolving, self-learning universe; and research on the survival of a personal soul-genome. Paul's academic background (Florida State, Harvard and other institutions); his military, diplomatic, international executive career; and research on five continents keep his provocative publications grounded in emerging science and credible human experience.
teaser: With a myriad of creation mythos conflicting with physical evidence, discovering the true origin of humanity may come only by bridging science with metaphysics. Paul Von Ward has pieced together details from our ancient past and offers a completely different view of how humans originated on this planet.

title: Channeling THEO: Where Have All the Dragons Gone? with Sheila Gillette
body:
Our world is far stranger than we can imagine. Ancient folklore tells of fantastical creatures like dragons, mermaids and centaurs, that we once shared the world with, and maybe still do. Perhaps they are no longer here, because they are slipping away. Not to the ravages of time, but rather staying in lower-dimensional reality as human beings progress into higher dimensions. Sheila Gillette channels the THEO group to offer a clearer picture of what these anomalies of nature are and what is happening with them. 


Sheila Gillette is the world renowned spiritual medium and channel for the twelve archangels collectively known as Theo. She is the co-author of, The Soul Truth: A Guide to Inner Peace and author of, The Fifth Dimension: Channels to a New Reality as well as the co-host of the weekly internet radio show “Ask Theo Live”. Theo speaks through Sheila to guide humanity during this unprecedented shift to a higher state of consciousness.
teaser: Perhaps fantastical creatures like dragons, mermaids and centaurs, are no longer here, because they are slipping away. Not to the ravages of time, but rather staying in lower-dimensional reality as human beings progress into higher dimensions. Sheila Gillette channels the THEO to find answers.

title: Channeling THEO on Soul Agreements for Life and Love with Sheila Gillette
body:
Each one of us is far greater than just a simple product of our DNA and upbringing. What we bring into this world, from across our lifetimes, has the most profound impact on every aspect of who we really are. Sheila Gillette channels the THEO group to explain how agreements made by the soul, before birth, influence DNA and affects the connections we make with family and friends in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Sheila Gillette is the world renowned spiritual medium and channel for the twelve archangels collectively known as Theo. She is the co-author of, The Soul Truth: A Guide to Inner Peace and author of, The Fifth Dimension: Channels to a New Reality as well as the co-host of the weekly internet radio show “Ask Theo Live”. Theo speaks through Sheila to guide humanity during this unprecedented shift to a higher state of consciousness.
teaser: What we bring into this world, from across our lifetimes, has the most profound impact on every aspect of who we really are. Sheila Gillette channels the THEO group to explain how agreements made by the soul, before birth, influence DNA and affects the connections we make with family and friends.

title: Breaking Free from Empire with Neil Kramer
body:
In a world awash with media, the value of the individual is diminished in favor of a hive-mentality. With heart and mind in balance, the Will awakens and the eyes of the universe gaze upon you. You become empowered to break free from Empire and systems of control. Neil Kramer explains how you can begin living as a sovereign human being by deliberately creating and refining the self and awakening the Will within in this interview with Regina Meredith.


Neil Kramer is a British philosopher and esotericist whose focus is chiefly on spirituality, metaphysics, mysticism, freedom, and inner development. Neil discusses many of the social, cultural, and political influences in our lives, and what we can do to change them with his unique blend of lucidity, honesty, and insight. He shares his philosophy and practice in writings, recordings, interviews, and lectures, as well as in personal teachings and group workshops.
teaser: In a world awash with media, the value of the individual is diminished in favor of a hive-mentality. Neil Kramer explains how you can begin living as a sovereign human being by deliberately creating and refining the self and awakening the Will within.

title: Secret Life of Sleep with Kat Duff
body:
Sleep, it is something that we all do, but many of us do not do it well. Our modern sleep culture is fraught with unnatural customs, electronic distractions and medications which may be the cause of our sleep difficulties. Learning how to get a good night’s sleep has been shown to influence healthy states of mind and body. Kat Duff reveals many secrets of sleep, including insomnia, recurring dreams, and sleep walking in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Kat Duff, author of The Secret Life of Sleep, writes at the intersection of the natural world and the imagination as it occurs in the life our bodies. Whether she is discussing illness, scars or sleep, she illuminates common, intimate experiences that are often overlooked with a lyricism that makes the profane flare into sacredness. Kat works with traumatized children and adults, and finds solace in the open spaces and traditional cultures that surround her.
teaser: Our modern sleep culture may be the cause of our sleep difficulties. Learning how to get a good night’s sleep has been shown to influence healthy states of mind and body. Kat Duff reveals many secrets of sleep, including insomnia, recurring dreams, and sleep walking.

title: Rebirth of the Mayan Calendar with Carl Calleman
body:
Many people are disappointed that the end of the Mayan Calendar, in 2012, did not bring about the great transformations that were hyped. However, something subtle and spectacular did actually happen. Carl Calleman explains how the Mayan calendar’s long count is having a continued effect on human development, post 2012, and he discusses the impact of receiving periodic downloads from global consciousness in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Carl Calleman received his Ph.D. in Physical Biology and has served as an expert on cancer for the World Health Organization. He has also been dedicated to understanding the ancient Mayan calendar and its underlying mechanisms. Now in 2014, he is drawing from both of these phases in his life to explore the human mind and how it influences and dominates humankind, at least at the present time.
teaser: Many people are disappointed that the end of the Mayan Calendar, in 2012, did not bring about the great transformations that were hyped. However, something subtle and spectacular did actually happen.

title: The Ancient Art of Dowsing with Jean Slatter
body:
Dowsing is as old as time and has proven to be a reliable tool for those who have honed their craft. The secret is not in the tools, but rather learning how to side-step the conscious mind and let the subtle connections within the subconscious mind come through. Jean Slatter explains the history of dowsing and how you can begin using a pendulum to build confidence in your intuition in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Jean Slatter is an accomplished author and inspirational speaker. In 2005 she published her landmark book, Hiring the Heavens, which introduced a unique perspective on connecting with the power of the heavens to fulfill your daily and life goals. Jean is also the founder of the Higher Guidance Life Coach Certification Program & the Creative Mystic program which teaches holistic healing modalities and spiritual philosophies intended for self-growth and assisting others on their paths to wholeness.
teaser: Dowsing is as old as time and has proven to be a reliable tool for those who have honed their craft. Jean Slatter explains the history of dowsing and how you can begin using a pendulum to build confidence in your intuition.

title: Healing in the Quantum Field of Potentials with Joe Dispenza
body:
You are the source of everything good and bad about your life and your health. This may be difficult to believe, but there is a mounting body of evidence indicating that our beliefs and expectations directly affect the conditions of our lives. Dr Joe Dispenza explains how you can open the door to your subconscious mind, and begin creating a new healthy and functional template for your life in this interview with Regina Meredith. He breaks down how to rewire your brainwaves and unlock unlimited abilities step by step. His insights and guidance can be truly life-changing.

Joe Dispenza, D.C., is the best-selling author of Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself, Becoming Supernatural, and Evolve Your Brain., He studied biochemistry at the prestigious Rutgers University. He also holds a Bachelor of Science degree with an emphasis in neuroscience, and earned his Doctor of Chiropractic from Life University in Atlanta, Georgia. He has received postgraduate training and continuing education in neurology, neuroscience, brain function and chemistry, cellular biology, memory formation, and aging and longevity. His latest book is titled, You Are the Placebo: Making Your Mind Matter. Learn how you can change your life and live up to your full potential through thought alone.

Joe Dispenza, D.C., the best-selling author of Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself and Evolve Your Brain, studied biochemistry at Rutgers University. He also holds a Bachelor of Science degree with an emphasis in neuroscience, and earned his Doctor of Chiropractic from Life University in Atlanta, Georgia. He has received postgraduate training and continuing education in neurology, neuroscience, brain function and chemistry, cellular biology, memory formation, and aging and longevity. His latest book is titled, You are the Placebo.
teaser: There is a mounting body of evidence indicating that our beliefs and expectations directly affect the conditions of our lives. Dr Joe Dispenza explains how you can open the door to your subconscious mind and begin creating a new healthy and functional template for your life.

title: Deprogramming Collective Beliefs with Joe Dispenza
body:
What we believe about our health may be just as important as the medical treatment we receive. We are constantly exposed to many channels of mainstream media which are highly effective at lulling our subconscious minds into a suggestible state where we are told what to believe about our health. Dr Joe Dispenza explains how we can break free from the collective programming that affects our states of health and happiness.

Joe Dispenza, D.C., the best-selling author of Breaking the Habit of Being Yourself and Evolve Your Brain, studied biochemistry at Rutgers University. He also holds a Bachelor of Science degree with an emphasis in neuroscience, and earned his Doctor of Chiropractic from Life University in Atlanta, Georgia. He has received postgraduate training and continuing education in neurology, neuroscience, brain function and chemistry, cellular biology, memory formation, and aging and longevity. His latest book is titled, You are the Placebo.
teaser: What we are told to believe about our health may be just as important as the medical treatment we receive. Dr Joe Dispenza explains how we can break free from the collective programming that affects our states of health and happiness.

title: Legacy of the Rebel Angels with Timothy Wyllie
body:
A great hierarchy of ascended beings works to maintain order in a universe ideally suited to support intelligent forms of life. Thousands of years ago, two of these angels broke away from the heavenly order. They were cast down upon the Earth where ancient civilizations became the battlegrounds for their conflicting philosophies. Timothy Wyllie recounts the information he channeled into his books which details the great heavenly divide that continues to affect human evolution on a global scale in this interview with Regina Meredith.

In the late 70s, Timothy began a systematic exploration of out-of-body states which led to open invitation to contact with nonphysical beings that continues to this day. As a musician, Timothy has made several tapes of what he calls Bozon Music, as well as a series of guided visualization and meditation tapes.  Timothy travels frequently to give lectures and seminars and is the author of Revolt of the Rebel Angels: The Future of the Multiverse.
teaser: Thousands of years ago, two angels broke away from the heavenly order and used ancient civilizations as the battlegrounds for their conflicting philosophies. Timothy Wyllie details channeled information on the great heavenly divide that continues to affect human evolution on a global scale.

title: Art Against the Machine with Chris Spheeris
body:
Since early childhood we have been stripped of our ability to freely express the essence of our soul. Our educational system is designed to churn out a population of drones devoid of creativity and perfectly suited to serve a corporate dystopia. Yet our hearts and minds continue to yearn for artistic release. Chris Spheeris explains how we can reengage our connection with Source so that art can once again become a spiritual process in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Chris Spheeris is an Emmy award, platinum and gold record winning composer and recording artist and performer. He is also an open creative channel and workshop facilitator. His music has inspired millions worldwide for decades. His writings and spoken word pieces range in tone from Rumi to George Carlin. Always devoted to being inspired and inspiring others, Chris approaches spirituality from a very down-to-earth, easy for anyone to access and experience perspective.
teaser: With an educational system churning out drones devoid of creativity and perfectly suited to serve a corporate dystopia, our hearts and minds continue to yearn for artistic release. Chris Spheeris explains how we can reengage our connection with Source so that art can once again become a spiritual process.

title: Dental Herbalism with Linda Straub-Bruce
body:
A commonly overlooked aspect of herbalism is oral care. There is no doubt that there is a connection between a healthy mouth and healthy body, and a pharmaceutical solution may not always be the best option.  Linda Straub-Bruce shares some of the best practices for dental care and oral wellbeing using plant-based remedies in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Since her 1989 graduation from the University of Pittsburgh School of Dental Medicine Linda Straub-Bruce has worked with Dr. Hammerlee. Linda is the current Vice-President of the NW PA Dental Hygienists' Association and was the winner of the PennWell Publishing/Cadbury Adams Trident XTra Care Award. She is the co-author of the book, Dental Herbalism: Natural Therapies for the Mouth and presents continuing education lectures to other dental professionals.
teaser: There is no doubt that there is a connection between a healthy mouth and healthy body, and a pharmaceutical solution may not always be the best option.  Linda Straub-Bruce shares some of the best practices for dental care and oral wellbeing using plant based remedies.

title: Valiant Thor’s Divine Design with Craig Campobasso
body:
In 1957 the Pentagon received a visitor from another world named Valiant Thor. Instead of expelling this stranger, the Eisenhower administration accepted him as their guest for over three years. To this day, no one is certain if he was an alien being, an angel in human form or if it was all a big hoax.  Filmmaker Craig Campobasso recounts the events surrounding Valiant Thor’s tenure at the Pentagon and shares details of his divine design for humanity in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Fresh out of high school, Craig Campobasso found himself working behind the scenes on Frank Herbert’s Dune. Dino and Raffaella De Laurentiis, and director David Lynch became his filmmaking mentors. He has been casting movies and TV for more than three decades and was nominated for an Emmy for casting David E. Kelly’s Picket Fences.  Craig directed, wrote & produced Stranger at the Pentagon, from the book by Frank Stranges about Valiant Thor. It just won Best Sci-Fi Short Film at the 2014 Burbank Int'l Film Festival.
teaser: In 1957 the Pentagon received a visitor from another world named Valiant Thor. He stayed as their guest for over three years. Filmmaker Craig Campobasso recounts the events surrounding Valiant Thor’s tenure at the Pentagon and shares details of his divine design for humanity.

title: Freedom from Mass Hypnosis with Nigel Taylor
body:
Our day-to-day reality is really nothing more than a projection of mass cultural hypnosis. It is the source of our growing indifference to the true beauty of our existence and the reason we are increasingly discouraged from discovering our unique essence and living-out our greatest gifts. Nigel Taylor explains how to awaken from this mass illusion, called Maya, in order to become something greater than anything you could ever conceive in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Nigel Taylor is and ambassador of the heart. From the kabalistic traditions of East and West to the Dreamtime of the aboriginal people, Taylor has travelled the world, working and studying with its vast array of cultures and creeds. As a visionary teacher, healer, and author, Nigel has authored over 26 recordings and written a number of books, including, Initiation into Miracles.
teaser: Our day-to-day reality is really nothing more than a projection of mass cultural hypnosis. Nigel Taylor explains how to awaken from this mass illusion, called Maya, in order to become something greater than anything you could ever conceive.

title: The Astrology of Close Encounters with Heather Arielle
body:
Contact with extraterrestrial intelligence may not really be as random as it seems. Certain people may have a predisposition for close encounters of many kinds. Astrologer Heather Arielle examines the charts of her clients who have had extraterrestrial experiences and highlights what they have in common. In addition she explains the transformative roles that Pluto, Uranus and Scorpio have in all of our lives in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Heather Arielle is the founder and CEO of Arielle’s Astrology. She received her M.F.A. from Columbia University where she was a Presidential Scholar. Her readings focus on personal, practical, and powerful ways astrology can improve your daily life. Heather is also a Drama Desk nominated and published playwright; her plays have been performed at numerous theaters across the country, as well as abroad. In addition to her astrological readings and presentations, Heather currently teaches songwriting for Lincoln Center Theater and is a member of the BMI Musical Theater Workshop.
teaser: Contact with extraterrestrial intelligence may not really be as random as it seems. Astrologer Heather Arielle examines the charts of her clients who have had extraterrestrial experiences and highlights what they have in common.

title: Extraterrestrial Nuclear Disarmament with Robert Salas
body:
The sheer destructive power of a nuclear explosion is unfathomable to most people on Earth and unacceptable to those not of this Earth. With the declassification of decades-old reports, numerous accounts of UFOs shutting down nuclear silos are coming to light. Robert Salas details his personal experience of one such incident in 1967, when the night sky was filled with UFOs and all underground nuclear missiles were mysteriously deactivated in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Robert Salas served almost seven years on active duty in the Air Force until resigning in 1971. From 1971-73 he worked for Martin-Marietta Aerospace and Rockwell International on Space Shuttle design proposals. From 1973 until his retirement in 1995, he worked for the Federal Aviation Administration. Robert wrote the book Faded Giant with co-author James Klotz which details his UFO incident while stationed at Malmstrom AFB, Montana.
teaser: The sheer destructive power of a nuclear explosion is unfathomable to most people on Earth and unacceptable to those not of this Earth. Robert Salas details his personal experience of an incident in 1967, when the night sky was filled with UFOs and all underground nuclear missiles were mysteriously deactivated.

title: Extraordinary Encounters with Extraterrestrial Entities
body:
As a historian that specializes in extraterrestrial contact, Richard Dolan has studied the gamut of UFO history from science and military to personal accounts. Along the way, he has amassed a large body of anecdotes concerning extraordinary encounters with extraterrestrial entities. In this interview, Richard Dolan shares a few of these strange stories which may have a lasting and profound effect upon our civilization in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Richard M. Dolan is considered an expert on UFOs and the related government conspiracies. He is a co-author of A.D. After Disclosure: The People’s Guide to Life After Contact, and has published a 1,000-page study about UFOs and the National Security State. It is a a two-volume historical narrative of the national security dimensions of the UFO phenomenon from 1941 to the present.
teaser: As a historian that specializes in extraterrestrial contact, Richard Dolan has studied the gamut of UFO history from science and military to personal accounts. Now, he shares a few of these strange stories which may have a lasting and profound effect upon our civilization.

title: Encounter at Rendlesham Forest with Nick Pope
body:
One of the most profound UFO encounters happened in Rendlesham Forest on December 26, 1980. That night, strange multicolored lights descended from the sky and landed near the twin RAF bases of Bentwaters and Woodbridge. Jim Penniston, who was on guard duty, received a strange message in binary code that was not deciphered until 2010. Nick Pope sets the stage to disclose a major disinformation stratagem as he describes the encounter at Rendlesham Forest in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Nick Pope worked for the British Government for 21 years and spent three years running the Ministry of Defense's UFO project. While undertaking official research and investigation into UFOs, he also looked into alien abductions, crop circles, and reports of ghosts on military bases, as well as evaluating claims from psychics who volunteered their services as 'remote viewers' for the UK's intelligence agencies. He is now recognized as one of the world's leading authorities on UFOs, the unexplained, conspiracy theories and fringe science.
teaser: One of the most profound UFO encounters happened in Rendlesham Forest on December 26, 1980. That night, strange multicolored lights descended from the sky and landed near the twin RAF bases of Bentwaters and Woodbridge. Nick Pope details the events of the encounter at Rendlesham Forest.

title: UFO Disinformation Stratagems with Nick Pope
body:
It is no secret that there are many reliable UFO encounters. What remains unknown is the lengths bureaucracies will go to bury this information. As a ranking member of Britain’s Ministry of Defense, Nick Pope was privy to disinformation stratagems used by government agencies to obscure and suppress any information concerning credible UFO encounters. He now reveals many of the tactics and techniques used to cover-up the events of the Rendlesham Forest encounter in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Nick Pope worked for the British Government for 21 years and spent three years running the Ministry of Defense's UFO project. While undertaking official research and investigation into UFOs, he also looked into alien abductions, crop circles, and reports of ghosts on military bases, as well as evaluating claims from psychics who volunteered their services as 'remote viewers' for the UK's intelligence agencies. He is now recognized as one of the world's leading authorities on UFOs, the unexplained, conspiracy theories and fringe science.
teaser: As a ranking member of Britain’s Ministry of Defense, Nick Pope was privy to disinformation stratagems used to obscure and suppress any information concerning credible UFO encounters. He now reveals many of the tactics and techniques used to cover-up the events of the Rendlesham Forest encounter.

title: Finding Noah's Ark with Aaron Judkins
body:
Technology and ancient lore converge in an attempt to unearth the final resting place of Noah’s ark. Satellite imaging and ground penetrating radar may give credence to anecdotal accounts attesting that the legendary ark rests atop Mt. Ararat. However, all of this data must be directly verified by intrepid explorers willing to endure the harrowing ordeal of summiting a most inhospitable peak. Aaron Judkins recounts the trials and tribulations of his valiant quest in search of Noah’s Ark in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Aaron Judkins, aka Maverick, is an author, explorer and archaeologist with a Ph.D. in Biblical Archeology. His passion is searching for the truth about the mysteries of the past by exposing forbidden archaeology and forbidden history.
teaser: Satellite imaging and ground penetrating radar may give credence to anecdotal accounts attesting that the legendary ark rests atop Mt. Ararat. Aaron Judkins recounts the trials and tribulations of his valiant quest in search of Noah’s Ark.

title: Creating and Perpetuating Empire with Neil Kramer
body:
If there is an unseen power ruling over our society, it does so only because we allow it to hold sway over the course of our lives. Far too few of us realize that true power resides within the masses, not the individuals who have convinced us that they are our rightful rulers. Neil Kramer defines the dominating ethos of Empire and explains how our culture continuously creates and perpetuates it existence in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Neil Kramer is a British philosopher and esotericist whose focus is chiefly on spirituality, metaphysics, mysticism, freedom, and inner development. Neil discusses many of the social, cultural, and political influences in our lives, and what we can do to change them with his unique blend of lucidity, honesty, and insight. He shares his philosophy and practice in writings, recordings, interviews, and lectures, as well as in personal teachings and group workshops.
teaser: If there is an unseen power ruling over our society, it does so only because we allow it to hold sway over the course of our lives. Neil Kramer defines the dominating ethos of Empire and explains how our culture continuously creates and perpetuates it existence.

title: Choosing Sovereignty with Neil Kramer
body:
A ubiquitous lesson that we are taught from a very young age is that we must relinquish our power to authority. What we are not taught is that submitting to Empire has always been a choice and we must be aware that every choice bears a consequence. Neil Kramer reveals how we can disempower Empire by willfully choosing sovereignty and prepare for any potential consequence in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Neil Kramer is a British philosopher and esotericist whose focus is chiefly on spirituality, metaphysics, mysticism, freedom, and inner development. Neil discusses many of the social, cultural, and political influences in our lives, and what we can do to change them with his unique blend of lucidity, honesty, and insight. He shares his philosophy and practice in writings, recordings, interviews, and lectures, as well as in personal teachings and group workshops.
teaser: A ubiquitous lesson that we are taught from a very young age is that we must relinquish our power to authority. Neil Kramer reveals how we can disempower Empire by willfully choosing sovereignty and prepare for any potential consequence.

title: Scanning the Future with Philip K. Dick featuring Anthony Peake
body:
Every so often, a visionary comes into our world with the ability to transform the ways we perceive our reality. One such person is renowned science fiction author Philip K. Dick. He seemed to have the ability to scan the future as many of his predictions of technology and social breakdown have come true. To help us better understand who this prophet was, Anthony Peake illuminates the life, mind and influences of Philip K. Dick in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Anthony Peake was educated at Warwick University and the London School of Economics. He is a member of The Scientific & Medical Network, The International Association of Near-Death Studies and the Society for Psychical Research. In his books, Anthony presents a potentially paradigm-changing hypothesis that suggests that human consciousness survives the physical death of the body by falling out of time. He calls this process, cheating the ferryman.
teaser: Every so often, a visionary comes into our world with the ability to transform the ways we perceive our reality. One such person is renowned science fiction author Philip K. Dick. , Anthony Peake illuminates the life, mind and influences of Philip K. Dick.

title: Pig Business with Lady Worcester
body:
Environmental activism is a most unlikely role for an esteemed actress wedded to British nobility. However, this is the career path that Lady Tracy Worcester has found the most rewarding. Her greatest pursuit is to bring the travesties of corporate pig farming to light. These efforts have culminated in the documentary film, Pig Business. Lady Tracy Worcester calls for consumers to take the pig pledge in order to understand what our purchasing choices really mean in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Lady Tracy Worcester is a model and actress known for her role as Pru in the British detective series, C.A.T.S. Eyes. Since then, she has been active in green politics as the Associate Director of the International Society for Ecology and Culture, serving on the Council of the UK's Soil Association and was a member of the International Forum on Globalization. She produced the documentary, Pig Business, highlighting the environmental and health impact of industrialized pig farming.
teaser: Lady Tracy Worcester environmental activism efforts have culminated in the documentary film, Pig Business. Lady Tracy Worcester calls for consumers to take the pig pledge in order to understand what our purchasing choices really mean.

title: The Phoenix Generation with Kingsley L. Dennis
body:
Children born post 9/11 will be unlike any generation seen before. They live in a continuously changing environment fraught with massive social revolutions spawned by rapid technological advancements. The ways of life that we have grown uncomfortably accustomed to will no longer be adequate. This is not a new age they herald; rather it is a new state of normal. Kingsley Dennis defines the generation just now rising from the ashes of the world we leave behind as the Phoenix Generation in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Kingsley L Dennis, PhD, is a sociologist, researcher, and author of several critically acclaimed books including, The Phoenix Generation, New Consciousness for a New World, Struggle For Your Mind, After the Car, and the celebrated, Dawn of the Akashic Age (with Ervin Laszlo). He previously worked in the Sociology Department at Lancaster University, UK.  Now, he continues to research, write, travel, and live a balanced lifestyle.
teaser: Children born post 9/11 will be unlike any generation seen before. They live in a continuously changing environment fraught with massive social revolutions spawned by rapid technological advancements. Kingsley Dennis defines the generation just now rising from the ashes of the world we leave behind.

title: Sacred Money Archetypes with Tracy Smith
body:
Money is one of our most intimate relationships in life. If you want to better understand what is happening with your life, it is time to take a long honest look at your relationship with money. To better comprehend how we approach money, Tracy Smith has defined the gifts and talents of eight different sacred money archetypes. She details each of them in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Tracy Smith is the co-founder of ACreativeSpace which is a unique and innovative UK-based company that uses bio-resonance technology to help people create lives doing what they love, with people they love, in places they love. She believes that no one is really broken or in need of fixing. Instead, we to fulfill our purpose by learning to create. Through creation we touch our true essence and in that place we access our true power.
teaser: Money is one of our most intimate relationships in life. If you want to better understand what is happening with your life, it is time to take a long honest look at your relationship with money. Tracy Smith has defines the gifts and talents of eight different sacred money archetypes.

title: When Imaginary Friends become Real with Ann Andrews
body:
It is very common for young children to interact with imaginary friends. Generally, this is nothing to worry about. But it becomes a matter of grave concern when these imaginary friends cross into the real world, heralded by paranormal phenomena. Ann Andrews recounts her harrowing experiences as she realized that her child’s imaginary friends were actually extraterrestrial entities in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Ann Andrews, author of abducted: The True Tale of Alien Abduction which documents the strange paranormal experiences that plagued her family before they could accept alien interaction in their lives. She also wrote, Jason, My Indigo Child which chronicles the on-going supernatural activities experienced by the Andrews family and their journey to the point where they accept that they are part of a universal experiment, and that Jason is a multidimensional being, a Star Child.
teaser: It is a matter of grave concern when our children’s imaginary friends cross into the real world, heralded by paranormal phenomena. Ann Andrews recounts her harrowing experiences as she realized that her child’s imaginary friends were actually extraterrestrial entities.

title: Saturn and the Electric Universe with Troy McLachlan
body:
Troy McLachlan describes our planet in a time before time, when it was perpetually illuminated by the light of a much dimmer star. It was a time of abundance and peace.  But cosmic cataclysms rearranged order on earth and in the heavens and this ideal society came to a close. Rising from the ashes of this collapse, an elite class bent on maintaining their abundant lifestyle. Troy McLachlan defines this secret society, which now reigns over our financial institutions, as the Saturn Death Cult in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

First time self-published author, Troy D. McLachlan is a strong proponent of Electric Universe theory and Saturn Theory. His book, The Saturn Death Cult discusses the links between planetary catastrophism, ancient mythology and their connection to ancient and modern occult ritual. He is planning a series of follow-ups to the main premise found in his first and maintains a website where he posts supporting articles on occult ritual, mythology and Saturn Theory cosmology.
teaser: Troy McLachlan describes our planet in a time before time, when people lived in a time of abundance and peace. After this world came crashing down, an elite class rose, bent on maintaining their abundant lifestyle. Troy McLachlan defines this secret society, which now reigns over our financial institutions, as the Saturn Death Cult.

title: Soul Contracts and Relationships with Nicolas David Ngan
body:
Relationships can be the most rewarding aspect of life; they can also be the most devastating. What we need is a way to navigate through the potential pitfalls and rewards of our most important relationships. Strangely enough, your name is the key to understanding your soul contract and how it can conflict or complement another’s. Nicolas David Ngan explains how you can use soul contract work to maximize every relationship in your life in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Nicolas David Ngan has developed a powerful, profoundly transformative body of Soul Contract work at the Center for Conscious Ascension in conjunction with Dr Ahlmeirah Ariel Hallaire. They are regarded as world leaders in this field and have been working at the cutting edge of raising human consciousness for over 20 years. Together they have helped thousands to understand their lives, embody and express their higher consciousness and transmute their emotional separation programming.
teaser: Your name is the key to understanding your soul contract and how it interacts with another’s. Nicolas David Ngan explains how you can use soul contract work to maximize every relationship in your life.

title: The Gene Keys with Richard Rudd
body:
According to Richard Rudd, a massive change is about to take place for humanity at the genetic level. He notes that in essence, our genes are mutating, and human beings are entering the next phase of evolution. To better understand this transition, we must learn the secrets our genetic code holds. All we need are the keys to decipher human design. Rudd explains his 64 Gene Key system and how it can unlock genetic secrets in this interview with Regina Meredith. Discover your Gene Keys profile.

Richard Rudd is a teacher, mystic, and poet who has studied with many great teachers in the East. He holds a master’s degree from Edinburgh University in literature and metaphysics. All of his studies became synthesized in 2002 when he began to receive and write the Gene Keys: Unlocking the Higher Purpose Hidden in Your DNA. It took seven years to write the book and understand its teachings and applications. Today Richard continues to study and teach the life-changing lessons in the Gene Keys book.

(Video Disclaimer: The information contained in the multimedia content posted represents the views and opinions of the original creators of such Video Content and does not necessarily represent the views or opinions of Gaia.)
teaser: A massive change is about to take place for humanity at the genetic level. In essence, we are mutating into the next level of humanity. Richard Rudd explains the intricacies of his 64 Gene Key system that can unlock the secrets underlying who you are and why you are here.

title: Scotland Paranormal with Malcolm Robinson
body:
Scotland is an age-old land full of many strange myths and tales.  Many of these legends have been dismissed as grand folktales of yore. However, the same paranormal phenomena and extraterrestrial encounters that have spawned these ancient accounts continue to this day.  It is time to accept the notion that these tales tell of a reality beyond our own, and that we are not alone. Malcolm Robinson explains the intersection of these other realities by recounting several otherworldly tales from modern-day Scotland in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Malcolm Robinson is a founder member of Strange Phenomena Investigations (SPI), which carries out much active UFO & Paranormal research. Malcolm is famed for his lively and sometimes theatrical presentations on UFO and other inspirational topics. . He is also the author of three books, UFO Case Files of Scotland (Amazing real life alien encounters) Paranormal Case Files of Great Britain (Volume 1) and UFO Case Files of Scotland (Volume 2, The Sightings).
teaser: Much of the paranormal phenomena and extraterrestrial encounters that have spawned ancient accounts continue to this day.  Malcolm Robinson explains the intersection of other realities by recounting several otherworldly tales from modern-day Scotland.

title: Raising a Conscious Child with Nicolas David Ngan
body:
As parents, we try to do our best to bring our children into a world where they can grow and live-up to their full potential. However, the children born today are coming into this world with a higher level of consciousness. Many parents are not prepared to deal with this. Nicolas David Ngan explains how we can use the insights from soul contracts to better understand and nurture our children’s gifts and goals in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Nicolas David Ngan has developed a powerful, profoundly transformative body of Soul Contract work at the Center for Conscious Ascension in conjunction with Dr Ahlmeirah Ariel Hallaire. They are regarded as world leaders in this field and have been working at the cutting edge of raising human consciousness for over 20 years. Together they have helped thousands to understand their lives, embody and express their higher consciousness and transmute their emotional separation programming.
teaser: Many children born today are coming into this world with a higher level of consciousness. Nicolas David Ngan explains how we can use the insights from soul contracts to better understand and nurture our children’s gifts and goals.

title: The Science of Immortality with Dr. Bill Andrews and Dr. Terry Grossman
body:
Death may be a harsh fact of life, but it is a necessary part of evolution. If humanity has reached the pinnacle of its biological evolution, then have we outgrown the need to die? A new era of scientific research is providing insight on how we can guide our own evolution in order to reverse aging and to make death obsolete. Dr. Bill Andrews and Dr. Terry Grossman are two such scientists, and they have come to explain the science of immortality in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

The Immortalists, now available on Gaia.

In Dr. Bill Andrews’ 32 year biotech career, he has focused on finding ways to extend the human lifespan and health-span through telomere maintenance. 

Dr. Terry Grossman, author of The Baby Boomers' Guide to Living Forever, has also co-authored two books with Ray Kurzweil on the subject of longevity.
teaser: A new era of scientific research is providing insight on how we can guide our own evolution in order to reverse aging and to make death obsolete. Dr. Bill Andrews and Dr. Terry Grossman are two such scientists, and they have come to explain the science of immortality.
cast: Dr. Bill Andrews, Dr. Terry Grossman

title: Ask THEO Live: The Soul Family with Sheila and Marcus Gillette
body:
Lifetime after lifetime we encounter the same collection of souls. This group repeatedly returns to support each other through the various lessons they have agreed to experience together.  Despite the benefits of this soul family, many of us experience great difficulties with our birth families that may or may not be a part of our lessons. Sheila Gillette channels THEO who explains reincarnation and the soul family before answering questions from a live studio audience in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Sheila Gillette is the world renowned spiritual medium and channel for the twelve archangels collectively known as Theo. She is the co-author of, The Soul Truth: A Guide to Inner Peace and author of, The Fifth Dimension: Channels to a New Reality. She and her husband Marcus are the co-hosts of the weekly internet radio show “Ask Theo Live”, and she and Theo are prominently mentioned in the Abraham-Hicks publications as the mentors for Esther Hicks to begin channeling Abraham. Theo speaks through Sheila to guide humanity during this unprecedented shift to a higher state of consciousness.
teaser: Lifetime after lifetime we encounter the same collection of souls which repeatedly returns to support each other through their various lessons together. Sheila Gillette channels THEO who explains reincarnation and the soul family before answering questions from a live studio audience.

title: The Extraordinary Life of Jerry Wills
body:
Jerry Wills began his extraordinary life as a baby abandoned near a military base. As he grew, he discovered healing abilities that would attract the attention of organized religion and otherworldly beings. It took a near-fatal accident, complete with a near-death experience and miraculous healing, to finally set him on the path to fulfilling his destiny. Jerry Wills recounts the events from his life that shaped him into the transformational energy healer that he is today in this interview with Regina Meredith.
As a child, Jerry Wills was aware of energy and how it moved through all things. Like most children, he had to learn to keep his special gifts to himself. That is until a near-death experience in 1981 showed him how he was wasting his life and that he was being given a second chance. It took another 20 years for his abilities to be recognized and accepted. Now, people seek him out as he offers healing, classes, lectures, and seeks to help others around the world. Explore the unbelievable life of one of the most renowned intuitive healers today. 
As a child, Jerry Wills was aware of energy and how it moved through all things. Like most children, he had to learn to keep his unique gifts to himself. That is until a near death experience in 1981 showed him how he was wasting his life and that he was being given a second chance. It took another 20 years for his abilities to be recognized and accepted. Now, people seek him out as he offers healing, classes, lectures and seeks to help others around the world.
teaser: Jerry Wills began his extraordinary life as a baby abandoned near a military base. As he grew, he discovered healing and intuitive abilities that would eventually set him upon the path to fulfill his destiny as the transformational healer that he is today.

title: It’s not the Economy, Stupid with Andrew Hoffman
body:
With the decline in oil prices, many people are cheering. However, we are still facing the biggest deficit in history. News media continues to report that the economy is in recovery, yet many people are still struggling just to survive. Why are food prices still going up and what’s going on with interest rates? “It’s not the economy, stupid.” Andrew Hoffman returns to recap recent economic events and to set our expectations for what is to come in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Andrew ("Andy") Hoffman, CFA joined Miles Franklin as Marketing Director in October 2011. For a decade, he was a U.S.-based buy-side and sell-side analyst, most notably as an II-ranked oil service analyst at Salomon Smith Barney from 1999 through 2005. Since 2002, his focus has been entirely on Precious Metals, and since 2006 has written free missives regarding gold, silver, and macroeconomics. Prior to joining the company, he spent five years working as an Investor Relations officer or consultant to numerous junior mining companies.
teaser: News media continues to report that the economy is in recovery, yet many people are still struggling just to survive. Why are food prices still going up and what’s going on with interest rates? “It’s not the economy, stupid.”

title: The Real Story behind The Conjuring with Andrea Perron
body:
Sometimes, destiny can take us in a direction that we could never have expected. Such is the case with the Perron family in 1970 when they felt it was their destiny to buy their dream home - a colonial farm on 200 acres. From the moment they moved in, strange things began to happen. Andrea Perron recounts the frightening real-life events that became the basis of the Hollywood movie, The Conjuring, in this interview with Regina Meredith.

At age twelve, Andrea Perron’s family moved into a house which began an incredible odyssey; a supernatural excursion through dimensions of time and space. She and her family came to understand that there is something beyond mortal existence.  In 2007 she began writing the manuscript which has now evolved into the House of Darkness House of Light trilogy. The time has come to disclose these secrets and the world is ready to receive them.
teaser: From the moment the Perron family moved into their dream home, strange things began to happen. Andrea Perron recounts the frightening real-life events that became the basis of the Hollywood movie, The Conjuring.

title: Ask THEO Live: Discovering your Divine Essence with Sheila and Marcus Gillette
body:
Each of us has fragmented parts of our soul that hold onto limiting beliefs and old paradigms that no longer work. However, hidden in the heart of our being is a divine-spark that can release these fractures and bring us into alignment with the divine. THEO, as channeled by Sheila Gillette, reveals how you can rediscover and integrate your divine essence into the wholeness of your being. Then a live studio audience has many questions to ask of THEO in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Sheila Gillette is the world renowned spiritual medium and channel for the twelve archangels collectively known as Theo. She is the co-author of, The Soul Truth: A Guide to Inner Peace and author of, The Fifth Dimension: Channels to a New Reality. She and her husband Marcus are the co-hosts of the weekly internet radio show “Ask Theo Live”, and she and Theo are prominently mentioned in the Abraham-Hicks publications as the mentors for Esther Hicks to begin channeling Abraham. Theo speaks through Sheila to guide humanity during this unprecedented shift to a higher state of consciousness.
teaser: Hidden in the heart of our being is a divine-spark that can release these fractures and bring us into alignment with the divine. THEO, as channeled by Sheila Gillette, reveals how you can rediscover and integrate your divine essence into the wholeness of your being.

title: Café at the End of the Universe with Jerry Wills
body:
We may be remiss to discount humanity as the only intelligent species on Earth. It took a trip to the café at the end of the universe for Jerry Wills to realize that we are not alone. His visits gave him the insight to recognize various otherworldly beings, their devious designs for humanity and how to avert them. Jerry Wills explains how awakening the divine within is the only way to break free from centuries of control by off-world civilizations in this interview with Regina Meredith.

As a child, Jerry Wills was aware of energy and how it moved through all things. Like most children, he had to learn to keep his unique gifts to himself. That is until a near death experience in 1981 showed him how he was wasting his life and that he was being given a second chance. It took another 20 years for his abilities to be recognized and accepted. Now, people seek him out as he offers healing, classes, lectures and seeks to help others around the world.
teaser: It took a trip to the café at the end of the universe for Jerry Wills to realize that we are not alone. His visits gave him the insight to recognize various otherworldly beings, their devious designs for humanity and how to avert them.

title: Unlocking the Secrets of Alchemy with Steven Ross
body:
Alchemy is a term that has been grossly misused and misunderstood in modern times. However, once upon a time, alchemists and philosophers where highly regarded as keepers of great wisdom. This wisdom would be lost if not for those who devote their life to discovering how to unlock universal secrets. Steven Ross explores the teachings of philosophers and alchemists of old to reveal the secret to living an alchemical life in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Steven A. Ross, PhD is co-founder and CEO of the World Research Foundation. For nearly 40 years he has researched and lectured around the world. He has delivered over 200 lectures making presentations to various worldwide government agencies, hospital networks, and has been interviewed on more than 150 radio programs and 15 regional and national television programs. He has been an expert witness for the City of Los Angeles and consulted for the insurance industry.
teaser: Once upon a time, alchemists and philosophers where highly regarded as keepers of great wisdom. This wisdom could be lost if not for those devoting their life to preserving their secrets. Steven Ross explores the teachings of philosophers and alchemists of old to reveal the secret to living an alchemical life.

title: Transhumanism on Urantia with Byron Belitsos
body:
From the emergence of the first conscious humans to our imminent technological transcendence, what it means to be human has always been in flux. But we must not forget about our souls and what it means to be human.  Byron Belitsos explains transhumanism from the Urantia perspective by highlighting the history and future of human evolution in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Byron Belitsos is the award-winning founder and CEO of Origin Press. He has been a student of The Urantia Book for nearly four decades, coauthoring five books on its teachings including his most recent title, Healing a Broken World. In addition, he has brought the teachings of the Urantia Revelation to a worldwide audience through his many writings and speaking engagements.
teaser: From the emergence of the first conscious humans to our imminent technological transcendence, what it means to be human has always been in flux. Byron Belitsos explains transhumanism from the Urantia perspective by highlighting the history and future of human evolution.

title: Beyond The Conjuring with Andrea Perron
body:
As life continued for the Perron family, the persistence of paranormal activity forced them to come to terms with the multi-dimensional aspect of their reality. It also taught them how to embrace the light and walk away from the darkness. In her second interview with Regina Meredith, Andrea Perron shares what she learned from the many encounters with the multi-dimensional entities that frequented her childhood home.

In her first interview, Andrea Perron recounts the frightening real-life events that became the basis of the Hollywood movie, The Conjuring. 

At age twelve, Andrea Perron’s family moved into a house which began an incredible odyssey; a supernatural excursion through dimensions of time and space. She and her family came to understand that there is something beyond mortal existence.  In 2007 she began writing the manuscript which has now evolved into the House of Darkness House of Light trilogy. The time has come to disclose these secrets and the world is ready to receive them.
teaser: As life continued for the Perron family, the persistence of paranormal activity forced them to come to terms with the multi-dimensional aspect of their reality. In her second interview with Regina Meredith, Andrea Perron shares what she learned from her many encounters with multi-dimensional entities.

title: Wisdom from the Archetypes with Steven Ross
body:
For the first time in human history, each of us has instant access to an immense treasure trove of information. However, as a society, we have lost the capacity for wisdom. Caution is warranted here, as a rampant lack of wisdom has repeatedly led to the downfall of many glorious civilizations. Steven Ross explains how we can reclaim our wisdom by opening our minds to become channels that receive higher teachings from archetypes in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Steven A. Ross, PhD is co-founder and CEO of the World Research Foundation. For nearly 40 years he has researched and lectured around the world. He has delivered over 200 lectures making presentations to various worldwide government agencies, hospital networks, and has been interviewed on more than 150 radio programs and 15 regional and national television programs. He has been an expert witness for the City of Los Angeles and consulted for the insurance industry.
teaser: For the first time in human history, each of us has instant access to an immense treasure trove of information. However, as a society, we have lost the capacity for wisdom. Steven Ross explains how we can reclaim our wisdom by opening our minds to become channels that receive higher teachings from archetypes.

title: Dystopian Legacy of Atlantis with Byron Belitsos
body:
According to the Urantia Book, the fabled land of Atlantis was the Garden of Eden. However, it was not quite the utopia that we were led to believe. It was the locus for two off-planet factions struggling to be the sole progenitors of advanced human civilization. Byron Belitsos recounts the Urantia Book’s telling of the rise and fall of Atlantis/ Eden and the ongoing battle to control human evolution in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Byron Belitsos is the award-winning founder and CEO of Origin Press. He has been a student of The Urantia Book for nearly four decades, co-authoring five books on its teachings including his most recent title, Healing a Broken World. In addition, he has brought the teachings of the Urantia Revelation to a worldwide audience through his many writings and speaking engagements.
teaser: According to the Urantia Book, the fabled land of Atlantis was the locus for two off-planet factions struggling to be the sole progenitors of advanced human civilization. Byron Belitsos recounts the Urantia Book’s telling of the rise and fall of Atlantis/ Eden and the ongoing battle to control human evolution.

title: Special with Randall Carlson - Sacred Geometry and the Secrets of Sacred Architecture
body:
Sacred architecture has always served as a means of conveying symbolic information, but its secrets were decipherable only to the few who were initiated into the sacred mysteries. The greatest secret they kept was that the source of these mysteries are all around us and readily available to anyone who seeks them. Randall Carlson reveals that the secret ratios and patterns found in the cosmos and throughout nature are encoded within sacred architecture in this special interview with Regina Meredith.

Part Two of this Interview can be found here.

Randall Carlson is a master builder and architectural designer, teacher, geometrician, geomythologist, geological explorer and renegade scholar. With his four decades of study, research and exploration into the interface between ancient mysteries and modern science, he is uniquely qualified to interpret the hidden meaning of the great masterpieces of mystical architecture, as well as esoteric and occult ritual and symbolism. His aspiration is to affect a revival of lost knowledge towards the goal of creating the new world based upon universal principles of harmony, freedom, and spiritual evolution.
teaser: Sacred architecture has always served as a means of conveying symbolic information, but its secrets were decipherable only to a select few. Randall Carlson reveals the secret ratios and patterns found in the cosmos and throughout nature which are encoded within sacred architecture.

title: Special with Randall Carlson - Sacred Geometry and the Cosmic Cycles of Catastrophes
body:
We have all been taught that geological activity occurs slowly over long periods of time, punctuated by moments of catastrophic upheaval. What we must understand, is that cosmic order is realized through patterns found in nature as well as the cyclical timing of major geological events. This understanding may be the basis for apocalyptic prophecy. Randall Carlson explains the connection between catastrophic events and cosmological cycles, such as the precession of the equinox, from the perspective of sacred geometry in this special interview with Regina Meredith.

Part One of this interview can be found here.

Randall Carlson is a master builder and architectural designer, teacher, geometrician, geomythologist, geological explorer and renegade scholar. With his four decades of study, research and exploration into the interface between ancient mysteries and modern science, he is uniquely qualified to interpret the hidden meaning of the great masterpieces of mystical architecture, as well as esoteric and occult ritual and symbolism. His aspiration is to affect a revival of lost knowledge towards the goal of creating the new world based upon universal principles of harmony, freedom, and spiritual evolution.
teaser: Cosmic order is realized through patterns found in nature as well as the cyclical timing of major geological events. Randall Carlson explains the connection between catastrophic events and cosmological cycles, such as the precession of the equinox, from the perspective of sacred geometry.

title: Simplicity Parenting with Kim John Payne
body:
Could it be true that our children are so broken that we need to medicate them into compliance with societal expectations? Or has our society become so complex, that our children have become overwhelmed by the many demands placed upon them? Kim John Payne suggests returning simplicity to our children’s lives to reengage their sense of security and creativity in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Kim John Payne, M.ED, is the author of the bestselling books, Simplicity Parenting and The Soul of Discipline. He has been a school counselor, adult educator, consultant, researcher, educator and a private family counselor for 27 years. In each role, he has helped children, adolescents and families explore issues such as social difficulties with siblings and classmates, attention and behavioral issues at home and school, emotional issues such as defiance, aggression, addiction and self-esteem and the vital role living a balanced and simple life brings.
teaser: Has our society become so complex, that our children have become overwhelmed by the many demands placed upon them? Kim John Payne suggests returning simplicity to our children’s lives to reengage their sense of security and creativity.

title: Lessons from The Conjuring with Andrea Perron
body:
Despite the traumatic paranormal events of the Perron’s home, it was moving away that finally fractured the family. But this is not the end of the story. They learned that humanity is beginning to shift into a higher dimensional state where the paranormal will become the normal. In her third interview with Regina Meredith, Andrea Perron explains that her experiences taught her how we can prepare for the coming paradigm shift. 

In her second interview, Andrea Perron shares what she learned from the many encounters with the multi-dimensional entities that frequented her childhood home.

At age twelve, Angrea Perron’s family moved into a house which began an incredible odyssey; a supernatural excursion through dimensions of time and space. She and her family came to understand that there is something beyond mortal existence.  In 2007 she began writing the manuscript which has now evolved into the House of Darkness House of Light trilogy. The time has come to disclose these secrets and the world is ready to receive them.
teaser: Despite the traumatic paranormal events of the Perron’s home, they learned that humanity is beginning to shift into a higher dimensional state where the paranormal will become the normal.  Andrea Perron explains that her experiences taught her how we can prepare for the coming paradigm shift.

title: The Lost Age of Saturn with David Talbott
body:
Long ago, in a time now forgotten, humanity thrived during a golden age of peace, harmony and abundance as the glowing visage of Saturn perpetually loomed high above…and all good things come to an end.
