body:
Some people have had an open and alive connection to angelic beings since the day they were born. Such is the life of Belinda Womack who began working with angels at a very young age. Since then, she has refined her work with a committee of twelve angels who help people realize that we create our own reality and that there is a fast way to evolve and transform our consciousness. This involves helping the ego recognize that it is not, and never has been, separate from oneness. Join her in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

Belinda Womack met her angels at birth. They have always made her feel safe and happy when she remembered to ask for their protection. As an adult she studied to become a cell biologist and I used her science trained brain for cancer research. One morning, a surprise visit from the Archangel Gabriel changed her career and life completely. It was time for her to work with Angels in a way she had never dreamed possible.

Multiple sources tell us that a higher frequency of energy has come to our planet which is actively accelerating conscious evolution. Initially it will seem disruptive, if not destructive. But the shift we are experiencing will move us to an even higher form of consciousness, one the Zs call Golden Consciousness.

During that time, he had nearly daily conversations with this collective which built his skills as a channeler and intuitive. Quite expectantly, this became his full time vocation in 2007. He now leads seminars and retreats all over the world and has worked with over 1,700 people.

body:
The collapse of the economy has hurt communities all across the world with little hope of recovery. This is because we have been led to believe that these financial systems are extraordinarily complex and beyond the understanding of the common person. Citizen Zeus says that it has always been a fairly simple con game and proves it by enumerating the ten financial practices which have precipitated the problems in our economies. He also reveals the five courageous steps we can take to transform the economy and re-create the good life once again in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Zeus is a learning consultant and professional developer who transforms the ability of individuals and companies to learn how they learn. His customized coaching multiplies the value of current organization and training, accelerates performance, sparks useful conceptual thinking, identifies gaps, applies strengths, and improves communication, collaboration, and time effectiveness.

body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Chetan Parkyn introduces us to the principles and applications of Human Design, a comprehensive divination system that can help you discover the person you were meant to be. Many people devote their entire lives searching for their destiny, only to find themselves meandering endlessly without direction. Over the ages, many tools have given guidance into such matters, but lacked the depth truly needed. Broaching the 21st century, a new tool offering powerful insights into the blueprint for one’s life has emerged. 

An entrepreneur’s son by upbringing and an engineer by training, Chetan Parkyn has fully explored both the mystical and the technological worlds. He has spent the past 23 years mastering Human Design. In 2000, he felt called to make the system accessible to a far wider audience so he began offering trainings and seminars along with his life-partner, Carola Eastwood. In 2009 Chetan wrote the first major book on Human Design.

title: Marilyn Monroe Declassified with Paul Davids
body:
On the silver screen, Marilyn Monroe stunned audience like no one before her. In the pages of the tabloids, word of her mysterious death left everyone breathless. Paul Davids in his documentary, Marilyn Monroe Declassified, explores details underlying the official story of Marilyn Monroe’s death which suggest a conspiracy involving multiple government agencies from the CIA to the secret space programs. Join him in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Filmmaker and producer Paul Davids' films are known for controversy, beginning with Roswell. title: Give Back the Pain of your Past with Robert Bleck
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Robert Bleck discusses a system he developed, called Source Completion Therapy, which helps his clients to heal deep emotional wounds from their past. He explains that we cannot really be open to all the beauty and magic in our lives until we rid ourselves of the emotional toxins obscuring such wonders. To do that, we must discover the origin of our pains, relive and confront the sources so that we are no longer held hostage by our personal histories. 


Robert T. Bleck, creator of Source Completion Therapy, received his Ph.D. from the University of Florida in 1977. Dr. Bleck is a licensed Mental Health Counselor, certified Clinical Mental Health Counselor and National Certified Counselor. A former professor at a number of universities, he is currently a psychotherapist in private practice. As a writer and an innovator in the field, he has appeared on television and radio shows throughout the country.

Potential Trigger Warning - some of the matters discussed in this interview are of a sensitive nature concerning traumatic events.

body:
Your hand may hold the secrets which can reveal who you really are. In this interview with Regina Meredith, Ellen Goldberg explains various features on the hand that can help you discern which of seven archetypes holds greatest sway over your personality. Palm reading is a classical method for self-discovery which has roots that can be traced to the dawn of time. Modern science may even be able to substantiate what the hand readers’ claim, as there is a direct connection between the formation of our brains and the shape of our hands. 

Psychotherapist and mystic, Ellen Goldberg has been a long time student of both Eastern and Western spiritual philosophies, including Buddhism, the Tao, Kabbalah, the Western Hermetic tradition, spiritual alchemy, nature, mindfulness meditation, and the mystic sciences of palmistry, tarot and astrology. She has combined these studies with years of psychotherapy, meditation, psychic development and contemplation. She is also the co-author of book, The Art and Science of Hand Reading.

title: Unexplained Phenomena and the Sun with Jack Cary
body:
The peculiar behavior of the sun has not gone unnoticed by NASA scientists and paranormal investigators, alike. This activity has given rise to unusually high amounts of electromagnetic energy throughout our solar system and on Earth. Thus, reports of paranormal activity, sightings of strange creatures and mysterious disappearances are on the rise. Jack Cary has been compiling reports of these anomalous phenomena and reveals the intelligence he has collected surrounding these strange incidents in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Jack Cary is the founder and current director at Paranormal Intelligence Agency and Researcher at Crypto Four Corners. In the past, he has received a Top Secret S.C.I. security clearance, serving as an encrypted communications specialist on nuclear submarines. Plus he is a published author of non-fiction works and poetry, and has written the forwards for many books
teaser: Peculiar solar activity has given rise to unusually high amounts of electromagnetic energy throughout our solar system and on Earth. Thus, reports of paranormal activity, sightings of strange creatures and mysterious disappearances are on the rise.

title: Healing Power of Song with Barry Goldstein
body:
The secret language of the heart is music. In this interview with Regina Meredith, Barry Goldstein explains that music can form a field of energy which becomes a bridge to healing and personal transformation. His work helps bring people to a sacred place where they can discover and listen to their own sacred hearts. He reveals his secret recipe of musical composition which combines intention, emotion and harmonics in every song. 

Barry Goldstein’s passion is utilizing music, or as he calls it, The Universal Language of Love, as a vehicle for transformation. Barry’s music is being used in hospitals, hospices, cancer centers, and medical practices. As a keynote speaker for medical conferences, he is also a sought-after speaker for New Thought conferences presenting cutting edge research on how music is being utilized for medical conditions.
teaser: Barry Goldstein explains that music can form a field of energy which becomes a bridge to healing and personal transformation. His work helps bring people to a sacred place where they can discover and listen to their own sacred hearts.

title: Merging with Nature with Tamarack Song
body:
As human beings, we have grown comfortable and complacent in a civilization separated from the natural world that gave rise to our species. Now, there is a way for you to discover how to get back to the roots of your natural being. Tamarack Song explains that all it takes is the willingness to relearn the language of the natural world, which is still deeply ingrained within each of us, and reconnect to the greater natural world surrounding ours in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Tamarack Song, author of Becoming Nature: Learning the Language of Wild Animals and Plants, has been a student of the Old Way since his youth. He has apprenticed with Elders who still practice their traditional ways and he lived the Native Way in the wilderness for many turns of the seasons. Thus he has gained the teachings and awareness to prepare him for the role of guide. He does not call himself a teacher; if anything he feels himself to be a guide to the Real Teacher.
teaser: As human beings, we have grown comfortable and complacent in a civilization separated from the natural world that gave rise to our species. Now, there is a way for you to discover how to get back to the roots of your natural being and relearn the language of the natural world.

title: Technological vs. Spiritual Transhumanism with William Henry
body:
The Skingularity is near. This is the clarion call from William Henry who is monitoring the push toward transhumanism. For centuries humanity has embraced technology for improving the conditions of human life and we are approaching a time where the merger of flesh with computers will become inevitable. But are we embracing a technological transformation to the detriment of spiritual ascension? He explains that there are spiritual principles we can employ to ensure the attainment of a body of light which will free us from regimes of control in this interview with Regina Meredith. 

William Henry is an investigative mythologist who focuses on ancient mythology and neo-archeology. As the host of the Gaia TV series "The Awakened Soul: The Lost Science of Ascension," Henry is an internationally recognized authority on human spiritual potential, transformation, and ascension. For over 25 years, William Henry has pursued the startling, but undeniable fact, that there is a seamless tradition of arcane symbolism throughout history and across widely diverse cultures.
teaser: For centuries humanity has embraced technology for improving the conditions of human life and we are approaching a time where the merger of flesh with computers will become inevitable. But are we embracing a technological transformation to the detriment of spiritual ascension?

title: Connecting with Self with Carrie L'Esperance
body: The deepest exploration that one can undertake is the journey to connect with one’s own soul force. This is the work of Carrie L’Esperance, who helps people learn how to connect their intellect with the deeper wisdom of the soul. This transpersonal relationship cultivates a higher frequency throughout one’s life where everything begins to resonate with the highest frequencies of the soul. She shares how you can make this connection to self a part of your conscious practice in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: The deepest exploration that one can undertake is the journey to connect with one’s own soul force. This is the work of Carrie L’Esperance, who helps people learn how to connect their intellect with the deeper wisdom of the soul.

body: Coming out of the 2016 elections, many people feel lambasted, not only by the election results, but by the lingering effects of the candidates’ massive media campaigns. Adam Trombly explains how commercials are used to entrain our brains to feel certain emotions toward products and political candidates. But the entrainment process does not stop there, as media is part of a larger mind-control operation which includes fluoride, chemtrails and HAARP to subdue the population. Fortunately, there are ways to counteract these effects and take back your own entrainment as explained in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: Adam Trombly explains how commercials are used to entrain our brains to feel certain emotions toward products and political candidates. But the entrainment process does not stop there, as media is only one part of a larger mind-control operation.

In this interview with Regina Meredith, Scott Stevens returns to dig even deeper into the environmental and economic effects of chemtrails. He has uncovered a vast system of deception and disinformation which obscures the hidden agendas of the powerful players involved. By understanding what really motivates these people, we can institute a solution to defunding chemtrails: cryptocurrency.
teaser: Follow the money and you will find who is behind chemtrails and know why they are doing it. Scott Stevens returns to dig even deeper into the environmental and economic effects of chemtrails.

title: Quantum Jumps with Cynthia Larson
body: Try to imagine parallel streams of reality in which infinite possibilities are all played out at once. What if you could jump between these realities until you find the optimal one? This is the premise of Cynthia Larson’s work in which a person learns how to make a quantum jump from one time stream into another. There is actual science behind this notion which supports the techniques she shares for changing the reality you live in as discussed in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: Try to imagine parallel streams of reality in which infinite possibilities are all played out at once. What if you could jump between these realities until you find the optimal one? This is the premise of Cynthia Larson’s work she calls Quantum Jumping.

title: Ecstatic Trance for Conscious Evolution with Barbara Hand Clow
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Barbara Hand Clow returns to explain how we can use ecstatic trance to initiate a new phase of conscious evolution in order to live in a time-free transparent world. Throughout the millennia of human existence, our planet has endured one catastrophe after another. With each passing calamity, human consciousness has learned to adapted to the onset of a new era. As Earth begins a new phase of change, it is vital that we learn to merge our minds with the intelligence of nature. This wisdom can be gained through ecstatic trance postures used by many indigenous cultures throughout the world.
teaser: Barbara Hand Clow returns to explain how we can use ecstatic trance to initiate a new phase of conscious evolution in order to live in a time-free transparent world.  As Earth begins a new phase of change, it is vital that we learn to merge our minds with the intelligence of nature.

title: The Annunaki: Keepers of the 4th Dimension with Barbara Hand Clow
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Barbara Hand Clow takes us deep into the 4th dimension to reveal the beings which reside within this realm and how they have long exerted control over humanity. Ancient Sumerians recorded the exploits of an advanced civilization which came to Earth and altered the course of human history. We call them the Annunaki. To some, these were physical beings with advanced technology heralding from a not-so-distant planet. Others have encountered them as psychic beings who are the keepers of a psychological archetypal realm surrounding and influencing our own reality. It is a realm which is becoming increasingly open to us, as we actively engage our conscious evolution.
teaser: Barbara Hand Clow takes us deep into the 4th dimension to reveal the beings which reside within this realm and how they have long exerted control over humanity, the Annunaki. The 4th Dimension is a realm which is becoming increasingly open to us, as we actively engage our conscious evolution.

title: Awakening Krishna Consciousness with Joshua Greene
body: In 1965, Swami Prabhupada set sail from India to fulfill a mission given to him by his guru: to bring the teachings of Krishna consciousness to the west. His timing could not have been better as the countercultural revolution in this strange land embraced him, and his teachings became a global spiritual movement. Joshua Greene became an active part of this movement in 1969, and now he shares a firsthand perspective of his Swami’s journey to awaken the world with Krishna Consciousness in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: In 1965, Swami Prabhupada set sail from India to fulfill a mission given to him by his guru: to bring the teachings of Krishna consciousness to the west. His timing could not have been better as the countercultural revolution in this strange land embraced him, and his teachings went global.

title: A Naturopathic Approach to Cancer with Donese Worden
body: Many people have given up faith in the medical industry due to ineffective treatments, especially when it comes to cancer. But, science's understanding of cancer has turned a corner and many people are finding new benefits through naturopathic and holistic approaches to supporting the body’s natural defenses against this disease. Donese Warden, a naturopathic physician, explains the metabolic theory of cancer and how new research into the cause and effects of cancer is leading to new pathways of treatment in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: Many people have given up faith in the medical industry due to ineffective treatments, especially when it comes to cancer. But, science's understanding of cancer has turned a corner and many people are finding new benefits through naturopathic and holistic approaches.

title: Technological Advances in Energy Medicine with Donese Worden
body: Soon, your doctor may be using energy medicine technology to treat a plethora of illnesses. Modern science has been able to confirm that there is an electromagnetic field around the body which can be detected and measured. Plus, there is an additional subtle layer of energy which can affect a person’s health and wellbeing. Despite these irrefutable discoveries, mainstream medicine is still struggling to accept the legitimacy of energy medicine. In this interview with Regina Meredith, Donese Worden explains the current scientific understanding of energy medicine, the challenges energy practitioners face, and she introduces us to some of the technology emerging in response to the latest discoveries.
teaser: Donese Worden explains the current scientific understanding of energy medicine, the challenges energy practitioners face, and she introduces us to some of the technology emerging in response to the latest discoveries.

title: Ketogenic Diet: Starving Cancer by Feeding the Body with Dominic D'Agostino
body: What if there was a way to starve cancer cells of the nutrients they need to survive and improve overall health of the body? In this interview with Regina Meredith, Dominic D’Agostino discusses the many benefits of the Ketogenic Diet, beyond helping people with cancer. These benefits include dramatic weight loss and the reduction of inflammation. This in-depth examination of the Ketogenic diet includes what ketones are, how our body produces them and how we can utilize them as a high octane source of energy.
teaser: What if there was a way to starve cancer cells of the nutrients they need to survive and improve overall health of the body? Dominic D’Agostino discusses the many benefits of the Ketogenic Diet, beyond helping people with cancer.

body: According to Glenn Streeter, our overall health has less to do with chemistry and more to do with voltage. We live in a society filled with poisons and technology which actively drains the voltage from our bodies. But, we also live in a world full of solutions to almost every problem we face. There are things that we can do to retain and bolster the charge within our bodies. Discover the exercises, foods and devices which will help us, once again, learn how to create high voltage health in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: We live in a society filled with poisons and technology which actively drains the voltage from our bodies. But, we also live in a world full of solutions to almost every problem we face. Discover the exercises, foods and devices which will help us, once again, learn how to create high voltage health.

body: A financial coup is currently underway in Washington as the media entrainment machine churns, leaving many people feeling hopeless amid threats of another impending major financial crisis. However, Catherine Austin Fitts explains in this interview with Regina Meredith that big changes are in the wind. With big players divesting from major projects, many people are ready to give up on our economy. For the first time, in a long time, the majority of the populace is poised to put faith in our little dollars and get back into the business of inventing our future.
teaser: A financial coup is currently underway in Washington as the media entrainment machine churns, leaving many people feeling hopeless amid threats of another impending major financial crisis. However, Catherine Austin Fitts explains that big changes are in the wind.

body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Andrea Perron discusses her most recent book, co-written with George R. Lopez, In a Flicker. It is a murder mystery based upon Jack the Ripper which ties together the enigma of the Great Pyramids and the workings of CERN. She explains that this book is not for the faint hearted as it hits to the depths of the darkness within each of us during the struggle to find healing in the light.
teaser: Andrea Perron discusses her most recent book, In a Flicker. It is a murder mystery based upon Jack the Ripper which ties together the mystery of the Great Pyramids and the workings of CERN.

title: George Adamski: The Gentleman Contactee with Glenn Steckling
body: Beginning in the late 1940s, benevolent extraterrestrial beings reached out to a humble human being, George Adamski, whom they trusted to relay their teachings to the world. Throughout the course of his life, the contacts continued and George diligently documented every encounter. Today, Glenn Steckling bears the mantle of keeper of the Adamski archive and he has come to reveal what the archive holds, including the science of interplanetary travel and anomalies on the lunar surface. Join him in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: Throughout the course of his life, George Adamski diligently documented every encounter he had with aliens. Glenn Steckling bears the mantle of keeper of the Adamski archive and he has come to reveal what the archive holds, including the science of interplanetary travel and anomalies on the lunar surface.

title: From Folklore to Fact: Bigfoot & Dog Man with Jack Cary
body:
There is indeed a biological basis for Bigfoot as recently recovered DNA evidence is about to settle the long lingering debate. That is, according to the findings of Jack Cary, who has been instrumental in ongoing investigations into the Bigfoot phenomena. Armed with a plethora of personal sightings and anecdotal accounts, he has been hot on the trail of cryptozoological wonders like Bigfoot and Dog Man. The final pieces of these puzzles may finally be in place as his team believes that they have accumulated the evidence necessary to validate the human lineage of Bigfoot and legitimacy of Dog Man sightings. Join us for this interview with Regina Meredith.

Jack Cary is the founder and current director at Paranormal Intelligence Agency and Researcher at Crypto Four Corners. I - See more at: https://www.gaia.com/video/unexplained-phenomena-and-sun-jack-cary#sthash.FF8PVbbG.dpuf
teaser: There is indeed a biological basis for Bigfoot as recently recovered DNA evidence is about to settle the long lingering debate. That is, according to the findings of Jack Cary, who has been instrumental in ongoing investigations into the Bigfoot phenomena.

title: Lessons from Our Polarized Times with Belinda Womack
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Belinda Womack explains that we are beginning to see our hidden shadows rising into the light and returning to the source of love from which we all originally emanated. This comes as we are facing an increasingly polarized nation. But the one thing that seems to be missing on both sides is love. This is the experience that we have all agreed to take on before we entered into this incarnation. It is through the experience of separation that we can experience the greatest power in all of the cosmos, not just for humanity, but for beings throughout the entire universe.  

One morning, a surprise visit from the Archangel Gabriel changed Belinda Womack’s career and life completely. It was time for her to work with Angels in a way she had never dreamed possible.
teaser: We are beginning to see our hidden shadows rising into the light and returning to the source of love from which we all originally emanated. This comes as we are facing an increasingly polarized nation. But the one thing that seems to be missing on both sides is love.

title: Transcending Binary Paradigms with Dr. Lauren Cielo
body: We are entering into an era when humanity is beginning to evolve beyond established paradigms of dichotomy. At the forefront of this transition is the issue of gender fluidity. Meanwhile, many people are following call to advance along the road of spiritual ascension. Perhaps both of these issues are intertwined. Dr. Lauren Cielo brings forward personal spiritual insights on this call for spiritual evolution and the transition beyond gender norms in this interview with Regina Meredith.
teaser: Dr. Lauren Cielo brings forward personal insights on the call for spiritual evolution and the transition beyond gender norms.

title: A Traveler’s Guide to the Afterlife with Mark Mirabello
body:
Undoubtedly, death is a ubiquitous part of life. Throughout human history, a wide diversity of cultures and spiritual traditions have emerged, each offering unique perceptions concerning death and the afterlife. Mark Mirabello has studied many of these cultural beliefs and has composed a traveler’s guide to the afterlife. His guidebook serves as a means of understanding the multifaceted experiences of the afterlife so that we know what to expect and can set ourselves upon an intended pathway through the many roads through the spiritual realms. Join him in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Mark L. Mirabello, author of The Traveler's Guide to the Afterlife, is a Professor of History at Shawnee State University. His area of expertise is the "outlaw" history on the "frontiers and margins" of human civilization.
teaser: Throughout human history, a wide diversity of cultures and spiritual traditions have emerged, each offering unique perceptions concerning death and the afterlife. Mark Mirabello has studied many of these cultural beliefs and has composed a traveler’s guide to the afterlife.

title: A Soul's Journey Through Life, Death and Rebirth with Lee Harris
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Lee Harris returns to channel the Zs who elucidate upon moments of birth and death from the experience of the soul. Different perspectives have been posed by every spiritual tradition throughout the history of humanity. While we may have been seeking a universal answer to these mysteries, the Zs reveal that the process of incarnation is unique to every soul. More importantly, it has less to do with lessons and experiences for the individual soul and more to do with raising the vibratory frequency of energy for the whole of humanity. 

Lee Harris’s journey as a channeler began in 1998 when he heard the voice of Zachary, who was part of a greater collective of 88 spirit guides, which we know as the Zs.
teaser: Lee Harris returns to channel the Zs who elucidate upon moments of birth and death from the experience of the soul. While we may have been seeking a universal answer to these mysteries, the Zs reveal that the process of incarnation is unique to every soul.

title: Alice Bailey and the Circle of Initiates with Klaire Roy
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Alice Bailey, a sage mystic who channeled wisdom from The Tibetan, told us that our world and lives are influenced by the seven rays. After her passing, this wisdom was temporarily silenced. Now, through Klaire Roy, wisdom from The Tibetan finds a new voice guiding our world into new levels of initiation. To demonstrate how these seven rays affect our world, we explore their influence upon the lives of several influential personalities, which she has dubbed, the Circle of Initiates. This study reveals our collective initiation into higher states of spiritual maturity. 
 
Klaire D. Roy is director of The Medicine Buddha Mandala Institute, a nurse, an esteemed author and speaker. She has dedicated herself to the study of authentic spirituality for over 30 years.
teaser: We explore the influence of the seven rays upon the lives of several influential personalities, which Klaire Roy has dubbed, the Circle of Initiates. This study reveals our collective initiation into higher states of spiritual maturity.

title: Creating an EMF-Free Oasis with Jeromy Johnson
body:
We can setup our homes and workplaces to mitigate the potentially damaging effects of toxic electromagnetic frequencies, Jeromy Johnson explains how in this interview with Regina Meredith. With the increased prominence of smart meters, WiFi, Bluetooth and cell signals, our world has become awash with electromagnetic radiation. Recent scientific studies have shown the potential toxicity of continuous exposure to this unseen form of pollution. But there are steps that you can take to create an oasis, free from these toxic signals. 

Jeromy Johnson is a safe technology advocate who helps people learn how to reduce the man-made EMF pollution in our lives and to help people who have already had their health negatively affected by electromagnetic fields (EMF).
teaser: With the increased prominence of smart meters, WiFi, Bluetooth and cell signals, our world has become awash with electromagnetic radiation. Learn how to set up our home and workplace to mitigate the potentially damaging effects of toxic electromagnetic frequencies. Jeromy Johnson explains how.

title: Healing the Subconscious Shadow with Teal Swan
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Teal Swan shares how she learned to live with her shadow side, which was forced to emerge after enduring an especially traumatic childhood. Born sensitive and aware of the overlapping dimensional realities of our world, her parents sought help for their unusual child by taking her to a psychologist. Then a world of the occult and trauma would unfold before her. Years later, she got away and the abuse finally came to an end, but she had to learn to deal with the repercussions of the deep programming instilled into her psyche. Now she helps others unearth their past, to heal their subconscious shadows and bring them into the light.

In conjunction with her vision of creating positive world change, Teal Swan founded Headway Foundation, a nonprofit company that enables ideas, goals and ventures that are aimed at positive world change to become actualized.
teaser: Teal Swan shares how she learned to live with her shadow side, which was forced to emerge after enduring an especially traumatic childhood. Now she helps others unearth their past, to heal their subconscious shadows and bring them into the light.

title: A Simple Method for Profound Healing with Bill McKenna
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Bill McKenna shares an easy way for us to tap into higher levels of consciousness and bring healing to anyone, anywhere. Each one of us takes part in the co-creative energy of our reality and when we get bogged down by lower levels of consciousness, we inadvertently allow illness and negativity to creep in. With a little help, we can access higher levels of consciousness, achieve unconditional love, and begin manipulating the health and wellbeing of those in our lives. Achieving these results may sound daunting, but the method is simple; easy to learn and easy to teach.
teaser: Bill McKenna shares an easy way for us to tap into higher levels of consciousness and bring healing to anyone, anywhere. Achieving these results may sound daunting, but the method is simple; easy to learn and easy to teach.

title: Occult Origins of America with Mitch Horowitz
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Mitch Horowitz guides us on a trip through America’s occult and secret spiritual history from the first colonies to the beginning of the 19th century. What unfolds may help you to see the occult in a new light. As alternative spiritual ideas in Europe met with violent suppression, the search for a safe haven for religious diversity in the New World began. Thus, religious radicals made their journey across the Atlantic to establish a foundation for the ethic of religious liberty. During this time, prominent personalities arose to forge the foundations of Freemasonry, the Illuminati, Mormonism, and the precursors to the spiritualist movement.
teaser: Mitch Horowitz guides us on a trip through America’s occult and secret spiritual history from the first colonies to the beginning of the 19th century. What unfolds may help you to see the occult in a new light.

title: Galactic Crusade of the Reptilians with Len Kasten
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Len Kasten illuminates the history of reptilian galactic conquests and their conflicts with human beings which led them to our solar system where they established a hybrid civilization on Earth. No one knows from whence or where the reptilian overlords originated, but their advancement throughout our galaxy has been a continuous thorn in the side of many civilizations. Their crusade eventually brought them to Earth where their ongoing struggle against a galactic federation for the control or sovereignty of humanity continues to this day.
teaser: Len Kasten illuminates the history of reptilian galactic conquests and their conflicts with human beings which led them to our solar system where they established a hybrid civilization on Earth.

title: Deeper Insights from Sean Stone
body: Regina Meredith digs deep into the life and personality of Sean Stone to learn of his motivations and insights. We learn his views on globalization, the New World Order, Transhumanism, and the consolidation of power into the hands of the few. He calls for us to trust that there is a grand design. Though the world may look like a hell, it is ultimately moving into the best of all possible worlds, and each one of us can be a positive part of that shift.
teaser: Regina Meredith digs deep into the life and personality of Sean Stone to learn of his motivations and insights. We learn his views on globalization, the New World Order, Transhumanism, and the consolidation of power into the hands of the few.

title: Reclaiming Your Free Will with Eldon Taylor
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Eldon Taylor reveals that free will is the result of a process of mass manipulation and the engineering of consent. He shows us how the mind can be molded through the use of different stimuli which provoke our emotions and gives us just enough information to justify decisions through selective logic. As spiritual beings we can choose to continue to participate in the hate and deceit or we can learn to see these methods of manipulation for what they really are.
teaser: Eldon Taylor reveals that free will is the result of a process of mass manipulation and the engineering of consent. He shows us how the mind can be molded through the use of different stimuli which provoke our emotions and gives us just enough information to justify decisions through selective logic

title: New Age of Atlantis with Raymond Tarpey
body: In this interview with Regina Meredith, Raymond Tarpey tells us that it is America’s destiny to become the new Atlantis. To explains this, he guides us through the history and influence of Atlantean culture on the growth of civilization and the spiritual development of humanity. Ages ago, as great cataclysms tore apart the great domains of Atlantis, refugees sought out new lands and new civilizations to become seeds of this lost golden age. Those seeds took root in Egypt and other civilizations, spreading esoteric teachings through various cultures across the world. We still see the influence of Atlantis, today, as these ancient esoteric teachings become more common knowledge and a new golden age is reborn.
teaser: Raymond Tarpey tells us that it is America’s destiny to become the new Atlantis. He guides us through the history and influence of Atlantean culture on the growth of civilization and the spiritual development of humanity.

title: Calling for Angelic Guidance with Joan Walker
body:
How are you supposed to connect with spiritual guidance when help is most needed? In this interview with Regina Meredith, Joan Walker explains that you may feel stranded and alone on Earth, especially in the most difficult moments of life. However, there is a bevy of angels tasked with uplifting humanity to its original state, with full consciousness and connected with the creator. It is a matter of being centered, calling for light and love from that creator. Then you develop an energetic presence which can receive wisdom from the soul, and connect with your angelic guidance. 

Joan Walker, a gifted channel for the archangels and ascended masters, has used her gift for many years. At the specific request of Archangel Metatron, and under the guidance of the archangels and masters, Joan is developing some basic teachings that anyone can use to express their true divine nature for both their own personal evolution, as well as that of the collective.
teaser: How are you supposed to connect with spiritual guidance when help is most needed? It is a matter of being centered, calling for light and love from that creator.

title: Living Authentically: Embracing the Warrior Goddess with HeatherAsh Amara
body:
HeatherAsh Amara explains how we can begin to heal the rift between men and women by redefining the feminine and masculine paradigms. This can be messy as it only comes from breaking learned behavioral patterns because doing that can cause guilt and fear of what others might think. We tend to live with an image of who we think we should be, rather than authentically living who we are, and this can cause tremendous suffering. She offers advice to help women become warrior goddesses by expressing how they want to be in the world, rather than taking on assumed obligations.

HeatherAsh Amara has studied and taught extensively with don Miguel Ruiz and continues to teach with the Ruiz family. She brings an openhearted, inclusive worldview to her writings and teachings, which are a rich blend of Toltec wisdom, European shamanism, Buddhism, and Native American ceremony.
teaser: HeatherAsh Amara explains how we can begin to heal the rift between men and women by redefining the feminine and masculine paradigms. She offers advice to help women become warrior goddesses by expressing how they want to be in the world, rather than taking on assumed obligations.

title: Clearing Negative Entities with Jerry Wills
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Jerry Wills offers advice and insight to dealing with hauntings and unwanted entities in your home. We are bathed in a multidimensional reality where the realms of light and dark coexist within our own world. Many people live their lives with the luxury of disbelief in ghosts and hauntings. Others are forced to deal with the reality of the intersection of these worlds, sometimes with frightening results. If you do not want the "creepy stuff" hanging around, there is a way for you to call upon the beautiful things to help. 

As a child, Jerry Wills was aware of energy and how it moved through all things. Like most children, he had to learn to keep his unique gifts to himself. That is until a near death experience in 1981 showed him how he was wasting his life and that he was being given a second chance. It took another 20 years for his abilities to be recognized and accepted. Now, people seek him out as he offers healing, classes, lectures and seeks to help others around the world.
teaser: Jerry Wills offers advice and insight to dealing with hauntings and unwanted entities in your home. If you do not want the "creepy stuff" hanging around, there is a way for you to call upon the beautiful things to help.

title: Otherworldly Connections to Megaliths with Freddy Silva
body:
Freddy Silva’s research into ancient megalithic structures suggests that they may have been placed at certain locations with the intention of tracking celestial bodies. NASA has only just begun tracking such objects because of the potential danger they pose to life on Earth. Perhaps such sites were selected by the gods, in human form, at a time when they could see and feel powerful energetic places. Once built, and connected with other megaliths, those who were initiated could enter these sites and journey through the other side to gain wisdom and knowledge of otherworldly realms. Join him in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Freddy Silva is one of the world’s leading experts on ancient knowledge, sacred sites, and crop circles, and a leading researcher into the interaction between temples and consciousness. He is a best-selling author, and director of several documentaries. He lectures internationally on a variety of topics on ancient wisdom and earth mysteries.
teaser: Freddy Silva’s research into ancient megalithic structures suggests that they may have been placed at certain locations with the intention of tracking celestial bodies. Perhaps such sites were selected by the gods, in human form, at a time when they could see and feel powerful energetic places.

title: Decoding Esoteric Hollywood Part 1 with Jay Dyer
body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Jay Dyer decodes the esoteric secrets hidden within The Running Man, Interstellar and The Avengers, from 1998. All around us, the world is brimming with secret messages embedded within popular forms of media. If you do not know what to look for, these secret messages can be very manipulative upon mass consciousness. Exposing the imagery and story lines of in these movies helps to break the spell of domination over our lives so we can begin to reclaim control over our minds. 


Jay Dyer, whose graduate work focused on the interplay of film, geopolitics, espionage and psychological warfare is the founder of JaysAnalysis which has grown to become one of the premier film and philosophy sites on the net. Jay is a public speaker, lecturer, comedian and author of the popular title, Esoteric Hollywood: Sex, Cults and Symbols in Film. Jay has authored hundreds of articles already read by millions in just the past few years.

We also look at the looming threat of technology placed in the wrong hands. Sometimes the wrong hands are not found with the creator, but with the technology itself; as is the case with A.I. 

Jay Dyer, whose graduate work focused on the interplay of film, geopolitics, espionage and psychological warfare is the founder of JaysAnalysis which has grown to become one of the premier film and philosophy sites on the net. From abstract devices to overt themes in plotlines, when we take a careful look at the tales told in cinema, we begin to see the true story of what is going on in the world. To better understand this, we examine various works from prominent directors such as Stanley Kubrick, Roman Polanski and David Lynch, including A Clockwork Orange, Chinatown, Mullholland Drive, and Twin Peaks. Doing so, we become empowered to see the world how it really is, rather than the illusion heaped upon us by societal puppeteers.

To better understand this, we examine various works from prominent directors such as Stanley Kubrick, Roman Polanski and David Lynch, including Clock Work Orange, Chinatown, Mullholland Drive, and Twin Peaks.

body: It has been said that mathematics is the only true universal language and the work of Marty Leeds may well prove that through gematria. Ancient languages, such as Hebrew and Greek associated the letters of their alphabets with numbers so that every word has a numerical value. By analyzing these ancient languages with a seven-fold cypher, we find the alphabet of god as an organizing principle within everything. This is all embedded within the mathematical relationships of the world and the numeric words found throughout all of creation.

body:
In this interview with Regina Meredith, Chris Hardy expands upon Zecharia Sitchin’s view of the Annunaki by presenting them as major influencers on biblical accounts of history. She explores major events from the Old Testament including the creation of Adam and Eve, the great flood and the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah as machinations of an advanced extraterrestrial civilization. What was originally documented as divine intervention, becomes the work of advanced technology that we are just now beginning to understand, such as DNA splicing, weather modification and nuclear weapons. 

Chris H. Hardy, Ph.D. is a cognitive scientist and former researcher at Princeton’s Psychophysical Research Laboratories. She has spent many years investigating non-local consciousness through systems theory, chaos theory, and her own Semantic Fields Theory.
teaser: Chris Hardy expands upon Zecharia Sitchin’s view of the Annunaki by presenting them as major influencers on biblical accounts of history. What was originally documented as divine intervention, becomes the work of advanced technology that we are just now beginning to understand.

The Puranic texts of the ancient Vedic culture defined the characteristics of the Kali Yuga, an age that will eventually lead to the end of humanity as we know it. For some, this will be a time of great calamity and destruction. Others will learn to access their higher powers and restore consciousness to its original pure state, in order to transcend beyond the cycles of creation and destruction. 

Michael A. Cremo is and independent historian of archeology who argues that humans have lived on the earth for billions of years. He is best known for being the author of Forbidden Archeology, and co-author of The Hidden History of the Human Race with Richard L. Thompson.

These seeds have already been planted into the soil of our culture as we are seeing individuated consciousnesses learning how to join in an oceanic reunification with the source of creation.

In this interview with Regina Meredith, she explains that every relationship across our many lifetimes is a result of decisions, made by the soul, to encounter certain lessons. These lessons present themselves as recurring patterns throughout the soul’s many experiences. Ultimately, her work helps you to understand your values and what is important to you, at the soul level.

Learning to consciously connect with your dreams could bring about many different levels of healing and the realization of your higher mind. This would amount to bringing the reality of your dream-state into the waking world. He offers techniques that you can begin using, tonight, as well as explaining the beneficial effects of psychedelic plants upon dreaming lucidly in this interview with Regina Meredith.

body:
Using a unique and powerful technique that he developed, Dr. Bradley Nelson (as seen in E-Motion) helps his clients discover the emotions which lay at the source of their discomfort and illness, then discharge them in a way that brings lasting peace and wellbeing to the body. This is done through a simple process he calls the Emotion Code, which anyone can learn.  To demonstrate the potency of his technique, he shares stories from those who have used the Emotion Code to clear trapped emotions, to heal themselves and change their lives in this interview with Regina Meredith.

The documentary e-motion is now available on Gaia: https://www.gaia.com/video/e-motion

Dr Bradley Nelson is an author, teacher, chiropractor, medical intuitive, energy healer, father and husband. He has dedicated his life to teaching people all over the world how to heal themselves and others by bringing the body back to a state of energetic and physical balance.

body:
Each of us wears an invisible garment, woven with spiritual principles that connect us with each other and to something far greater. In this interview with Regina Meredith, Connie Kaplan explores many of these spiritual principles, how they are expressed through our actions and manifest in our world. These principles shape how we interact within important relationships, like marriage and parenting. They are also a reflection of our innate nature and the soul’s purpose in this life. 

Raised in Texas as a minister's daughter, spirituality has always been an important foundation for Connie Kaplan’s life. As a career choice, she went into television production and worked as a free-lance script supervisor and an associate director. After she was suddenly struck with a mysterious virus, she experienced a profound spiritual transformation which altered not only her inner experience of life, but her outer expression of life as well.
teaser: Each of us wears an invisible garment, woven with spiritual principles that connect us with each other and to something far greater. Connie Kaplan explores many of these spiritual principles, how they are expressed through our actions and manifest in our world.

body: The web of political intrigue cast by the power elite obscures the truth and ensnares much of the world’s populations into national security states. In this interview with Regina Meredith, Daniel Sheehan explains that this is all happening, hidden behind an intricately woven false façade of alternate realities. These opposing views of our world are presented by mainstream, alternate and social media; each source claiming to hold the truth of what is going on. Major corporations, plundering the planet using a post-modernist philosophy of consumerism, perpetuate this obfuscation so that we cannot tell what is the truth; all to foster and promote the national security state.

We begin with exploring the charismatic figure of Helena Blavatsky who brought forward the strengths and benefits of Buddhism and traditional Hindu beliefs, at a time when such views were dismissed as antiquated and inadequate. Building upon her foundation of Theosophy, we see the emergence of the spiritualist movement which held strong ties with emancipation and abolitionist politics. We also discover the origin of the power of positive thinking and Law of Attraction philosophies which taught that happiness and transcendence are contained within the human mind.
teaser: Explore the occult foundations of progressive social concerns in American history with the charismatic figure of Helena Blavatsky who brought forward the strengths and benefits of Buddhism and traditional Hindu beliefs. From the homegrown traditions of Hoodoo to the scholarly works of Manly P Hall, the tenants of American occult history have been hidden in plain sight and interwoven through every aspect of our society. This becomes apparent as we look at the teachings from the new thought movement and the attempts, made by the establishment to discredit and defame notable personalities presenting alternative occult teachings.
teaser: Mitch Horowitz continues our exploration into the history of new thought and spirituality with the realization of the secret destiny of America. She explains that chakras are like multidimensional power centers of the soul spreading out through more than eleven dimensions. As we follow this story of light, color, and frequency in our human energy matrix, we see that the chakras project the auric field around the body, connect with spiritual beings and make manifest our desires. 

Cyndi Dale, author of The Subtle Body: An Encyclopedia of Your Energetic Anatomy has long been a natural intuitive with a passion to helping people open their essential energy.  In addition to her natural intuitive gifts, she is trained in shamanism, intuitive healing, energy healing, family of origin therapy, therapeutic touch, the Lakota way and faith healing and holds a fourth degree mastership in Reiki.

Inside each of us is the potential to move into grace from suffering, if we learn to connect with the archetypes within our personality. It all comes down to a willingness to know one’s self, including the shadow side. She explains the various archetypes we can encounter, the roles they play in our lives, and how we can ally ourselves with them to shift our energy, all with guidance from higher self.
teaser: Tiffany Barsotti explains how we can engage with the higher mind and begin healing the core wounds from which all of humanity suffers. She explains the various archetypes we can encounter, the roles they play in our lives, and how we can ally ourselves with them to shift our energy.

He discovered that the foods we eat have a big impact on the wellbeing of our body and brain. We explore different types of diets, and how they affect the microbes in our gut, to gain a new understanding of food as software which programs states of health in the brain and body in this interview with Regina Meredith.

His research has determined that the accounts of survivors are very real, but a logical explanation has defied him at every turn. So, he has developed new rules of logic which may finally yield a means for conceptualizing these ineffable experiences of life afterlife. What was once only a philosophical question may finally get well-deserved scientific and logical recognition. Join him in this interview with Regina Meredith.

Dr. Raymond Moody, author of 13 books including Life After Life, continues to capture enormous public interest and generate controversy with his groundbreaking work on near-death experiences.

As you become more aware of this, it is important to become mindful of distortions in your consciousness, lest you get bleed-through from parallel lives and attachments from lower-level entities. His insights can help you successfully and safely traverse previously unfathomable realms of existence.

They offer tools for the individual to deftly navigation the global transformation that is upon us. 

Lee Harris’s journey as a channeler began in 1998 when he heard the voice of Zachary, who was part of a greater collective of 88 spirit guides. Now, he brings the wisdom he gained from the other side to help others heal their heart, through the power of forgiveness and connecting with the stillness within.

To help guide us through these chaotic times, they offer ways that you can use to access your exceptional gifts and bring forward your unique wisdom to the world. 

Belinda Womack met her angels at birth. They have always made her feel safe and happy when she remembered to ask for their protection. In our electric universe, everything has vibration, even the state of our wellbeing. Learn to tap into the resonance of the electromagnetic field of the body, with a specially tuned tuning fork, and untangle blockages in the human biofield to restore it to vibratory order and access your own self-healing abilities.

Eileen Day McKusick, M.A. has opened a new frontier in Biofield Science, using sound and physics based principles to create a paradigm shift in the way we approach health on every level. teaser: Eileen Day McKusick explains that the same electricity which powers the stars, powers the life and vitality of our own bodies. Learn to tap into the resonance of the electromagnetic field of the body, with a specially tuned tuning fork, and untangle blockages in the human biofield.

title: Channeling Theo: Soul Integration for Sacred Relationships with Sheila and Marcus Gillette
body:
The most important and complex aspect of any given lifetime are our relationships, including twin flames or soul mates. Sometimes, one’s desires and beliefs can conflict with the soul’s higher purpose, resulting in unfulfilled or detrimental relationships. Sheila Gillette, with the help of Marcus Gillette, channel the THEO group to explain the importance of soul integration and the release of limiting beliefs, to begin making interpersonal connections which best reflect the sacredness within. 

Sheila Gillette is the world renowned spiritual medium and channel for the twelve archangels collectively known as THEO. She is the co-author of, The Soul Truth: A Guide to Inner Peace and author of, The Fifth Dimension: Channels to a New Reality. She and Marcus are the co-hosts of the popular interactive internet TV show “AskTHEO Live”, and she and THEO are prominently mentioned in the Abraham-Hicks publications as the mentors for Esther Hicks to begin channeling Abraham. THEO speaks through Sheila to guide humanity during this unprecedented shift to a higher state of consciousness.

title: Accessing Intuitive Healing with Jerry Wills
body:
Jerry Wills shares some of his secrets to his intuitive healing process. As we explore stories of the miraculous healings he has encountered, he explains how we each can connect with our own healing power and take an active role in our wellbeing. This comes down to changing the way you see yourself and releasing the things blocking your healing potential. 

As a child, Jerry Wills was aware of energy and how it moved through all things. Like most children, he had to learn to keep his unique gifts to himself. That is until a near death experience in 1981 showed him how he was wasting his life and that he was being given a second chance. It took another 20 years for his abilities to be recognized and accepted. Now, people seek him out as he offers healing, classes, lectures and seeks to help others around the world.
teaser: Jerry Wills shares some of his secrets to his intuitive healing process. He explains how we each can connect with our own healing power and take an active role in our wellbeing.

title: Photographic Evidence of Alien Encounters with Paola Harris
body:
Paola Harris shares intricate details from several cases she has investigated involving people who have had direct encounters with extraterrestrial beings, and she brings along photos as proof. Her thorough investigation into matters such as Valiant Thor, George Adamski, Glenn Steckling and the Amicizia case, has resulted in a large body of evidence, including photographic images of otherworldly beings and their spacecraft.

An Italo-American photojournalist and investigative reporter in the field of extraterrestrial related phenomena research, Paola Leopizzi Harris is also a widely published free-lance writer and author of Exopolitics: Stargate to a New Reality. She has studied extraterrestrial related phenomena since 1979 and is on personal terms with many of the leading researchers in the field.
teaser: Paola Harris shares intricate details from several cases she has investigated involving people who have had direct encounters with extraterrestrial beings, and she brings along photos as proof. Her thorough investigation has resulted in a large body of evidence, including photographic images of otherworldly beings and their spacecraft.

title: Oracles, Reptilians & the Divine Feminine with Marguerite Rigoglioso
body:
When the oracles of the Earth Goddess in ancient Greece rose to prominence, they were erudite women of power. Over the ages, the gods took over and patriarchy encroached into these sacred realms. Marguerite Rigoglioso suggests that these myths may reflect the history of extraterrestrial reptilians and Pleiadeans, vying for influence over early human civilizations. Knowing this history, we can recover the oracle traditions and lift the feminine spirit out of the negative shadow cast upon it so that it can return to its divine place.

Marguerite Rigoglioso, Ph.D., earned an A.B. in psychology, and the California Institute of Integral Studies, where she earned her M.A. in philosophy and religion, and her Ph.D. in humanities. But some of her most profound learning has taken place in women’s circles and her own ceremonial work.
teaser: When the oracles of the Earth Goddess in ancient Greece rose to prominence, they were erudite women of power. Over the ages, the gods took over and patriarchy encroached into these sacred realms. Now, we can now lift the feminine spirit and return to its divine place.

title: Alchemy for Soul Ascension with Theresa Bullard
body:
Alchemy can serve as a bridge between the spiritual and science when your soul becomes the Philosophers Stone. Theresa Bullard, a Ph.D. Physicist with deep training in western mystery schools, explains how we can use the seven processes of Alchemy and universal Kabbalah to work in participation with the universe, accelerating our spiritual evolutionary process. This is not about escaping the body, but grounding these ideas in the body and raising it to a higher state, in unison with the soul.

Theresa Bullard, Ph.D., founder of Quantra Leadership Academy, is a pioneer in the field of fusing science,  consciousness, and transformative technologies. Theresa obtained her Ph.D. in Physics from the University of Washington, where she conducted interdisciplinary research in quantum theory, neutrino physics, crystal chemistry, nanotechnology, and origin of life studies.
teaser: Theresa Bullard explains how we can use the seven processes of Alchemy and universal Kabbalah to work in participation with the universe, accelerating our spiritual evolutionary process. This is about grounding these ideas in the body and raising it to a higher state, in unison with the soul.

title: Dreams: Decoding Your Subconscious Realms with Doris E. Cohen
body:
Nearly everyone dreams, but not everyone understands what the subconscious is trying to tell us or the challenges we face from past lives. Doris E. Cohen has spent decades decoding the symbolic language of the subconscious mind, as expressed through dreaming and past life regressions. She explains the symbols found in different types of dreams we have, cyclical patterns from past lives, and how we can understand these subtle communications from the unconscious realms. 

Doris E. Cohen, Ph.D., is an internationally renowned clinical psychologist and psychotherapist and has been in the private practice for more than 30 years. Her unique approach uses psychotherapy, hypnotherapy, Past-Life Regressions and Dream analysis.
teaser: Doris E. Cohen explains the different types of dreams we have, cyclical patterns from past lives, and how we can understand these subtle communications from the unconscious realms.

title: The Cygnus Key with Andrew Collins
body: Many people have accepted two prominent theories concerning the origin of humanity: Atlantis and extraterrestrial seeding. A third option comes forth as we look to the far-reaching spread of Denisovan DNA and artifacts. Andrew Collins traces the legacy of the Denisovans, through mythistory and archeology, across the ancient world, leading to the origins of human civilization. What we find is a civilization more than 40,000 years old, with an advanced intellect and technology, merging with modern humans. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: Andrew Collins traces the legacy of the Denisovans, through mythistory and archeology, across the ancient world. What we find is a civilization more than 40,000- years old, with an advanced intellect and technology.

title: Nation of the Goddess with Alan Butler
body: Was America secretly founded by a group of powerful individuals, who worshiped a goddess, with the best intentions for humanity? This is the discovery Alan Butler made as he studied the ancient spiritual traditions of the British Isles. From the rites of the Eleusinian Mysteries to the construction of ancient megaliths in Britain, we find clues pointing to powerful families who revere an ancient goddess. He suggests they brought their secret teachings and practices to the New World during its most formative era and built them into monuments and doctrines in Washington D.C. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: Was America secretly founded by a group of powerful individuals, who worshiped a goddess, with the best intentions for humanity? This is the discovery Alan Butler made as he studied the ancient spiritual traditions of the British Isles.

title: King Arthur Mythos with Caitlin Matthews
body:
Caitlin Matthews has undertaken a deep study of the history and cultures which gave rise to Arthurian legends in order to uncover the truths underlying this pervasive mythos. The legends of King Arthur have captivated audiences since their inception in the 12th century, and every legend has its origin.  We explore people who may have served as models for the characters, historical events which played into these tales, and the cultural transformation which still influences British royalty. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England. 

Caitlín Matthews, author of over 70 books, was trained in multiple esoteric mystery traditions and is acknowledged as a world authority on Celtic Wisdom, the Western Mysteries and the ancestral traditions of Britain and Europe.
teaser: Caitlin Matthews has undertaken a deep study of the history and cultures which gave rise to the legend of King Arthur in order to uncover the truths underlying this pervasive mythos.

title: Elongated Skulls Along British Ley Lines with Maria Wheatley
body: Spread across the Salisbury Plain in England, we find a myriad of monuments, testifying to the sacred knowledge of the Neolithic people who held a strong connection to the earth-energy of this land. Following her finely honed dowsing skills, Maria Wheatley stumbled upon a discovery which implies that an advanced culture once lived alongside burgeoning human tribes. This is evidenced by the elongated skulls found at sites built along powerful ley lines which amplify the electrostatic energy of the earth.  This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: Following her finely honed dowsing skills, Maria Wheatley stumbled upon a discovery which implies that an advanced culture once lived alongside burgeoning human tribes in ancient Britain. This is evidenced by the elongated skulls found at sites built along powerful ley lines.

title: Neuroplasticity with Lucid Dreaming with Charlie Morley
body: What if there was a way to maximize your sleep-time to build muscle, expand consciousness and solve problems? Charley Morley explains how we can use lucid dreaming to rewire our brains and improve every aspect of the waking world. His techniques are backed by science which demonstrates the increased neuroplasticity of the brain and body when lucid dreaming is used as a training technique. He shares ways that you can recognize when you are in the dream state and begin your own lucid dreaming practice. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: What if there was a way to maximize your sleep-time to build muscle, expand consciousness and solve problems? Charley Morley explains how we can use lucid dreaming to rewire our brains and improve every aspect of the waking world.

title: Breaking Archontic Control with David Icke
body: David Icke calls us to question the nature of the reality that we are living in, so that we can see the machinations manipulating our minds into lower states. We can use the healing force of love to free ourselves from the constant fear and anxiety. Breaking free from this archontic control enables us to tap into a reality beyond these projected paradigms and bring an end to the mass manipulation of our population. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: David Icke calls us to question the nature of the reality that we are living in, so that we can see the machinations manipulating our minds into lower states. Breaking free from this archontic control enables us to tap into a reality beyond these projected paradigms.

title: Spiritual Approach to Science with Rupert Sheldrake
body: We follow along with Rupert Sheldrake as he discusses his journey through life. He takes us from his spiritual upbringing, through atheism and back to spirituality to develop a holistic view of the world which led to his discovery of the morphic resonance theory. What we find is that science and spiritual practices do not need to be two separate views of our world. Taking a holistic approach to science opens us to the true beauty of the world and our connection to all things. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: We follow along with Rupert Sheldrake as he shares his life’s journey which to led to the discovery of the morphic resonance theory. What we find is that science and spiritual practices do not need to be two separate views of our world.

title: The Power of Sound with Jill Purce
body: What is one thing that can unite communities and heal the body & soul? From the chanting of worshipful songs to the divine, to its startling effects on matter, Jill Purce imparts many extraordinary functions of sound. She explains that these vibrations have the power to dissolve all boundaries and limitations between people, matter and spirit. This is something that ancient tribal cultures innately understand and something we are rediscovering. This interview was filmed, on location in London, England.
teaser: Jill Purce imparts many extraordinary functions of sound. She explains that these vibrations have the power to dissolve all boundaries and limitations between people, matter and spirit.

title: The Cosmic Hologram with Jude Currivan
body: What if science offered us a way to see beyond the material realm and into unity consciousness? Jude Currivan hails from the halls of mainstream science and is leading the way to integrate scientific and spiritual disciplines into a wholistic world view. She explains how we can reconcile Newtonian and Quantum physics to give us a new understanding of energy as in-formation. Just beyond the physical, is a reality state which gives rise to all matter and form as we know it; all of which is tied in with universal consciousness.
teaser: What if science offered us a way to see beyond the material realm and into unity consciousness? Jude Currivan is leading the way to integrate scientific and spiritual disciplines into a wholistic world view.

title: Psychosomatic Spiritual Healing with Shamini Jain
body:
Many ancient religions hold different notions for healing mind and body, some of which run into conflict with modern science. Shamini Jain, a Ph.D Neuroscientist, brings to light Indo-Tibetan healing practices which mesh well with psychoneuroimmunology. She shares some fundamental life principles from Jainism and mind-body-spirit practices that can help you to begin bringing harmony between body and soul. 

Dr. Shamini Jain is a psychologist, scientist, and social entrepreneur. She is the Founder and Director of the Consciousness and Healing Initiative (CHI), a collaborative accelerator that connects scientists, health practitioners, innovators, and social entrepreneurs to forward the science and practice of healing.
teaser: Shamini Jain brings to light Indo-Tibetan healing practices which mesh well with psychoneuroimmunology. She shares some fundamental life principles from Jainism and mind-body-spirit practices that can help you to begin bringing harmony between body and soul.

title: Earthships for True Freedom with Michael Reynolds
body: Old tires, beer cans and bottles may seem like garbage, but they may be the most resilient and sustainable building material readily available. For over 40 years, Michael Reynolds has been taking the things we throw away and turning them into structural works of art known as Earthships. He shares his journey of overcoming suppression from orthodox architecture, mainstream ideologies of living and building regulations to create homes that express a life of true freedom.
teaser: Old tires, beer cans and bottles may seem like garbage, but they may be the most resilient and sustainable building material readily available. For over 40 years, Michael Reynolds has been taking the things we throw away and turning them into structural works of art known as Earthships.

title: Human Design and the Book of Destiny with Chetan Parkyn & Carola Eastwood
body:
Following-up on his work with Human Design, Chetan Parkyn returns with Carola Eastwood, to explain how you can uncover the theme of your life and tread upon the path you were always meant to take. Determined by the place, date and time of your birth, Human Design can help you to discover your destiny. By consulting the Book of Destiny, you can learn of the many lives you have lived and gain a blueprint for the 21st century and beyond.  

An entrepreneur’s son by upbringing and an engineer by training, Chetan Parkyn has fully explored both the mystical and the technological worlds. He has spent the past 23 years mastering Human Design. In 2000, he felt called to make the system accessible to a far wider audience so he began offering trainings and seminars along with his life-partner, Carola Eastwood. In 2009 Chetan wrote the first major book on Human Design.
teaser: Following-up on his work with Human Design, Chetan Parkyn returns with Carola Eastwood, to explain how you can uncover the theme of your life and tread upon the path you were always meant to take, using the Book of Destiny.

title: Revelations of the Aquarian Age with Barbara Hand Clow
body: Barbara Hand Clow’s fictional work, Revelations of the Aquarian Age, marks major shifts in modern religions, which are reflections of our progress through the current Piscean Age. She explains that the characters in this book not only help us to experience multidimensionality, they also reveal how evil comes into our world and how we can find ways to transmute it. Though the events in her tale were intended to be fictional accounts, the astute reader will find parallels playing out in the real world as we transition into a new era of spiritual advancement for the whole of humanity.
teaser: Barbara Hand Clow’s fictional work, Revelations of the Aquarian Age, marks our progress through the current Piscean Age. The astute reader will find parallels playing out in the real world as we transition into a new era of spiritual advancement.

title: Metabolic Approach to Cancer with Dr. Donese Worden
body: The metabolic approach to cancer is creating new paradigms of cancer therapies. Dr. Donese Worden discusses these discoveries which seek to understand the causes and effects of cancer, at the metabolic level, before DNA become damaged. She explains that all of these advances are built upon already proven therapies and add changes in lifestyle to affect the lifecycle of cancer cells.
teaser: The metabolic approach to cancer is creating new paradigms of cancer therapies. Dr. Donese Worden discusses these discoveries which seek to understand the causes and effects of cancer, at the metabolic level.

title: Messages from the Moment of Death with Lisa Smartt
body: Lisa Smartt, a linguist and colleague of Dr. Raymond Moody, has collected and interpreted the mysterious messages people relay as they transition across the threshold of death. She reveals this in her book, Words at the Threshold: What we Say as We’re Nearing Death. Hearing the final words uttered by those who are dying gives us a powerful understanding of what they experience, and what we may encounter ourselves.
teaser: Lisa Smartt has collected and interpreted the mysterious messages people relay as they transition across the threshold of death. Hearing these final words gives us a powerful understanding of what we may encounter when we die.

title: Manifesting High Energy Money with Cynthia Larson
body: Cynthia Larson reveals how we can use the observer affect, a concept from quantum physics, to manifest the money we need and want from the quantum sea of possibilities. She explains that our concept of money is mired down with notions from classical physics, but the quantum realms give us the key to unlocking our full manifestation potential. This comes as we release the illusion of angst and anxiety we have learned over the years and move into the higher frequencies needed to manifest the things we desire.
teaser: Cynthia Larson reveals how we can use the observer affect, a concept from quantum physics, to manifest the money we need and want from the quantum sea of possibilities.

title: Quantum Spirituality with Paul Levy
body: Quantum reality is more than theoretical, it is the basis of our entire existence. Paul Levy gives us his perspective of quantum physics as a spiritual path, explaining that we are dreaming ourselves, while the universe is dreaming us, at the same time. When you come to understand this, you unlock the unlimited creative potential that we all have but are completely unaware of.
teaser: Quantum reality is more than theoretical, it is the basis of our entire existence. Paul Levy gives us his perspective of quantum physics as a spiritual path, explaining that we are dreaming ourselves, while the universe is dreaming us.

title: Positive Mind & The Miracle Club with Mitch Horowitz
body: The Law of Attraction and Think and Grow Rich are popular notions of manifestation which began with the positive mind movement from the late 1800’s. Mitch Horowitz reveals insights from one of the original organizations in this movement, The Miracle Club, and explains what made their practices so successful. He offers tools and techniques, that you can start using today, to selecting the life you were meant to live, which may not be exactly what you are expecting.
teaser: Mitch Horowitz reveals insights from one of the original organizations in the positive mind movement of the late 1800s, The Miracle Club, and what made their practices so successful. He offers tools and techniques, that you can start using today.

title: John Dee: Renaissance Alchemist with Jason Louv
body: John Dee, the magical and scientific advisor to Queen Elizabeth I, who dubbed him, “007,” lived in a time when magic and science were one, became a controversial occult figure. With the help of Edward Kelly, they channeled Angels, bringing a message of liberation from superstition and control. All the while, he worked to bring mathematics and scientific thinking to a wider audience, who initially thought these were the workings of the devil. Jason Louv discusses the life and John Dee, a renaissance alchemist who influenced the work of many prominent scientists throughout history.
