teaser: John Dee, advisor to Queen Elizabeth I, who dubbed him, “007,” lived in a time when magic and science were one, became a controversial occult figure. Jason Louv discusses the life of this renaissance alchemist who influenced many prominent scientists.

title: Egregores: Collective Beings of Control with Mark Stavish
body:
Many of the unseen forces and beings manipulating the minds of humanity are a direct product of our own creation. Mark Stavish calls these beings egregores and explains that they are a type of thought-form that is created by our collective social beliefs and norms. Once it reaches a certain stage of power, it influences the behaviors and lives of those who created it. These beings hold particularly strong sway in the fields of religion, philosophy and politics. He reveals how you can break free from the control mechanisms of these parasitic and destructive entities, to reclaim your sovereign power over your own psyche. 

Mark Stavish is one of the leading authorities in Hermeticism today. He is the Director of Studies for the Institute for Hermetic Studies and a life-long student of esotericism. He has studied comparative religion, philosophy, psychology, and mysticism with emphasis on Traditional Western Esotericism for more than 25 years.
teaser: Many of the unseen beings manipulating the minds of humanity are a direct product of our own creation. Mark Stavish calls these beings egregores and explains that they are a type of thought-form that is created by our collective social beliefs.

title: Disclosure in the Aquarian Age with Barbara Hand Clow
body: Barbara Hand Clow offers us a message from the Pleiadeans who give us a new way to view our connection with beings in unseen dimensions and make an effective transition into the Aquarian age. As we quickly approach the time of disclosure, we need to engage in deeper discussions of our old belief systems concerning beings from other worlds, including the Annunaki and Archons. She reveals that there is a concerted effort, through mind control, to keep humans locked in the third dimension and fearful of extraterrestrials. Fortunately, we have otherworldly allies who are working to dispel mass misinformation movements and help us unlock our potential to ascend into higher dimensions.
teaser: Barbara Hand Clow offers us a message from the Pleiadeans to help us make an effective transition into the Aquarian age. The time of disclosure is soon, and we need to engage in deeper discussions of our old belief systems concerning ET beings.

title: Teaching the Mysteries with Theresa Bullard
body: Theresa Bullard invites us into the events of her life that led to her earning a Ph.D. in physics, becoming an initiate in a modern mystery school lineage, and to teaching the mysteries. She describes the turning points in her early life that set her on the path of inquiry into the intellectual and the spiritual. From her unique perspective of pairing science and spirituality, she explains what we can expect in the near future as multiple advanced technologies, from A.I. to nanobots, come online in the mainstream collective. Plus, she reveals what we can expect in Seasons 1 and 2 of her series, Mystery Teachings.
teaser: Theresa Bullard invites us into the events of her life that led to her earning a Ph.D. in physics, becoming an initiate in a modern mystery school lineage, and to teaching the mysteries.

title: Taking Your Place in the Universe with Steven Ross
body:
A time is coming where you may feel the calling to take your place in the universe and accept your spiritual gifts. You only need to be open, willing, and ready to make that choice. Steven Ross describes the circumstances that pulled him away from a potential life as a professional athlete and propelled him onto a path where he became committed to help others.  He explains that the same type of opportunity is becoming available to many more people, now, as the veil between the worlds thins. Those who answer the call will begin developing a relationship with their own higher being and come into alignment with the things that their soul finds beautiful. 

Steven A. Ross, PhD is co-founder and CEO of the World Research Foundation. For nearly 40 years he has researched and lectured around the world. He has delivered over 200 lectures making presentations to various worldwide government agencies, hospital networks, and has been interviewed on more than 150 radio programs and 15 regional and national television programs. He has been an expert witness for the City of Los Angeles and consulted for the insurance industry.
teaser: A time is coming where you may feel the calling to take your place in the universe and accept your spiritual gifts.

title: A New Energy Medicine Revolution with Glenn Streeter
body: Since the electric revolution of the 1800s, technologies purporting healing properties have inundated the world. Some were nothing more than snake oil, others have proven profound efficacy. Glenn Streeter takes us through the history of past inventions to the cutting edge of advances in modern energy medicine tech. He reveals that some of the most advanced devices work on a multidimensional level, extending into one’s history, including past lives. This technology may become even more important for our continued wellbeing as our world is increasingly besieged with new types of EMF emissions.
teaser: Glenn Streeter explores the history of inventions from the 1800s to advanced technology that operates on a multidimensional level.

title: Moving to a Green Economy with Martin Ogle
body: What would it take to seamlessly connect with Mother Earth and create a thriving economy that enables us to live in homeostasis with the environment around us?  Martin Ogle, a naturalist with a degree in wildlife science, offers us a wise and grounded discussion to explain why we need to change our economy and society to be more in alignment with our world. This is about honoring diversity, not just among humans, but in the environment as well. Plus we need a willingness to start talking to each other to find viable solutions for everyone.
teaser: Join the conversation that can move us to honor the biodiversity of the environment and create a thriving economy.

title: Working Through Trauma with Tiffany Barsotti
body:
Tiffany Barsotti shares the harrowing story of her upbringing, highlighting the dark times that gave her the strength and wisdom she needed to overcome the trauma and begin developing spiritual maturity. As many people endure a life filled with fear and trauma, these negative states become the default programming deep in the subconscious. There is a way to step back and put the brake on these negative emotional reactions so that you are no longer an effect of these situations. There is no easy way out of this, but there are ways that we can begin to override our natural fear complex and develop the spiritual maturation need even at the societal level. 

Rev. Tiffany Barsotti is a spiritual, medical counselor and researcher at Heal and Thrive in Encinitas, California. She received her Masters of Theology in Energy Medicine with special emphasis in Medical and Spiritual Counseling from Holos University Graduate Seminary. Tiffany is a clinician and researcher of subtle energy, biofield therapies and energy psychology. With her wide use of various subtle energy devices and her spiritual and intuitive guidance, she serves as an integrative practitioner working alongside medical doctors, naturopaths, osteopaths and allied professionals.
teaser: Tiffany Barsotti recounts how she put the brakes on negative emotional reactions to overcome the effects of fear.

title: Empowering Your Energy Field with Randy Veitenheimer
body:
Randy Veitenheimer helps people to reclaim their own authenticity, which empowers their body and being back into healthy states. He does this by measuring the energy field surrounding a person, which reveals one’s level of health and resilience against illness. Then, he helps them to increase the size and strength of their energy field, which can impact every area of their life. He offers simple techniques that you can begin using, today. 

If you liked this interview, check out Randy's Gaia Original series 'Quantum Effect'.
teaser: Randy Veitenheimer helps people to reclaim their own authenticity, which empowers the energy field surrounding a person, which bolsters one’s level of health and resilience against illness.

title: Channeling THEO: Reaching into the 5th Dimension with Sheila Gillette
body: Sheila Gillette returns, bringing the wisdom of the Theo group to discuss the importance of soul integration and releasing limiting beliefs, because humanity is going through a shift in consciousness that has never been experienced before. As our technology is progressing, we are ready to expand our awareness into the 5th dimension, bringing a culmination of our gifts to the world as awakened beings. As they discuss the ancient culture of Atlantis, we may see some parallels of our world to come, with the world that once was.
teaser: Discover the parallels that connect our current shift in consciousness to the ancient culture of Atlantis. Sheila Gillette returns bringing the wisdom of the Theo group to discuss the importance of soul integration.

title: The Spiritually Confident Man with Zeus Yiamouyiannis
body:
You don’t need to get rid of your manhood to become spiritual. As the old ways of the patriarchy fall apart, men are struggling to find their place as we are all working to develop a new way of living, together.  Zeus Yiamouyiannis calls men to move beyond the competition built into the old models of masculinity and become spiritually confident through cooperation and collaboration. He explains that we can do this by connecting to our own unique genius and bringing that into the world as cocreators. 

Zeus Yiamouyiannis, Ph.D., is founder and chief operator of CitizenZeus.com. Dr. Zeus is a learning consultant and professional developer who transforms the ability of individuals and companies to learn how they learn. His customized coaching multiplies the value of current organization and training, accelerates performance, sparks useful conceptual thinking, identifies gaps, applies strengths, and improves communication, collaboration, and time effectiveness.
teaser: Move beyond old models and systems of competitive masculine energy. Zeus Yiamouyiannis explains how to connect to our own unique genius and develop new models of cooperation and collaboration.

title: Suppression of Falun Gong with Mike Chen
body: Can a spiritual practice be threatening to a powerful government? Throughout his life, signs pointed the way for Mike Chen to dive into traditional Qi Gong practice. All along the way, he resisted, until it became obvious that the religious and philosophical movement of Falun Gong was to become an integral part of his life. This has given him an inside view into the extent the Chinese government will go to suppress Falun Gong and its followers, including false flags, internet trolls, and the human rights violations of its practitioners. The practice was initially supported by the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), but by the mid-to-late 1990s, the government increasingly viewed Falun Gong as an evil cult and threat to China. It shares some of the integral Buddhist philosophies and principles that are a part of this Asian practice. Falun Gong has helped many, including Chinese people, lead peaceful and enlightened spiritual lives.
teaser: Discover the extent to which the Chinese government would go to suppress the Buddhist philosophies and principles of the Falun Gong movement. Mike Chen shares his experiences with false flags, internet trolls, and arrests.

title: Conscious Evolution with Incredible Love with Tim Freke
body: A shift is happening to the whole of humanity. As conscious beings, it is our job to intentionally commence this progression of the soul, together. Tim Freke, a philosopher with a bigger vision of who we are as human beings, presents his evolutionary philosophy that takes us beyond biology and into our soul story. This involves a new phase of evolution, that of the soul, so that we can realize our emergent deepest potentialities. This comes with a development of conscious-oneness and incredible love.
teaser: Tim Freke presents his evolutionary philosophy of conscious evolution with incredible love, that takes us beyond biology and into our soul story.

title: Empathic Connections with Lucid Dreams with Jared Zeizel
body:
Each one of us has a deep and primal need to tell our stories and know that we are heard. Jared Zeizel reveals that the storytelling of our dreams is just as important, as these stories connect us to each other at an empathic level. He explains that dreams, good and bad, are a mirror to our selves and the cultures we live in. By discussing our dreams, we may gain the subtle clues we need to fix our own problems and begin alleviating our collective anxiety about the world we face, every day. He also shares ways we can remember our dreams and some useful tips to become a lucid dreamer. 

Jared Zeizel is a published author, award winning writer, filmmaker and avid lucid dreamer. Upon its release, his book, A Field Guide to Lucid Dreaming, became an indie bestseller and is now available in eleven  languages. He has an insatiable appetite for the unknown, loves applying metaphors to an ever confusing world and finds great solace in baking pies.
teaser: Gain the subtle clues we need to fix our own problems and begin alleviating our collective anxiety about the world we face. Jared Zeizel explains that dreams, good and bad, are a mirror to our selves and the cultures we live in.

title: Fasting for Self-Healing with Dr. Edward Group, DC
body: Dr. Edward Group, DC, discusses the body’s self-healing mechanisms that are activated when we engage in different types of fasting, including Ketogenic diet, intermittent fasting, and the water-only fast. New studies confirm the age-old notion that fasting slow illness and disease by boosting the immune system. He explains that this can be somewhat controversial, as many practitioners are taught to only treat the symptoms rather than the cause, so these cleansing and fasting techniques are not being taught in medical schools.
teaser: Dr. Edward Group, DC, discusses the body’s self-healing mechanisms that are activated when we engage in different types of fasting, including Ketogenic diet, intermittent fasting, and the water-only fast.

title: Out of Body Experiences with Luis Minero
body: Learning to be free from the confines of the physical reality may be the most important step we can take in our spiritual evolution. Luis Minero has a natural talent for inducing out of body experiences, and he has taught people all over the world how to explore the subtle realms of existence. From strange physics to anomalous experiences we examine what it is like to explore the landscape in other dimensions, once consciousness has been loosened from the corporeal world.
teaser: Learning to be free from the confines of the physical reality may be the most important step we can take in our spiritual evolution. Luis Minero shares how we can explore the subtle realms of existence through out of body experiences.

title: The Dharma Method with Simon Chokoisky
body: We each take one of five roads through life, which Simon Chokoisky calls the Five Dharma Types. When you understand which of these archetypes guides your life, you better understand what type of person you are, in terms of engaging your life. Now, we go deeper into these aspects with the Dharma Method, to explore various aspects of these dharma types, how they evolve and devolve, as well as different forms of meditation you can use to better engage your life's purpose.
teaser: What is your road, through life? Simon Chokoisky takes us deeper into five archetypes of living through the Dharma method. Explore these types, how they evolve & devolve, and meditation to better engage your life’s purpose.

title: The Truth of Good & Evil with Neil Kramer
body:
Neil Kramer returns to discuss the true nature of good and evil and gives us his take on how these manifest in reality. Through this discussion, he calls us to return to source to see the absolute nature of good and evil to better understand the influences of negative forces. He tells us that there are very real supernatural powers which are actively working to convince us to give over our true divine power to them, under the guise of doing good. This may come in the form of moral relativism obscuring our understanding of good and evil. 

Neil Kramer is a British philosopher and esotericist whose focus is chiefly on spirituality, metaphysics, mysticism, freedom, and inner development. Neil discusses many of the social, cultural, and political influences in our lives, and what we can do to change them with his unique blend of lucidity, honesty, and insight. He shares his philosophy and practice in writings, recordings, interviews, and lectures, as well as in personal teachings and group workshops.
teaser: Neil Kramer returns to discuss the true nature of good and evil and gives us his take on how these manifest in reality. This may come in the form of moral relativism, or supernatural forces, obscuring our understanding of good and evil.

title: Unblocking Your True Purpose with Jean Slatter
body: You know you came to this world to fulfill a higher purpose. But maybe you are stuck trying to find what that is. Jean Slatter discusses the pitfalls and challenges we all face as we struggle to overcome the blockages to discovering and fulfilling our life’s purpose. She details the four questions we need to ask our higher self, how to address the expectations of others, and surmount the deep programming we have endured since childhood. She cautions us to keep in mind that sometimes these challenges are all a part of the plan. Learning to tune into the higher part of you, that actually knows what is going on, helps to bring the clarity you seek.
teaser: Jean Slatter discusses the challenges we all face as we struggle with the blockages to fulfilling our life’s purpose. Learning to tune into the higher part of you, that actually knows what is going on, helps to bring the clarity you seek.

title: Divination for a Magical Life with Radleigh Valentine
body: Discover your own divine language, using the tools that can boost your intuitive capabilities. In his latest book, Compendium of Magical Things, Radleigh Valentine explores a wide array of divination methods, such as Tarot cards, runes, numerology, and I Ching. His goal is to take the fear out of these spiritual tools so that we can discover the spark of the divine within and start living a magical life.
teaser: Radleigh Valentine explores a wide array of divination methods, such as Tarot cards, runes, numerology, and I Ching. His goal is to take the away the fear so that we can discover the spark of the divine within and live a magical life.

title: EMF & the Energy of Life with Konstantin Korotkov
body: Does our health really suffer from electromagnetic fields (EMF)? Konstantin Korokov, a biophysicists pioneering advances in the field of electro-photonics, discusses how various biological fields, generated by the body, can be influenced by the energy of our environment. This includes Earth’s natural electromagnetic field and artificially produced radiation from cellphones, WIFI, and Bluetooth. His research shows us how we can live in balance with these layers of EMF while maintaining a healthy state of wellbeing.
teaser: Does our health really suffer from electromagnetic fields (EMF)? Biophysicist Konstantin Korokovdiscusses how various biological fields can be influenced by the energy of our environment

title: Raising Dopamine with THINK with Lana Morrow
body:
Is there a simple solution to kicking our brains into a higher gear, giving us greater focus amid a world of increasing distractions? Neuroscientist and neuropsychologist Lana Morrow has found a way to do just that, with a non-invasive device she invented, called THINK. For us to better understand how this works, she delves into the workings of our brain, explaining the role of dopamine and the amygdala. She explains that video games and social media have a negative impact upon brain function, and that we can mitigate these effects. Astonishingly, she has discovered that those who use her techniques report an increased connection with the unity field, as described by quantum scientists and mystics, alike.

Dr. Lana Morrow, Ph.D. is an award winning functional medicine neuroscientist, Founder, CEO, and creator of THINK system, and is an expert in dopamine, executive functions, and neurotechnology.  She has worked with students, diplomats, actors, European royalty, and Fortune 500 CEOs in Manhattan, Paris and Rome.
teaser: Is there a simple solution to kicking our brains into a higher gear? Neuroscientist and neuropsychologist, Lana Morrow has found a way to do just that, with a non-invasive device she invented, called THINK.

title: Discover Your Psychic Gifts with Cyndi Dale
body: What are your psychic gifts? Cyndi Dale knows that you have them, maybe you just have not discovered them, yet. She offers an in-depth explanation of our innate psychic abilities, known as the clair senses, and reveals the various ways we receive subtle information. Once you know your method of communication, she discusses different types of spiritual beings that you can interact with, using your intuitive abilities. From dead people to interdimensional beings & aliens, even higher parts of the mind, they all communicate with the clair senses. Once you know yours, it gets easier to tune in.
teaser: What are your psychic gifts? Cyndi Dale offers an in-depth explanation of our innate psychic abilities, known as the clair senses, and reveals the various ways we receive subtle information.

title: Evidence of Giants in Sardinia
body: Is there an ancient connection between Atlantis, giants and the history of a small island in Italy? Paola Harris and Freddy Silva join Regina Meredith in this first segment of a special three-part investigation, filmed on location, to explore the remnants of an ancient advanced civilization that once occupied the little-known island of Sardinia, Italy. All across the island we find thousands of stone structures, constructed hundreds of thousands of years ago, by a civilization lost to history, but remembered by local myths and legends. We explore ancient ruins too large for humans, examine the bones of giants found on the island, and explore the forbidden history of the lost giants of Atlantis who may have settled here after the great deluge.
teaser: Is there an ancient connection between Atlantis, giants and the history of a small island in Italy? Paola Harris and Freddy Silva join Regina Meredith in this first segment of a special three-part investigation, filmed on location, to explore the remnants of an ancient advanced civilization that once occupied the island of Sardinia.

title: The Atlantis-Sardinia Cosmic Connection
body: Is there proof that survivors from Atlantis rebuilt civilization 3,000 years after the great deluge? In part two of our three-part investigation, Freddy Silva and Regina Meredith dig deeper into the archeo-astronomy of giant stone structures, built hundreds of thousands of years ago on the island of Sardinia, Italy. They take us on excursions to explore these sites, called nuraghe, which were built with powerful astronomical alignments and constructed in proportions far too large for normal-sized humans. As they look even deeper into the local legends, language, and symbology, they uncover the Atlantis-Sardinia interface revealing the presence of giants living among burgeoning human civilizations.
teaser: Is there proof that survivors from Atlantis rebuilt civilization 3,000 years after the great deluge? In part two of our three-part investigation, Freddy Silva and Regina Meredith dig deeper into the archeo-astronomy of giant stone structures.

title: Sardinia and the Sacred Feminine
body: Can the Book of Enoch unlock the secrets of the fall of Atlantis and the giants of Sardinia? In our final segment of our three-part investigation, Freddy Silva, Paola Harris, and Regina Meredith explore an ancient monument dedicated to the sacred feminine. Within the chambers of this site, rituals were performed to initiate a woman into the various stages of her life. As we explore the details of these ancient rites, we find parallels within the Book of Enoch and the motivations of the Annunaki and Nephilim. What we uncover may finally put the pieces together of an ancient puzzle that reveals a lost history of the human race and parallel civilizations that helped us advance into the world we have become.
teaser: Can the Book of Enoch unlock the secrets of the fall of Atlantis and the giants of Sardinia? In our final segment of our three-part investigation, Freddy Silva, Paola Harris, and Regina Meredith explore an ancient monument dedicated to the sacred feminine.

title: Wellbeing with Microbes with Compton Rom
body: We are not getting the nutrition our bodies need from the foods we eat. In fact, we have become so disconnected from nature, that the things we eat can have unintended effects upon our wellbeing. Compton Rom returns to reveal the profound healing available to us deep within the body’s microbiomes. Working with your microbes can help you tune into nature’s optimal blueprint for health. He offers tips on finding the right kind of foods for creating and maintaining healthy states and reveals a taste of the advances that will affect our wellbeing in the very near future.
teaser: Compton Rom reveals the profound healing available to us deep within the body’s microbiomes. He offers tips on finding the right kind of foods for creating and maintaining healthy states and a taste of the future of our wellbeing.

title: Patterns of Paranormal Places with Jerry Wills
body: Some of the strangest places on our planet are even stranger than we can imagine. If all of these things are a bleed through from a parallel reality, there should be an energy trace to confirm such an intersection. Jerry Wills has investigated many locations of reported phenomena such as bigfoots, UFOs, missing people and spook lights, and has found a pattern. He discusses why these things happen where they do, the measurable energy surrounding these events, and what we can do to detect and predict paranormal occurrences.
teaser: Some of the strangest places on our planet are even stranger than we can imagine. Jerry Wills has investigated many locations of reported phenomena such as bigfoots, UFOs, missing people and spook lights, and has found a pattern.

title: Shamanic Soul Retrieval with Sandra Ingerman
body: The wound is the best place for the light to enter your being, and it may take the work of a shaman to help you fully heal. Sandra Ingerman, a shamanic healer, reveals the importance of soul retrieval for repairing of one’s being. She discusses the nature of the soul, how it can become fractured over many reincarnations, and how we are protected in moments of trauma. This is not just something we need individually, but the world is experiencing a collective loss of soul. As we undertake our own healing, we affect global soul retrieval.
teaser: Sandra Ingerman, a shamanic healer, reveals the importance of soul retrieval for repairing of one’s being. She discusses the nature of the soul, how it can become fractured over many reincarnations, and how we are protected in moments of trauma.

title: Manifesting Inner Wealth with Belinda Womack
body: There really is something blocking you from achieving the wealth that you seek, and it is deep within. Belinda Womack returns to channel archangels and financial masters to help you tap into your own creative power and achieve true inner wealth. This is a concept which follows the principle: so within, so without. When you connect with the essence of the creative divine feminine, you connect with your soul. This reveals what you were brought here to create, then mirrored by archangel Gaia in the world around you.
teaser: There really is something blocking you from achieving the wealth that you seek, and it is deep within. Belinda Womack returns to channel archangels and financial masters to help you tap into your own creative power and achieve true inner wealth.

title: Conscious Economics with Charles Eisenstein
body: The state of our economy is shaky, but this can be a time of opportunity for the ascent of humanity. Charles Eisenstein, author of Sacred Economics, explains that the old agreements, which founded our current economy, no longer resonate with the consciousness emerging on Earth. We tend to look for solutions that are too simplistic for the complex problems that we are trying to solve. This results in blaming a “bad guy” for all of our problems, which is a symptom of deeper conditions. Rather than focusing entirely on the problems, he offers a vision which makes use of principles from gifting economies and time banking, as a bridge to a future economy that works for all.
teaser: Charles Eisenstein explains that the old agreements, which founded our current economy, no longer resonate with the consciousness emerging on Earth. He offers a vision of a future economy that works for all.

title: Egyptian Postures of Power with Jason Quitt
body: Could ancient Egyptian sculptures be depictions of a powerful energetic practice that can help you to know your own energies, enhance your gifts, and life force? Jason Quitt guides us through his exploration of Qigong, which showed him how to clear pain from his body, using energy. As he grew adept in his practice, a dream led him to powerful postures that he only found in Egyptian artworks. This led him to discover a code for the human body, where certain positions can affect its electromagnetic fields with specific intentions.
teaser: Could ancient Egyptian sculptures be depictions of a powerful energetic practice that can help you enhance your gifts and life force? Jason Quitt explains that certain positions can affect the body’s electromagnetic fields with specific intentions.

title: Atlantis Will Rise with Raymond Tarpey
body: Raymond Tarpey reveals the Mayan perspective for our times: the challenges, dangers and incredible opportunities we are facing.  He explains that each of us has a unique responsibility as we are all charged with becoming a shaman, empowered by our own gifts. This means we need to make a choice: to persist in separating ourselves from the natural world or engage with the wisdom of the Earth. Either way, Atlantis will rise again, and we can decide how to respond.
teaser: Raymond Tarpey reveals the Mayan perspective for our times: the challenges, dangers and incredible opportunities we are facing.  He explains that each of us has a unique responsibility as we are all charged with becoming a shaman.

title: Metatron & a Christed Planet with Joan Walker
body: Failing to embody our spiritual growth may be the piece holding us back from realizing our full creative potential. Joan Walker returns to channel Lord Metatron who tells us that if we do not like our lives, we have the ability to change it. To do this, we must learn to raise consciousness by improving the health and wellbeing of the body. As you raise your consciousness you also help to raise a Christed planet that reflects the divinity of who we really are.
teaser: Joan Walker returns to channel Lord Metatron who tells us that if we do not like our lives, we have the ability to change it. To do this, we must learn to raise consciousness by improving the health and wellbeing of the body.

title: 4th Dimensional Reptilian Influence with Barbara Hand Clow
body: Modern technology is being used to polarize everyone on Earth. But we can choose to use it to bring us together. Barbara Hand Clow explains how the human race has long been under the influence of reptilian beings in the fourth dimension, including the Annunaki, who seek to keep us separate and in a state of conflict. From the Illuminati to the United Nations, they have infiltrated different groups in the physical world. But we have the choice to rise above our primitive belief systems, pair our conscious evolution with technologies being developed, and thus awaken. In essence, we can recover the lost story of who we really are and free ourselves from the controlling influence of these extraterrestrial dimensional beings. Are reptilian aliens from another dimension corrupting society, or is this a conspiracy theory? You decide.
teaser: Barbara Hand Clow explains that our society has long been under the influence of reptilian beings in the fourth dimension, including the Annunaki, who seek to keep us separate and in a state of conflict. But we have the choice to rise above the influence.

title: Billy Carson: Origin Stories
body: Billy Carson shares his story of perseverance through the toughest of times, to bring forbidden knowledge to the world. We delve into his life’s story to learn the circumstances that motivated him to become a successful entrepreneur, all the while exploring and exposing deep knowledge that has been hidden from most of humanity. Beyond his personal story, we explore the origins of humanity at the hand of the Annunaki, how to protect ourselves from a diminished magnetic atmosphere, and the mysteries of space-faring civilizations.
teaser: Billy Carson shares his story of perseverance through the toughest of times, to bring forbidden knowledge to the world.

title: Frequencies of Healing with Gail Lynn
body: The more we come to understand that we are beings of energy, the more important it becomes that we explore the healing potential of frequencies. Gail Lynn, inventor of the Harmonic Egg, discusses how she uses sound and light waves to help her clients bring their bodies into homeostasis. We come away with a better understanding of how to address health concerns such as PTSD, depression, cancer and heart conditions using the healing power of light and sound.
teaser: The more we come to understand that we are beings of energy, the more important it becomes that we explore the healing potential of frequencies. Gail Lynn discusses how she uses sound and light waves to help her clients heal.

title: Dreaming Parallel Realities with Robert Moss
body: Have you ever travelled to another reality, or met an alternate version of yourself? As science comes to terms with the many worlds theory, Robert Moss has already identified a means of exploring parallel realities through dreaming. He explains, that as we move between different states of consciousness, we can move through different realms and worlds. Doing this, we can interact with spirits, egregors, and daimons who inhabit these realms. A deft mind, who has developed dreaming as a spiritual practice, can learn to traverse parallel realities, encounter different versions of themselves, and connect with different types of beings.
teaser: Have you ever travelled to another reality, or met an alternate version of yourself? As science comes to terms with the many worlds theory, Robert Moss has already identified a means of exploring parallel realities through dreaming.

title: Sacred Balinese Healing with Candace Silvers
body: Human behavioral expert and lifestyle coach Candace Silvers shares some of the miraculous healing techniques used by Balinese master healers. In her travels, she has observed many of these, firsthand. Some of these experiences have been recorded in the documentary, 6th Floor: Expanding Possibility. As she works to bring these modalities to a greater audience, we see where this old-world medicine meets the new world, highlighting the missing links in modern medicine.
teaser: Human behavioral expert and lifestyle coach Candace Silvers shares some of the miraculous healing techniques used by Balinese master healers.

title: Making a Soviet Spy with Jack Barsky
body: We have all seen spy movies from the cold war era where Soviet and U.S. spies go head-to-head to conquer or free the world. Underlying these fictional accounts are the lives of real human beings, caught in a web of politics and power plays. Jack Barsky was one such individual, trained by the Soviet government to infiltrate the U.S. In part one of his story, we learn what it takes for someone to become a rising star within the KGB, the degrees of indoctrination he received, and what it was like to explore the Western world for the first time.
teaser: Jack Barsky was trained by the Soviet government as a spy, sent to infiltrate the U.S. In part one of his story, we learn what it takes for someone to become a rising star within the KGB and the degrees of indoctrination he received.

title: Life as a Soviet Spy with Jack Barsky
body:
After gaining the skills he needed to become a top spy with the KGB, Jack Barsky is assigned to infiltrate the US. In this second part of the interview, we follow the steps he took to arrive in the U.S. and start the process of posing as an American citizen. As the years passed, the discomfort of his secret identity grew, until relief finally came when he was caught by the FBI.  This gives him a unique perspective on the polarization of ideologies that is diving the U.S., and the world, apart. 

We also hear from his American daughter, Chelsea, who at that age of 19 first found out her dad was a soviet spy. She shares many of the shocking discoveries that came after this revelation.
teaser: After gaining the skills he needed to become a top spy with the KGB, Jack Barsky is assigned to infiltrate the US. In part two of the interview, we follow the steps he took to arrive in the U.S. and start the process of posing as an American citizen.

title: Channeling Ascended Beings with Paul Selig
body: Paul Selig, channeling ascended beings, helps us to move beyond the masks we have been wearing our whole lives, to embrace the unknown, and access the true self that operates in the realm of knowing. We live in times where people are waking up to the possibility of becoming more than they ever thought they could be. This means reaching into the upper octaves of existence and embracing life as an expression of the true self.
teaser: Paul Selig, channeling ascended beings, helps us to move beyond the masks we have been wearing our whole lives, to embrace the unknown, and access the true self that operates in the realm of knowing.

title: Understanding the Mandela Effect with Cynthia Sue Larson
body: Do you remember something differently than it appears to be today? You are not going crazy. This so-called Mandela Effect is routinely observed by more and more people and Cynthia Sue Larson may have an explanation. She understands our reality as an interconnected web of consciousness that reflects back upon itself. As we make shifts in our perception, we also make shifts in our reality. She believes that the explanation lies understanding consciousness at the quantum level where everything is energy and probability waves that collapse into the reality we observe.
teaser: Do you remember something differently than it appears to be today? You are not going crazy. This so-called Mandela Effect is routinely observed by more and more people and Cynthia Sue Larson may have an explanation.

title: Principles of Human Design with Dirk Nellens
body: Human Design is one of the newest forms of divination, as it was revealed to Ra Uru Hu, in 1987 with a download that lasted 8 days. Now it is having a powerful impact upon the world. Human Design reveals the hardwiring that makes us human, and the various expressions of that wiring that makes us individuals. Dirk Nellens takes us deeper into these principles by analyzing Regina Meredith’ chart to explain the channels and power centers which make up the energetic architecture of the human being.
teaser: Dirk Nellens takes us deeper into these principles of Human Design by analyzing Regina Meredith’ chart to explain the channels and power centers which make up the energetic architecture of the human being.

title: Journey to an Awakened Life with Billy Carson
body: The conversation with Billy Carson continues, from part one, as we learn that the moment he emerged into the world, he was an awakened being. His brilliance during his youth shined through the darkness of the world around him. Over the years, he rose from poverty to build successful businesses and establish programs that help many youths discover their own lives of brilliance. But his inspiration does not stop there as he seeks to reveal the great mysteries of forbidden knowledge hidden from the masses, for millennia. His story serves as an inspiring reminder that no matter the circumstances, we can rise out of the darkness and become a beacon of hope.
teaser: From the moment he emerged into the world, Billy Carson was awakened. His story serves as an inspiring reminder that no matter the circumstances, we can rise out of the darkness and become a beacon of hope.

title: Divining Your Truth with Jean Slatter
body:
With information and disinformation coming at us from so many sources, it is becoming very difficult to sort out the truth. Author Jean Slatter suggests that rather than worrying about absolute truth it is more important to seek out your own truth — the truth you need this moment in your life; the truth that can show you the next step in your own development. And she explains how you can use your own body as a divination device. We handle toxic information in different organs of the body, for example, and when you identify the organ that matches your unease, you can choose nutrients or activity to support that organ. You can also seek your truth through personal dowsing, using just your fingers.

 The truth of who we are as spiritual beings is alive and well and present, yet we often fail to see it. But nothing or no one is going to save us; we have to empower ourselves.
teaser: With information and disinformation coming at us from so many sources, it is becoming very difficult to sort out the truth. Author Jean Slatter suggests that rather than worrying about absolute truth it is more important to seek out your own truth — the truth you need this moment in your life.

title: Why the Bleep Do We Suffer!? with William Arntz
body: What the bleep do we know about suffering, anyway? That’s the subject of this conversation with William Arntz, director of the hugely successful film, What the BLEEP Do we Know!?, and the author of How to Suffer . . . in 10 Easy Steps. What began as a gentle satire on self-help books turned into a serious inquiry into suffering — what it is and how to deal with it. Glossing over it, for example, makes it hide in the subconscious, where it can wreak havoc. In his light-hearted way, Arntz discusses the power of “not now” and reveals his useful tool, the “Sufferometer,” where every day you put a number on your suffering. When, in reflection, you find that number self-indulgent and embarrassingly high, you may find suffering loosening its grip.
teaser: What the bleep do we know about suffering, anyway? That’s the subject of this conversation with William Arntz, director of the hugely successful film, What the BLEEP Do we Know!?, and the author of How to Suffer . . . in 10 Easy Steps.

title: Economy: From Corrupt to Connected with Zeus Yiamouyiannis
body: As the Covid-19 pandemic ground the global economy to a virtual halt, could it possibly contain a hidden gift? In figuring out how to put things back together, can we the people take the opportunity to reflect on what matters and make important choices? According to Zeus Yiamouyiannis, author of Transforming Economy: From Corrupted Capitalism to Connected Communities, in corrupted capitalism, people serve money, rather than the other way around. With non-corrupt capitalism, the highest priorities are given to such concerns as health, nature, a truly healthy social life, and the ability for families to come together. In such a system, money serves people and communities, so, for example, corporations would stop cutting corners to maximize profits while endangering health and safety. Here’s a chance to ask yourself how we ended up in such an unsustainable way of life, and where we can go from here?
teaser: As the Covid-19 pandemic ground the global economy to a virtual halt, could it possibly contain a hidden gift? In figuring out how to put things back together, can we the people take the opportunity to reflect on what matters and make important choices?

title: Runes for Transformation with Kaedrich Olsen
body: What if you could transform your life with the utterance of a sacred sound? Runic Scholar, Kaedrich Olsen discusses the historical use of runes for transformation and manifestation, through rune song. This is an Old Norse magical system, known as Galdr, where the runes were sung to bring their power to life through sound and intention. He shares practical ways to bring this form of magic in your life. He also discusses how men can connect with archetypes of the sacred masculine to break free from toxic models of masculinity and start living a more sacred life.
teaser: What if you could transform your life with the utterance of a sacred sound? Runic Scholar, Kaedrich Olsen discusses the historical use of runes for transformation and manifestation, through rune song.

title: Shamanic Manifestation with Jan Engels-Smith
body: Is it possible to shift your reality with shamanic manifestation? Jan Engels-Smith, a shamanic practitioner with a background in psychotherapy, has led many of her clients on journeys of discovery that have resulted in healing both mind and body. She explains how the language we use helps to invoke the reality we experience, as the web that connects all things works through the frequencies of your emotions and consciousness. This means that you can move to change your own world, as well as experience a collective shift of consciousness upward.
teaser: Is it possible to shift your reality with shamanic manifestation? Jan Engels-Smith, a shamanic practitioner with a background in psychotherapy, has led many of her clients on journeys of discovery that have resulted in healing both mind and body.

title: The Wisdom of Atlantis and Lemuria with Tom T. Moore
body: Millennia ago, Lemuria and Atlantis were wiped from our planet, but the wisdom of these civilizations live on with us today. In this interview, Regina Meredith and Tom T. Moore discuss their experiences of past lives in Atlantis and Lemuria and how tapping into the wisdom of those times directly connects to humanity's work in the present and future. As we each follow the paths of our soul contracts, we have the potential to end all conflict in the world, moving humanity to a higher vibration in service of the greater good.
teaser: In this interview, Regina Meredith and Tom T. Moore discuss their experiences of past lives in Atlantis and Lemuria and how tapping into the wisdom of those times directly connects to humanity's work in the present and future.

title: Alien Autopsy: Truth Revealed with Paola Harris
body:
The Alien Autopsy ignited controversy as one of the first pieces of evidence for alien contact. 25 years later, Paola Harris and Italian researcher Maurizio Baiata bring forth the evidence gathered to prove this leaked film is indeed authentic. 

In this conversation, Regina Meredith speaks with researcher Paola Harris and Maurizio Baiata, an Italian journalist and UFO researcher who was one of the first to see the autopsy footage. They compare what was known then, with what has been discovered since. This initial discovery has been followed by many others, adding to the evidence that we are not alone.
teaser: The Alien Autopsy was one of the first pieces of evidence for alien contact, and it has been shown to be real. Over 25 years ago, this leaked alien autopsy film opened questions about the reality of aliens among us.

title: Inside Project Blue Book with Paul Hynek
body: What did the government keep hidden about UFOs in the past century? In the 1950s, Dr. J. Allan Hynek, a professor of astronomy, was recruited by the US Air Force to investigate UFO sightings and other alien phenomena. His son, Paul Hynek, discusses his father's real-life experiences as a scientist with the military's Project Blue Book and his encounters of strange phenomena, which were later adapted into a dramatic series.  Paul recounts his own memories with ufologists and other scientists he came to know through his father's work.
teaser: What did the government keep hidden about UFOs in the past century? In the 1950s, Dr. J. Allan Hynek, a professor of astronomy, was recruited by the US Air Force to investigate UFO sightings.

title: Overcoming Anxiety with Tiffany Barsotti
body: Our world has become uncertain. How do we stay at peace? Tiffany Barsotti explains how we can turn that uncertainty and anxiety into an opportunity by recognizing the choices we can make to be in control of our reactions. This means we can find growth and healing where we are in the present moment, without being affected by anxiety in the surrounding world.
teaser: Our world has become uncertain. How do we stay at peace? Tiffany Barsotti explains how we can turn that uncertainty and anxiety into an opportunity by recognizing the choices we can make to be in control of our reactions.

title: Breaking Emotional Patterns with Bill McKenna
body: Would you like to break free of your pain and anxiety? Bill McKenna explains his Cognomovement technique, a physical modality that breaks the repetitive loop of negative experiences that affect the mind and body. Using case studies from his clients, Bill demonstrates how real change is made in the energetic field when we release negative emotions like anger and resentment. Learn how changing your neurological patterns will help you recognize and change your experiences now.
teaser: Would you like to break free of your pain and anxiety? Learn how changing your neurological patterns will help you recognize and change your experiences now.

title: Everyday Magic with Mitch Horowitz
body: Magic is possible every day. Simply put out into the world what you would like to return. Mitch Horowitz, author of the books The Miracle Club and Miracle Habits, discusses the magical principle of reciprocity, which means that what you choose will return to you. In a shifting world, we can manifest changes in our own lives by using our desire and Will to redirect our focus to a positive direction.
teaser: Magic is possible every day. Simply put out into the world what you would like to return. Mitch Horowitz, author of the books The Miracle Club and Miracle Habits, discusses the magical principle of reciprocity, which means that what you choose will return to you.

title: Ninth Wave of Consciousness with Carl Johan Calleman
body: We live in a time when our phase of consciousness can divide the world or lead to unity on our planet. Renowned researcher Carl Johan Calleman has studied and written about the Mayan calendar for many years. He explains how the plumed serpent found in ancient Mayan culture symbolizes both the Tree of Life and a sine wave of consciousness emanating from the center of the universe. There are nine quantum states each carried by a wave, and the ninth wave symbolizes a unified connection that we can all reach.
teaser: Renowned researcher Carl Johan Calleman explains how the plumed serpent found in ancient Mayan culture symbolizes both the Tree of Life and a sine wave of consciousness emanating from the center of the universe. There are nine quantum states each carried by a wave, and the ninth wave symbolizes a unified connection that we can all reach.

title: E.T. Encounters Regression with Laurie McDonald
body: Laurie McDonald is a clinical hypnotherapist who helps people uncover and learn from their abduction experiences. Beginning with her mother's traumatic alien encounter when pregnant with Laurie, and her own experiences, she has also been witness to many of these encounters through countless testimonies from abductees. She explains that there are multiple alien races studying humans on our planet, and humanity has been involved with alien wars over the years. It is possible to connect through focused awareness with both malevolent and benevolent alien races to learn about the extraterrestrial realms in our galaxy.
teaser: Laurie McDonald is a clinical hypnotherapist who helps people uncover and learn from their abduction experiences. She explains that it is possible to connect through focused awareness with both malevolent and benevolent alien races to learn about the extraterrestrial realms in our galaxy.

title: When Jesus and Buddha Knew Each Other with Gary Renard
body: Did Jesus and Buddha live multiple lifetimes together? Through his communication with divine messengers and based on his study of A Course in Miracles, Gary Renard brings us tools to connect with spiritual teachers and our own divine source energy. He explains how he learned about the many lifetimes of Jesus and Buddha, who were real historical figures who have lived multiple lives in connection as friends on our planet. Gary Renard is a teacher, speaker, and author of The Disappearance of the Universe.
teaser: Did Jesus and Buddha live multiple lifetimes together? Through his communication with divine messengers and based on his study of A Course in Miracles, Gary Renard brings us tools to connect with spiritual teachers and our own divine source energy.

title: Steering to Your Life's Purpose with Sonia Barrett
body: We can find happiness no matter our circumstances. In this inspiring conversation with Regina Meredith, Sonia Barrett explains that it is our responsibility to find a pathway to where we would like to be. Using her own life as an example, she began a new path with her two children after ending an abusive relationship. She is now a speaker and teacher who works to help others find their true purpose.
teaser: We can find happiness no matter our circumstances. In this inspiring conversation with Regina Meredith, Sonia Barrett explains that it is our responsibility to find a pathway to where we would like to be.

title: Silver Lining of Our Times with Simon Chokoisky
body:
Are we moving now to a brighter future? Even in the most difficult times, there are opportunities to find good fortune. In this conversation with Regina Meredith, Vedic astrologer Simon Chokoisky predicts global trends and changes in the near future, including new innovations with bitcoin currency. He explains that the period of evolution and the unrest we experience presently will, in time, turn to a brighter future in our financial systems and personal lives. 

Simon Chokoisky is the author of several books, including The Dharma Method.
teaser: In this conversation with Regina Meredith, Vedic astrologer Simon Chokoisky predicts global trends and changes in the near future.

title: Orion: Home of the Gods with Freddy Silva
body: There are signs of otherworldly beings everywhere in the ancient world. Were these gods or beings from elsewhere? Freddy Silva has studied many of these signs, from ancient Egypt to the Americas. From petroglyphs to standing stones and temples, he explains that the wisdom found with the symbols of serpent people are keys to humanity's ascension. He reveals that the home of these ancient beings may have been the astronomical region we now call Orion.
teaser: There are signs of otherworldly beings everywhere in the ancient world. Were these gods or beings from elsewhere?

title: Mother Mary & Divine Beings with Marguerite Rigoglioso
body: Stories of humans with divine birth are found throughout the world's sacred history. The most familiar to us may be found in Christian culture with Mother Mary. Marguerite Rigoglioso, a teacher of mystery traditions, explains that parthenogenesis, or birth from a virgin, applies to spiritual focus and priestess energy rather than purity. This universal wisdom can help us understand how to connect to Mother Mary and other divine beings.
teaser: Stories of humans with divine birth are found throughout the world's sacred history. Marguerite Rigoglioso, a teacher of mystery traditions, explains how spiritual focus and wisdom can help us connect to divine beings.

title: Time of the Vulture with Darryl Schoon
body: What are the lessons of the current economic era? Financial analyst Darryl Schoon is the author of Time of the Vulture: How to Survive the Crisis and Prosper in the Process. In this conversation, he shares vivid stories from his time as a student in 1960s California to a prison sentence for selling psychedelics. He has seen many waves of growth and change in our society. He says that the coming "time of the vulture" is the potential for the collapse of our modern currency and banking. That may not be a bad thing, according to Schoon, if we keep faith in our limitless human potential.
teaser: Financial analyst Darryl Schoon says that the coming "time of the vulture" is the potential for the collapse of our modern currency and banking. That may not be a bad thing if we keep faith in our limitless human potential.

title: 12-Chakra Healing with Cyndi Dale
body: Using our intuitive gifts, we can initiate healing through the 12-chakra system. Cyndi Dale, author of Energy Healing, explains that we are energetic beings existing in relation to the universe around us and we can use this connection to align the energy flow through our own chakras. She discusses the possibilities of using affirmational work and energy healing as a means to find and heal the deep causes of emotional trauma.
teaser: Using our intuitive gifts, we can initiate healing through the 12-chakra system. Cyndi Dale, author of Energy Healing, explains that we are energetic beings existing in relation to the universe around us and we can use this connection to align the energy flow through our own chakras.

title: Living at the Speed of 5G with Ben Stewart
body: The world is moving to 5G technology as the speed of information flow increases. Are there dangers to using wireless technology or are there ways to be well in this new world? Ben Stewart brings a refreshing new view on 5G, and shares his perspective on living with electromagnetic fields, the mechanisms of social technology, the positive aspects of connection, and how we can live intentionally to avoid possible harmful effects.
teaser: Ben Stewart brings a refreshing new view on 5G, and shares his perspective on living with electromagnetic fields, the mechanisms of social technology, the positive aspects of connection, and how we can live intentionally to avoid possible harmful effects.

title: From Big Loss to Big Love with Scott Stabile
body: The world around us is full of big love. Scott Stabile explains how his life's work has led him to find happiness everywhere, even when circumstances may seem impossible to overcome. After experiencing a series of tragic losses in his family and struggles as a young adult, he began to follow a steady pathway of loving action, honesty, and compassion. He describes how we can live in love and positivity, responding to even the most difficult times with an open heart.
teaser: The world around us is full of big love. Scott Stabile explains how his life's work has led him to find happiness everywhere, even when circumstances may seem impossible to overcome.

title: Accessing Holistic Telehealth with Donese Worden
body: Good health begins with preventative care, and functional integrative medicine that looks at the whole picture can help you to prevent many health issues and lead a more balanced life. While we may be used to face to face relationships with our doctors, telehealth allows us to take this opportunity to advocate for our own health, and connect with medical professionals at any time.  Dr. Donese Worden, a naturopathic doctor, discusses how telemedicine through the internet has made it easier and faster to access naturopathic and holistic care practices to determine risk factors you may have, and look at the whole picture of your health, including the health of your microbiome.
teaser: Dr. Donese Worden, a naturopathic doctor, discusses how telemedicine through the internet has made it easier and faster to access naturopathic and holistic care practices to determine risk factors you may have, and look at the whole picture of your health, including the health of your microbiome.

title: Nutraceutical Innovations with Dennis Shepherd
body: There is more than one way to get the supplements you may need in your diet. Dennis Shepherd explains how supplement patches can deliver vitamins, herbal extracts such as CBD, and other nutrients through the skin. This technology can have a higher rate of absorption than taking a pill, liquid, or powder, as Shepherd learned in his work as a pathologist. He shares the exciting potential of patches for those with health concerns, including digestive issues, allowing our bodies to better assimilate supplements to balance our health.
teaser: There is more than one way to get the supplements you may need in your diet. Dennis Shepherd explains how supplement patches can deliver vitamins, herbal extracts such as CBD, and other nutrients through the skin.

title: Truth and Disclosure in UFOlogy with Glenn Steckling
body: Can truth prevail in the journey toward disclosure? Glenn Steckling’s search for what is known in the field of UFOlogy has taken him from Project Blue Book to current research. His investigations have hit unexpected roadblocks from precarious infighting within the UFO research community. He explains that even though much has been concealed by opposing forces, trickles of evidence are coming to light, and soon we may see new signs of extraterrestrial life within our own solar system.
teaser: Glenn Steckling explains that even though much has been concealed by opposing forces in UFOlogy, trickles of evidence are coming to light, and soon we may see new signs of extraterrestrial life within our own solar system.

title: Sun: Full Spectrum Healing with Jack Kruse
body: Light, water, and magnetism are essential to our health. As many of us are exposed to more artificial light than natural, we may be missing out on a vital factor to improve our immune system. Dr. Jack Kruse discusses how we can have better energy and vitality through exposure to the sun. He explains that the full spectrum light of the sun goes beyond Vitamin D to have a better antibody response to viruses & bacteria, and helps the body's mitochondria to be energy efficient.
teaser: Light, water, and magnetism are essential to our health. As many of us are exposed to more artificial light than natural, we may be missing out on a vital factor to improve our immune system.

title: Sacred Geometry in Our Lives with Robert Gilbert
body: Sacred Geometry shows us how the connection between science and spirit become limitless. Dr. Robert Gilbert, director of the Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies, explains that spiritual and vibrational sciences are universal across wisdom traditions from Plato to Rudolf Steiner. He says we can learn to bring sacred geometry and bio-geometry into our daily lives by balancing our personal and social energies, and meditation practices aided by geometric visualization.
teaser: Sacred Geometry shows us how the connection between science and spirit become limitless. Dr. Robert Gilbert, director of the Vesica Institute for Holistic Studies, explains that spiritual and vibrational sciences are universal across wisdom traditions.

title: Pearl of Ascension with William Henry
body: The mysticism of the early Christian Gnostics continues to be relevant to our modern times as a bridge to the divine. Investigative mythologist William Henry speaks about the mystical text, The Song of the Pearl revealing the iconography and imagery of the early Christian world. In particular, he focuses on the metaphor of the pearl as a process of building the perfected ascended self, a concept found in other traditions, like Buddhism and Jewish mysticism.
teaser: The mysticism of the early Gnostics continues to be relevant to our modern times as a bridge to the divine. William Henry speaks about the mystical text, The Song of the Pearl revealing the iconography and imagery of the early Christian world.

title: Finding Calm to Boost Immunity with Katrine Volynsky
body: How can we focus our energies toward finding calm in a world filled with fear and anxiety? We can find a pathway to better health by optimizing what we are exposed to, and how we spend our time. Health advocate Katrine Volynsky discusses research on the connection between the parasympathetic nervous system (rest and digest) and boosting our immune response. She shares tips like avoiding artificial blue light and getting more positive exposure to full spectrum sunlight.
teaser: Health advocate Katrine Volynsky discusses research on the connection between the parasympathetic nervous system (rest and digest) and boosting our immune response.

title: Immunity and the Microbiome
body:
How can you recharge your natural immunity when facing new viruses? We are in a new normal state with managing our health. Compton Rom explains how managing the health of our microbiome within our bodies can help our immune defense. A healthy ecosystem creates a space where viruses can be present without triggering an immune response. Our bodies are comprised of microorganisms, bacteria, yeast, fungi, viruses, and our own cells. The bacteria help to maintain balance - keeping the immune system from going into overdrive. 

Compton discusses the historical evidence showing that humans have evolved to live symbiotically with the life within and around us. We can optimize our wellness by introducing probiotic fermented and anti-inflammatory herbs, as well as a diverse diet of fruits and roots to lower risks of infectious disease.
teaser: How can you recharge your natural immunity when facing new viruses? Compton Rom explains how managing the health of our microbiome within our bodies can help our immune defense.

title: The Secret Teachings of Manly P. Hall
body: The ancient teachings of the world demonstrate that we are all creators with the power to affect the outcome of our own lives. Steven Ross is a wisdom keeper who began his studies as a young man with Manly P. Hall's classic collection Secret Teachings for All Ages and was able to learn directly from Manly P. Hall. Steven has now released his own book of previously unpublished teachings. In our modern era where ancient texts are more accessible through photocopy and digital copies, he works to guide people to these teachings about universal truth. He shares how we can each begin our own course of study of these wisdom traditions.
teaser: The ancient teachings of the world demonstrate that we are all creators with the power to affect the outcome of our own lives. Steven Ross is a wisdom keeper who began his studies as a young man with Manly P. Hall's classic collection Secret Teachings for All Ages.

title: Toxic World & Gut Health
body: We are living in a toxic environment, from molds to chemicals, and even newborns have a toxic load, but we have the power to support our health. Dr. Jill Carnahan is a functional medicine expert and medical doctor who specializes in finding the root causes of life-threatening health conditions. She shares her story of overcoming cancer and Crohn's disease as a young woman, and how this journey led her to research autoimmune diseases such as leaky gut syndrome, and the cognitive impact of mold in the environment. Overcoming brain fog and gut digestion issues is possible and will enhance our daily lives. Dr. Carnahan discusses healing therapies such as limbic activation, EMDR (Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing), binaural beats, craniosacral therapy, HeartMath, and detox strategies for the liver.
teaser: We are living in a toxic environment, from molds to chemicals, and even newborns have a toxic load, but we have the power to support our health. Dr. Jill Carnahan is a functional medicine expert and medical doctor who specializes in finding the root causes of life-threatening health conditions.

title: Microbiome: Gut Happiness
body: Healing your digestion begins with supporting the microbiome within your gut. An imbalance in our bacterial gut microbiome can lead to lower energy and digestive issues, including symptoms of SIBO (small intestine bacterial overgrowth). Increasing our beneficial bacteria by taking bacteria such as Bifido Maximus, and decreasing sugar intake, will tip the balance toward a microbiome that supports our health will enhance the digestive power of the gut. Grace Liu, PharmD, author of the book "Seven Steps to Heal SIBO", explains how taking steps to enhance the microbiome with probiotic supplementation can balance our digestive microbiome, make a positive change in how we feel, and can extend our lifespans. She shares how even small changes such as drinking warm water, will support beneficial bacteria growth.
teaser: Healing your digestion begins with supporting the microbiome within your gut. Grace Liu, author of the book "Seven Steps to Heal SIBO", explains how taking steps to enhance the microbiome with probiotic supplementation can balance our digestive microbiome.

title: Breaking Down the Heart Wall
body: Giving and receiving love depends on the flow of energy from our heart, which is the seat of the soul. Energy healer and author of the book The Emotion Code, Dr. Bradley Nelson explains why negative emotions from the past can affect our physical body, and how releasing these emotions can empower us with forgiveness, and opens the emotional heart wall that blocks us from expressing love. Coming out of isolation, we may have more emotional baggage now than we had in the past. As we open our hearts, we reconnect to the people around us, and heal ourselves and our communities through feeling and practicing unconditional love.
teaser: Energy healer and author of The Emotion Code, Dr. Bradley Nelson explains why negative emotions can affect our physical body, and how releasing these emotions can empower us and open the emotional heart wall that blocks us from expressing love.

title: Arcturians, Pleiadians, and Lyrans
body: Many extraterrestrial groups who visit our planet have messages for us about the long history of our galaxy. Galactic historian Debbie Solaris shares details of her meetings with Arcturian beings who set her on a path of bringing love and acceptance to humanity. Through her Akashic Records readings, she also shares more details about other beings who have visited our planet, including the Lyrans and Pleiadians, and how human starseeds can uncover their own galactic origins.
teaser: Galactic historian Debbie Solaris shares details of her meetings with Arcturian beings who set her on a path of bringing love and acceptance to humanity.

title: Archangels on the Age of Aquarius
body: What messages do divine beings have for us in tumultuous times? Channeler Belinda Womack returns to Gaia to speak with Regina Meredith and share answers from archangels about the destiny of humanity and the questions of our time. As we move from the Age of Pisces to the Age of Aquarius, we learn to understand the interconnection we all have on our planet.
teaser: Channeler Belinda Womack returns to Gaia to speak with Regina Meredith and shares answers from archangels about the destiny of humanity and the questions of our time.

title: The Stem Cell Solution for Pain
body: Find out what stem cell therapy can do for you. Naturopathic doctor Harry Adelson discusses the promising potential of regenerative medicine in his work with stem cell therapy. He explains that the role of stem cells in our body is to maintain our health, and so treatment with stem cells can help with musculoskeletal pain and energy. While stem cells were initially discovered in fetal tissue, this therapy is not associated with embryonic cells. The therapy uses mesenchymal stem cells from your own bone marrow and fat to prompt regeneration. Dr. Adelson shares his own journey of recovering from injury and pain with the help of regenerative therapy, and bringing these treatments to his patients.
teaser: Find out what stem cell therapy can do for you. Naturopathic doctor Harry Adelson discusses the promising potential of regenerative medicine in his work with stem cell therapy.

title: Studying the Superhuman Mind
body:
Can your intentions have an impact on the physical world? Filmmaker Caroline Cory’s work focuses on transforming Self by using the full potential of the mind. As a young child, she encountered light beings who helped to develop her own potential as she began using precognitive abilities to see the future. 

Her recent docu-series explores, through a series of experiments, how superhuman abilities can be learned and developed by anyone. From moving physical objects in space by using thought-heart connection techniques to a group of children reading and playing while completely blindfolded, we witness the power of the mind and understand our own potential. Cory is the creator of the docu-series ‘Superhuman: the Invisible Made Visible’, now available on Gaia.
teaser: Can your intentions have an impact on the physical world? Filmmaker Caroline Cory’s work focuses on transforming Self by using the full potential of the mind.

title: A Simple Method for Manifestation
body: Our energy field is influenced by our minds, and we can manifest healing within ourselves through our chakra energy. Bill McKenna shares that in his experience as an energy healer and teacher, he has learned how the energies of the chakras are connected to what manifests in our lives. As we work to mindfully release attachments to past events, we can move our energy upward, and manifest a state of well being. McKenna demonstrates a method for manifestation by clearing energy through visualizing a physical connection to negative thoughts, then letting them go.
teaser: Bill McKenna shares that in his experience as an energy healer and teacher, he has learned how the energies of the chakras are connected to what manifests in our lives.

title: Boundaries for the Sensitive Soul
body: Some of us are highly sensitive to the world around us, and according to Michael Jawer, more sensitivity is present in our times. Jawer, author of The Sensitive Soul, specializes in research on how our minds and bodies are affected by the emotions we experience. He describes what he calls an emotional type of "thin boundary" people who react more strongly to spiritual, emotional, and environmental triggers than "thick boundary" people. The flow of emotions experienced by people with a thin boundary leads to extraordinary perceptions and empathy. As we work to be conscious of our emotional experiences, we can gain more understanding of how we relate to everyone and everything we encounter.
teaser: Some of us are highly sensitive to the world around us, and according to Michael Jawer, more sensitivity is present in our times. Jawer, author of The Sensitive Soul, specializes in research on how our minds and bodies are affected by the emotions we experience.

title: Channeling Jefferson, Lincoln, and Eisenhower
body: 20 years ago, Gates McKibbin was startled when she began receiving messages from three late presidents. As a clairaudient channeler she has received messages from Thomas Jefferson, Abraham Lincoln, and Dwight Eisenhower. To her surprise, their messages are still relevant to us today. They shared with her how we can act to help the global community work toward peace and unity. This will mean balancing our individual freedoms with conscious engagement to act for the good of all.
teaser: 20 years ago, Gates McKibbin was startled when she began receiving messages from three late presidents. As a clairaudient channeler she has received messages from Thomas Jefferson, Abraham Lincoln, and Dwight Eisenhower.

title: Path to Balance with Aubrey Marcus
body: Is your life where you want it to be? Holistic and mental health advocate Aubrey Marcus describes his healing journey with psychedelic medicine experimentation and polyamorous relationships. After a devastating injury in a car accident, he found that his relationships supported him in healing and understanding his life path. Author of the book Own Your Day, Own Your Life, Marcus shares how through ayahuasca, he learned more about how to balance his relationships with love and respect, and how he practices vision work and balancing masculine and feminine energies.
teaser: Is your life where you want it to be? Holistic and mental health advocate Aubrey Marcus describes his healing journey with psychedelic medicine experimentation and polyamorous relationships.

title: Finding Purpose Through Divination
body: Divination tools can help us find our true purpose. Master dowser Jean Slatter returns to Gaia to share her guidance on how it is possible to tap into divine wisdom to build an understanding of our path to self-discovery. She demonstrates how to use oracle cards, pendulums, and a mode of reaching out to higher guidance simply using the five fingers of your hand. Slatter explains that by using divination through various methods, we can learn to ask the right questions, and find the answers to guide us in our purpose.
teaser: Divination tools can help us find our true purpose. Master dowser Jean Slatter returns to Gaia to share her guidance on how it is possible to tap into divine wisdom to build an understanding of our path to self-discovery.

title: The Disclosure Paradigm Shift
body: As the United States stands on the verge of open Disclosure, Daniel Sheehan, one of the most esteemed Constitutional attorneys in America, is in a unique position to provide profound insights into the currently unfolding UFO / UAP status. Using his legal expertise and knowledge of government and private players over the years, Sheehan offers context from an insider's perspective around the timely questions that are surfacing in the public eye.
teaser: As the United States stands on the verge of open Disclosure, Daniel Sheehan, one of the most esteemed Constitutional attorneys in America, is in a unique position to provide profound insights into the currently unfolding UFO / UAP status.

title: Hermeticism & Self-Knowledge
body: Researcher and writer Mitch Horowitz returns to Gaia to discuss philosophy and Hermeticism. In his book The Seeker's Guide to the Secret Teachings of All Ages, Horowitz explores Manly P. Hall's traditions and how we can read and learn from sacred texts throughout our lives. The ancient axiom "know thyself" reminds us to align to our true selves. Horowitz has produced a documentary film called The Kybalion, exploring the Hermetic wisdom traditions founded in Egypt, and the Egyptian deities who represented the wisdom of the ages.
teaser: Researcher and writer Mitch Horowitz returns to Gaia to discuss philosophy and Hermeticism. In his book The Seeker's Guide to the Secret Teachings of All Ages, Horowitz explores Manly P. Hall's traditions and how we can read and learn from sacred texts throughout our lives.

title: Best-Kept Secret of Trinity Bomb
body: The legendary ufologist Jacques Vallée joins investigative journalist Paola Harris for a rare interview to reveal the story behind the 1945 Trinity atomic bomb test in New Mexico.
