Vallée, who was the inspiration behind Close Encounters of the Third Kind, co-authored the groundbreaking book Trinity: The Best-Kept Secret with Harris. Together, they share insights from their book and the mysterious UFO and ET sightings that followed the Trinity incident.
teaser: This rare interview with legendary ufologist Jacques Vallée and investigative journalist Paola Harris reveals breakthrough research from their co-authored book Trinity: The Best-Kept Secret.

title: Regression to Atlantis
body: Many people are now discovering their ancient connections to Atlantis. Sarah Breskman Cosme is a hypnotist and past life regressionist who trained with Dolores Cannon's protocol and now uses Quantum Healing Hypnosis Technique (QHHT) to help her clients overcome their negative beliefs and find purpose. Her book A Hypnotist's Journey to Atlantis describes her path to uncover information about Atlantis and Lemuria in past lives. She explains how remembering these past lives can help humanity release collective trauma.
teaser: Many people are now discovering their ancient connections to Atlantis. Sarah Breskman Cosme is a hypnotist and past life regressionist who trained with Dolores Cannon's protocol and now uses Quantum Healing Hypnosis Technique (QHHT) to help her clients overcome their negative beliefs and find purpose.

title: Navigating ET Contact
body:
What are the purposes of unexpected ET encounters? These experiences have both physical and spiritual implications that could lead to a future of greater Disclosure. Hypnotherapist Laurie McDonald, who appears on the TV series Unidentified with Demi Lovato, returns to Gaia to share how her clients' individual experiences with ET beings are becoming more mainstream and may lead us to an acceleration of our culture's technology and the powers of our minds. 

Watch stories of her own abduction experiences in the Beyond Belief episode Healing Contact Experiences.
teaser: Hypnotherapist Laurie McDonald returns to Gaia to share how her clients' individual experiences with ET beings are becoming more mainstream and may lead us to an acceleration of our culture's technology and the powers of our minds.

title: Navigating AI & Transhumanism
body:
We can transcend the limitations of our human bodies, but can we skirt the accountability of our biology? Filmmaker Ben Stewart discusses, from a faceted perspective, AI tech and our internal technology with biology. Stewart discusses the current state of AI in our modern society, what it provides humanity, and the responsibilities it poses. Ultimately, he doesn’t throw AI development into a ‘good’ or ‘bad’ category but rather asks each of us to come from an artist’s perspective to observe, listen, and gather input from an open and discerning mind.
 
Ben Stewart is the host of the Gaia series Limitless and Psychedelica.
teaser: Filmmaker Ben Stewart discusses AI tech and our internal technology with biology and the current state of AI in our modern society, what it provides humanity, and the responsibilities it poses.

title: Facing Our Transhuman Future
body: Does our increasing dependency on technology diminish our human potential? In this episode, visionary scientist Gregg Braden discusses the current transhuman movement – the merging of technology and human biology, often referred to as the singularity. He describes three levels of tech integration where the final level replaces our natural biology. In a time of rapid evolution, reflection and discernment are key. Braden highlights what we can do to release the conditioning of a technology-dependent society and how to follow the natural rhythms within ourselves.
teaser: Does our increasing dependency on technology diminish our human potential? In this episode, visionary scientist Gregg Braden discusses the current transhuman movement – the merging of technology and human biology, often referred to as the singularity.

title: Intuitive Healing Beyond the Veil
body: Many people discover their intuitive gifts very early in life. First-time guest metaphysician and intuitive healer Maren Muter begins to unfurl her journey of self-discovery as an adopted child, including memories from in utero and her special gift of communicating beyond the veil. Sharing her insight with others, Muter uses her own intuitive gifts to help unlock the intuition of others and connect them to past life experiences and creative perceptions that can help them understand their purpose throughout lifetimes. Exploring her Book of Buried Letters, she speaks with Regina Meredith about her childhood insights on the natural world.
teaser: Many people discover their intuitive gifts very early in life. First-time guest metaphysician and intuitive healer Maren Muter begins to unfurl her journey of self-discovery as an adopted child, including memories from in utero and her special gift of communicating beyond the veil.

title: Nourishing Your Chakra Type
body: Our physical and mental energies are influenced by the chakra system. Intuitive healer and author of the book Chakras, Food, and You, Cyndi Dale discusses a 12-chakra system and how the subtle energy organs of the chakras need to be balanced by the foods we eat. Explaining how every individual aligns with a specific chakra unique to their soul, Dale shares how we can reach better health by attuning to the natural foods and physical practices needed for our specific chakra type.
teaser: Cyndi Dale discusses a 12-chakra system and how the subtle energy organs of the chakras need to be balanced by the foods we eat to match our specific chakra type.

title: Powerful Lineages of Disclosure
body: In our modern era, the public should be empowered to think for themselves and question history. The descendant of two powerful families, the Warners and the Mellons (as in Carnegie-Mellon), researcher and author John Warner IV is producing novels and aiding the Disclosure movement. Fascinated by the paranormal from a young age, Warner IV was encouraged by his mother and step-mother Elizabeth Taylor to investigate the unknown, despite the military involvement and reservations of his father and maternal grandfather. After years of research and direct experiences, Warner has recently worked alongside such acclaimed scholars as Dr. Steven Greer and legal expert Daniel Sheehan to share concrete disclosure with the masses. Exploring metaphysics, the ET phenomenon, the black market, consciousness, and Disclosure, Warner expands on the historical events that have led us to today.
teaser: In our modern era, the public should be empowered to think for themselves and question history. The descendant of two powerful families, the Warners and the Mellons (as in Carnegie-Mellon), researcher and author John Warner IV is producing novels and aiding the Disclosure movement.

title: Channeling THEO: Soulful Relationships
body: We are living in a constantly changing world, where it is important to key into the truths of who we are and how we relate to others. Sheila and Marcus Gillette return to Gaia to discuss the principles they have learned from their work. Channeling the angelic voice of the THEO group, Sheila Gillette describes the principles of unconditional love that we can use to approach all of our relationships. They explain how letting go of attachment to our identities can help us transcend conflict and build harmony in our personal and collective connections. Sheila and Marcus are the co-hosts of the popular interactive internet TV show “AskTHEO Live”.
teaser: We are living in a constantly changing world, where it is important to key into the truths of who we are and how we relate to others. Sheila and Marcus Gillette return to Gaia to discuss the principles they have learned from their work.

title: Self-Healing Through Vedic Astrology
body: Keeping a quiet mind in the eye of a hurricane is not easy, but Simon Chokoisky explains that every experience is an opportunity to learn and go deeper into self-knowledge. Through his experiences as a Vedic astrologer, Chokoisky relates that any struggle is an opportunity to see ourselves, overcome adversity, and grow spiritually and physiologically. According to Chokoisky, even psychological wounds can be blessings in disguise because they force us to fight for ourselves, heal ourselves, and evolve.
teaser: Keeping a quiet mind in the eye of a hurricane is not easy, but Simon Chokoisky explains that every experience is an opportunity to learn and go deeper into self-knowledge.

title: Alchemy & Imagination
body: Many books over the centuries have been lost to history, but ancient wisdom is still available to us. Steven Ross returns to Gaia to speak about ancient teachings, including using the power of imagination to manifest reality in the Hermetic concept of ""as above, so below."" Ross shares how exploring the library of German alchemist Alexander von Bernus allowed him to analyze the interdimensionality of von Bernus' home. This expanded Ross' own understandings of these mystical and esoteric texts, inspiring him to share the importance of the profound truths these works carry for us in every age of time.
teaser: Steven Ross returns to Gaia to speak about ancient teachings, including using the power of imagination to manifest reality in the Hermetic concept of ""as above, so below.""

title: Hacking the Financial Matrix
body:
Billy Carson returns to Gaia to discuss concepts from his new book, Woke Doesn’t Mean Broke. Carson provides a framework to understand the observable science of manifestation within the 3D matrix and financial systems. Building on a platform of consciousness from which everything stems, he teaches others how to access their passion through raising their wavelength and clearing the subconscious mind. This discussion is a kick starter for understanding how to master and command your world – giving greater potential towards playing in the matrix and even gaining financial success.
 
Billy Carson is featured on Gaia's Deep Space, Ancient Civilizations, and Disclosure With Dr. Steven Greer.
teaser: Billy Carson provides a framework to understand the observable science of manifestation within the 3D matrix and financial systems.

title: The Shining Ones
body: Throughout history and all around the world, cultures have told stories of The Shining Ones or Lookers. Researcher Freddy Silva describes these otherworldly watchers who repeatedly appear during times of catastrophic change on our planet and help humanity move forward. Silva believes these giant beings shared advanced knowledge with us including astronomy, mathematics, and temple building. Discover the healing geometric shapes we inherited from them and the crop circle symbols these Lookers left behind to buy humanity more time. Plus, get a sneak peek at Silva’s upcoming book presenting new discoveries about an ancient mysterious culture he believes were the origin of The Shining Ones.
teaser: Throughout history and all around the world, cultures have told stories of The Shining Ones. Researcher Freddy Silva describes these otherworldly watchers who repeatedly appear during times of catastrophic change on our planet and help humanity move forward.

title: Eridu: City of Gods
body: How much of human history has been hidden by the sands of time? With so many new discoveries of ancient structures like Gobekli Tepe and the lost city of Eridu, our understanding of human history is changing. Author and researcher Matthew LaCroix joins Regina Meredith for an in-depth discussion on the looting of historical artifacts from the cradle of civilization, lost secrets of Mesopotamia, cuneiform tablets of Sumer, and the connections between cultures of centuries past. From Atlantis to Eridu and from the Annunaki to the Nephilim, LaCroix details how uncovering and fighting to protect lost writings and structures of the ancients can rewrite our timeline of humanity’s origins and our destiny.
teaser: Researcher Matthew LaCroix joins Regina Meredith for an in-depth discussion on the looting of historical artifacts from the cradle of civilization, lost secrets of Mesopotamia, cuneiform tablets of Sumer, and the connections between cultures of centuries past.

title: Honing Clairvoyant Capabilities
body: How can we each discover our higher capabilities to tap into the realm beyond our day-to-day experiences? Wisdom teacher and writer Kaedrich Olsen speaks about his spiritualist upbringing and how he learned to recognize synchronicities in individual lives, and works to teach people to connect with the supernatural in ways that are beneficial. He explains how each of us can work to develop our paranormal sensitivities, from clairaudience to clairvoyance.
teaser: Wisdom teacher and writer Kaedrich Olsen speaks about his spiritualist upbringing and how he learned to recognize synchronicities in his life, and now works to teach people to connect with the supernatural in ways that are beneficial

title: Yogic Life & Akashic Records
body: Is your destiny written on a higher energetic plane? Rohini Moradi was born in Tehran, Iran to observant Hindu parents who taught her a yogic life path. Her family then relocated to California, where she was raised. Moradi shares with Regina Meredith how her physical and spiritual journey as a mother led her to an understanding of how to access the Akashic Records. As a teacher and guide, she now shows others how to read the Akashic Records, which record humanity's individual and collective destinies.
teaser: Rohini Moradi shares with Regina Meredith how her physical and spiritual journey as a mother led her to an understanding of how to access the Akashic Records. As a teacher and guide, she now shows others how to read the Akashic Records, which record humanity's individual and collective destinies.

title: Overcoming Menticide
body: What is menticide and how is it affecting humanity? Mind-control and brainwashing can take place on subconscious levels, so awareness is a tool in the fight for freedom. A medical counselor and researcher with her Masters of Theology in Energy Medicine, Tiffany Barsotti is on a mission to help individuals reconnect to their inner peace, feeling centers, and navigate times of great change through enhancing a capacity for discernment. Barsotti views inner knowing as an opportunity to get back into the center of "Gnosis," who we are and what we are here to be.
teaser: A medical counselor and researcher with her Masters of Theology in Energy Medicine, Tiffany Barsotti is on a mission to help individuals reconnect to their inner peace, feeling centers, and navigate times of great change through enhancing a capacity for discernment.

title: Entering the Dimension of Magic
body: What would happen if enough of us have the courage to become our true selves and release the subconscious programming of civilization? Linguistics expert Raymond Tarpey returns to Open Minds to discuss the ancient Mayan prophecy about the final establishment of peace and justice. From astrology and numerology, to Edgar Cayce predictions and messages from his famed crystal skull, Tarpey shares the signs that we are slowly entering a dimension of magic and a time where we can rediscover our inherent powers of instant thought creation. As we all learn to become independent shamans, he says, we must use our will to respect the earth and not lose hope through the trials of this transition.
teaser: What would happen if enough of us have the courage to become our true selves and release the subconscious programming of civilization? Linguistics expert Raymond Tarpey returns to Open Minds to discuss the ancient Mayan prophecy about the final establishment of peace and justice.

title: Embodying Shamanic Balance
body: How can we find calm in times of chaos? Shamanic practitioner and teacher Jan Engels-Smith reminds us that situations arise as the experiences are needed for the greater good. Just as humans shift frequency, Earth is also going through a frequency shift, resulting in a change of rhythm for all of humanity. Explaining how humans can find harmony and balance with Earth and all of life in existence, Engels-Smith shares that despite chaotic change we can all embody divine love in our physical reality.
teaser: How can we find calm in times of chaos? Shamanic practitioner and teacher Jan Engels-Smith reminds us that situations arise as the experiences are needed for the greater good.

title: Economic Illusions & Truths
body: How have economics transformed over the last few years? Starting in 2020, the world has shifted dramatically in myriad ways, especially affecting individuals mentally and fiscally. Zeus Yiamouyiannis, Ph.D., is a university professor turned author and counselor offering aid and insight regarding these turbulent and transformative times. By supporting our local communities and each other, he says, we are investing in the future of the world.
teaser: How have economics transformed over the last few years? Zeus Yiamouyiannis, Ph.D., is a university professor turned author and counselor offering aid and insight regarding these turbulent and transformative times.

title: Multidimensional Jesus of the Stars
body: How do astrology, black magic, and ETs relate to the story of Jesus? Author and spiritual teacher Barbara Hand Clow shares details from her trilogy of fiction books and how she weaves in facts relating to mysteries of history. Explaining how her book series has been her most successful method of teaching, Barbara connects multidimensional consciousness with lost secrets of the human story. From the Vatican in Italy to a theory linking Jesus with extraterrestrials, Hand Clow shares her adventurous spirit, unrelenting research, and decades of experience to help humanity learn to overcome adversity within and without.
teaser: How do astrology, black magic, and ETs relate to the story of Jesus? Author and spiritual teacher Barbara Hand Clow shares details from her trilogy of fiction books and how she weaves in facts relating to mysteries of history.

title: From The Conjuring to ET Contact
body:
After surviving a real-life horror story, Andrea Perron’s life and books inspired Hollywood’s blockbuster series, The Conjuring and Amityville Horror.

Utilizing her past paranormal experiences, Perron pushed through the darkness in her life to find light, eventually connecting her with higher beings. Sharing her experiences with ETs, Perron details what she learned from her horrifying experiences and how to bring light into our world.
teaser: After surviving a real-life horror story, Andrea Perron’s life and books inspired Hollywood’s blockbuster series, The Conjuring and Amityville Horror.

title: Africa & the Dawn of Human Consciousness
body: The human species was designed to be in harmony with Earth and with one another. Acclaimed author and psychologist, Dr. Edward Bruce Bynum discusses humanity's origins in Africa. Rediscovering our history can give us a new vision of unification for humanity through the philosophy of supramental consciousness. In his book Our African Unconscious, he documents how we can reawaken and renew our collective understanding of how we can unify as a worldwide civilization.
teaser: The human species was designed to be in harmony with Earth and with one another. Acclaimed author and psychologist, Dr. Edward Bruce Bynum discusses humanity's origins in Africa.

title: Guided Miracles Beyond the Veil
body: Can the spirit realm create miracles in our world? Spirit medium Maureen Hancock comes from a long line of Irish mystics with psychic connections to the past and present. Hancock shares her incredible journey, from the childhood coma that led to her seeing dead people and the fatal car accident that she miraculously walked away from, to spontaneous healing that baffled doctors.  She reveals how her gifts unfolded with help from her family — here and on the other side — and how she uses remote viewing skills to help authorities find and rescue missing teenagers. The miracles that she has seen are accessible to anyone, anywhere.
teaser: Can the spirit realm create miracles in our world? Spirit medium Maureen Hancock comes from a long line of Irish mystics with psychic connections to the past and present.

title: Quantum Uncertainty
body: We are all part of the quantum field that shapes our individual and collective experiences. Cynthia Sue Larson returns to Open Minds to discuss how the principle of quantum uncertainty demonstrates that there may not be one fixed, objective reality. Larson explains that we can observe the implications of many potential reality streams around us while living within our linear sense of time. This allows us to discover how our intention can change what we experience, enabling us to shift our reality.
teaser: We are all part of the quantum field that shapes our individual and collective experiences. Cynthia Sue Larson returns to Open Minds to discuss how the principle of quantum uncertainty demonstrates that there may not be one fixed, objective reality.

title: Death as the Great Awakener
body: How can we connect with forces beyond our current life? While we grieve the transitions of death, we can also come to see passing on as a time of transformation. Sherrie Dillard is a professional psychic, medium, medical intuitive, and author of the book “I'm Still With You.” Speaking about soul transitions of our present lives, Dillard shares what we can learn about the other side of existence and how she has been able to deliver messages from individuals beyond death through thousands of psychic readings. Describing how death can be "the great awakener," Dillard explains it can help us understand the pathways our life journeys have taken.
teaser: How can we connect with forces beyond our current life? Sherrie Dillard shares what we can learn about the other side of existence and how she has been able to deliver messages from individuals beyond death through thousands of psychic readings.

title: Atlantean Secrets of the Sphinx
body:
Are there ancient secrets buried beneath the Sphinx? Hypnotherapist and past life regressionist Sarah Breskman Cosme shares details of her clients’ memories from their past lives of a forgotten history surrounding Atlantis. Detailing that Atlantean technology may still be hidden under the desert of Egypt, Breskman Cosme describes how the Sphinx stores history from humanity’s encounters with extraterrestrials.

As Regina Meredith shares her own past life regressions, she and Breskman Cosme illuminate perspectives on the archetypal entity Thoth, sometimes known as Hermes Trismegistus, or Three. Connecting the dots between ancient Egypt, Thoth and Atlantis, esoteric knowledge and ETs, Breskman Cosme reveals Earth’s destiny as a connection point within universal consciousness.

Sarah Breskman Cosme is the author of the book A Hypnotist’s Journey to the Secrets of the Sphinx. Watch her previous Gaia interview Regression to Atlantis.
teaser: Are there ancient secrets buried beneath the Sphinx? Hypnotherapist and past life regressionist Sarah Breskman Cosme shares details of her clients’ memories from their past lives of a forgotten history surrounding Atlantis.

title: Cosmic Connections & Collective Destiny
body:
What do we know about humanity's cosmic destiny and the 22 "star races" that still affect us? Galactic historian Debbie Solaris returns to Gaia to speak about the answers she has gained through reading the Galactic Akashic Records. Solaris reveals how she has reached a deeper understanding of humanity's cosmic connections through many readings of individual soul origins. Describing soul pathways, Solaris explains our galactic origins from 22 interstellar species whose influences still affect our evolution. From the distant Andromeda sector of the galaxy, human groups began to move outward into time. Ultimately, our collective destiny on Earth may be to understand our extraterrestrial connections, whether from Arcturus, Antares, Pleiades, or elsewhere.

For more from Debbie Solaris, watch her interview Arcturians, Pleiadians, and Lyrans.
teaser: What do we know about humanity's cosmic destiny and the 22 "star races" that still affect us? Galactic historian Debbie Solaris returns to Gaia to speak about the answers she has gained through reading the Galactic Akashic Records.

title: Recharging Your Biofield Voltage
body: How can we change the voltage of our electric selves? Author of Electric Body, Electric Health, Eileen Day McKusick discusses the human biofield and how we can use physical activity, nutrition, and mindfulness of past experiences to align with the energies of the natural world around us. Describing her tribulations earlier in life, McKusick illuminates how to recharge our internal batteries and change our energetic frequencies. Demonstrating how sound waves of a tuning fork can tune to the electrical field of the human body, McKusick shares how this allows her as a practitioner to read an individual's energetic patterns to help facilitate a higher voltage in their biofield.
teaser: How can we change the voltage of our electric selves? Eileen Day McKusick discusses the human biofield and how we can use physical activity, nutrition, and mindfulness of past experiences to align with the energies of the natural world around us.

title: A Vatican Exile on Reincarnation & Cosmology
body: How can a priest barred from the Vatican help us explore reincarnation? Licensed clinical psychologist, theologian, and priest Sean O'Laoire joins Open Minds to share his studies into the divine nature of the universe. After being dismissed by the Vatican, O'Laorie embraced his existence as an "evolved" catholic priest, exploring reincarnation and comsmology forbidden to traditional Roman Catholics. O'Laoire’s book Setting God Free explores how our mystical experiences can be part of our everyday lives, whether we consider ourselves spiritual or religious. Discussing the theories of Stan Grof and reincarnation as a universal experience, O'Laoire explores the nature of epistemology – how we know what we know. Sharing how we can find the commonalities in our spiritual stories, O'Laoire says regardless of where we come from everyone can experience Source or God energy.
teaser: How can a priest barred from the Vatican help us explore reincarnation? Licensed clinical psychologist, theologian, and priest Sean O'Laoire joins Open Minds to share his studies into the divine nature of the universe.

title: Understanding Women's Health & Biorhythms
body: Can understanding our biorhythms be the key to better health? Neuropsychophysiologist Kayla Osterhoff, MPH explains that every woman has four distinct biorhythm phases previously unknown to science, each following the body's natural cycles. Exploring how the biochemical state of each phase can affect our energy levels, mood, motivation, and creativity, Osterhoff suggests we can learn to live in balance with our biorhythms, harnessing inborn feminine power to create massive global evolution.
teaser: Can understanding our biorhythms be the key to better health? Neuropsychophysiologist Kayla Osterhoff explains that every woman has four distinct biorhythm phases previously unknown to science, each following the body's natural cycles.

title: Shamanic Wisdom of a Vietnam Vet
body: The era of the Vietnam War inspired many people to spiritual awakening. Jim Morris is a retired US Army Special Forces Major and a student of shamanic wisdom, in the Toltec tradition of Don Miguel Ruiz. Author of the book The Dreaming Circus, Morris shares life stories, including a journey across the United States as a young man, his experience in Vietnam, and apprenticeship in mystic traditions. Gaining wisdom from practices such as LSD and lucid dreaming, he reminds each of us how we can awaken to our own unique spiritual paths, wherever we may find ourselves in the course of our lives.
teaser: The era of the Vietnam War inspired many people to spiritual awakening. Jim Morris is a Vietnam veteran and a student of shamanic wisdom, sharing his life experiences.

title: Sacred Geometry & Empowered Action
body:
How can Sacred Geometry help us create better alignments with our energetic bodies? Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., returns to Gaia to delve into Sacred Geometry and how it can aid us in acknowledging and shifting patterns in our lives. Sharing his experience and research, Gilbert explains how we can create empowered action to transform our relationships and habits. Explore how we can expand our perceptions through understanding these shapes and patterns as keys to ancient and universal knowledge.

Robert J. Gilbert is the host of the Gaia Original series Sacred Geometry: Spiritual Science.
teaser: How can Sacred Geometry help us create better alignments with our energetic bodies? Robert J. Gilbert, Ph.D., returns to Gaia to delve into Sacred Geometry and how it can aid us in acknowledging and shifting patterns in our lives.

title: Spirit Marriage
body:
Can humans have inter-dimensional spiritual relationships?
Transpersonal psychologist Megan Rose, Ph.D., author of the book Spirit Marriage, describes her journey into a sacred union with a spirit being.
From interpreting paranormal encounters to understanding more about the unseen world, Rose shares traditions, history, and her own experiences from her connections to the otherworldly spirit realm. By opening ourselves to spirit encounters, Rose affirms it is possible to find help and support in our human lives.
teaser: Can humans have inter-dimensional spiritual relationships? Transpersonal psychologist Megan Rose, Ph.D., author of the book Spirit Marriage, describes her journey into a sacred union with a spirit being.

title: Jesse James & The Lost Templar Treasure
body:
Did Jesse James, the famous Wild West outlaw, have connections to the Freemasons and Knights Templar? James's great-great-grandson, Daniel Duke, is an historian who uncovers many intriguing details of his famous forebear's life and private spiritual search. 

Daniel Duke is the author of books including The Secret History of the Wild, Wild West and The Mysterious Life and Faked Death of Jesse James, & Jesse James and the Lost Templar Treasure: Secret Diaries, Coded Maps, and the Knights of the Golden Circle.
teaser: Did Jesse James, the famous Wild West outlaw, have connections to the Freemasons and Knights Templar? James's great-great-grandson, Daniel Duke, uncovers many intriguing details of his famous forebear's life and private spiritual search.

title: Megaliths of Ancient Giants
body:
Who were the giants of ancient times and what clues from their civilization were left behind?

Freddy Silva returns to Open Minds to discuss his decades-long research into the historical signs of giants across the highlands of Scotland, Sardinia, Armenia, and elsewhere. From archaeological evidence of Nuraghe towers and megalithic circles to DNA connections, Silva explores evidence, myths, and legends. Tracing the implications of the Book of Enoch and knowledge of the Annunaki, Silva reveals what we can learn about humanity's history and origins.

Freddy Silva is a filmmaker of the documentaries The Missing Gods and The Path to Paradise, available on Gaia. His most recent book is Scotland's Hidden Sacred Past.
teaser: Who were the giants of ancient times and what clues from their civilization were left behind? Researcher Freddy Silva explores the archaeological evidence, myths, and legends.

title: Clairvoyance & Remote Viewing
body: How can we cut through the programming and develop our psychic abilities such as remote viewing? Conscious exploration guide Sean McNamara shares insight from his most recent book, Signal and Noise: Advanced Psychic Training for Remote Viewing, Clairvoyance, and ESP. Detailing how his years as a Buddhist practitioner led to contact with off-world beings, McNamara shares how we can utilize extrasensory consciousness and out-of-body experiences to help overcome fear of death.
teaser: How can we cut through the programming and develop our psychic abilities such as remote viewing? Conscious exploration guide Sean McNamara shares insight from his most recent book, Signal and Noise: Advanced Psychic Training for Remote Viewing, Clairvoyance, and ESP.

title: Navigating Waves of the Great Reset
body:
How can we ride through waves of cyclical economic instability? Darryl Schoon returns to Open Minds to share his personal journey through the storms of our times, from our changing economy to humanity's search for spiritual ascension. Schoon explains how the confines of a prison sentence taught him the lesson of The Middle Way, or a life without materialism. Sharing his perspective, Schoon says the financial waves we see in the global economy may point to a larger evolution in our global consciousness. A better world is on the way, independent of the uncertainties we may see with our current monetary systems. 

Darryl Schoon is a financial analyst and author of the book Time of the Vulture: How to Survive the Crisis and Prosper in the Process.
teaser: How can we ride through waves of cyclical economic instability? Darryl Schoon returns to Open Minds to share his personal journey through the storms of our times, from our changing economy to humanity's search for spiritual ascension.

title: Twin Flames & Reincarnation
body:
Does love survive reincarnation? Writer and channeler, Gates McKibbin, tapped into the concept of reunited “twin flames” when she began to write her Love Hope Give fiction series, which begins in Atlantis and continues over the ages. McKibbin returns to Open Minds to share these four inspirational books that tell the story of a ""twin flame"" couple (one spirit in two bodies) who find each other over multiple lifetimes. 
 
In each lifetime, these fated soulmates improve the lives of those around them while navigating incredible challenges and inspiring others through unwavering integrity. These powerful stories — filled with historical events and people McKibbin had no knowledge of before writing the books — have helped countless people to embody their authentic selves and choose partnerships infused with integrity, grace, and beauty.
 
Gates McKibbin is a clairaudient channeler and author of books including Epic Steps: Rekindling Democracy, Unity and Peace. Her previous interview on Gaia is titled Channeling Jefferson, Lincoln, and Eisenhower.
teaser: Does love survive reincarnation? Writer and channeler, Gates McKibbin, tapped into the concept of reunited “twin flames” when she began to write her Love Hope Give fiction series, which begins in Atlantis and continues over the ages.

title: The Empires of Atlantis
body:
What is the evidence of the lost continent of Atlantis, and who were the Atlanteans? Researcher and author of the book The Empires of Atlantis, Marco Vigato shares his insights from 15 years of research into the esoteric and archaeological evidence of Atlantis. He suggests that the fall of Atlantis thousands of years ago was due to the advance of materialism and the loss of spiritual science, but that the remnants of Atlantean knowledge were preserved in the human civilizations that grew out of their advanced culture, including the building of the pyramids at Giza.

Regina Meredith discusses her own experiences of past-life regression to Atlantis with Vigato. Making connections from Vigato's work to other researchers such as Freddy Silva's study of the Shining Ones, Vigato and Meredith share knowledge of human civilization throughout periods of destruction. As we rediscover the knowledge of Atlantis, we can learn more about humanity’s future.
teaser: What is the evidence of the lost continent of Atlantis, and who were the Atlanteans? Researcher and author of the book The Empires of Atlantis, Marco Vigato shares his insights from 15 years of research into the esoteric and archaeological evidence of Atlantis.

title: Meanings of Nightmares & Dreams
body:
What do our dreams tell us about the waking world? Theresa Cheung is an expert in decoding the hidden meaning found in the world of dreams. She explains what we can learn about precognition and symbolism in our dreams, and how we can use our dreaming minds to enhance our psychic perceptions in our waking lives. Cheung describes how we can also use nightmares as tools for our minds to wake us up to truths in our shadow side, and help us make choices to transform our lives. By journaling our dreams and paying attention to them, we can learn more from our hidden intuitive selves.
                                                
Theresa Cheung is an astrologer and dream decoder, and the author of many books, including The Dream Dictionary from A to Z and Night Vision: a Field Guide to Your Dreams.
teaser: What do our dreams tell us about the waking world? Theresa Cheung is an expert in decoding the hidden meaning found in the world of dreams. She explains what we can learn about precognition and symbolism in our dreams.

title: Accessing Body Energy Intelligence
body: How can you access the intelligence of your energy body to heal? Jean Slatter returns to Gaia to share how the subconscious insights held within our bodies help heal both physical and emotional injuries. Slatter uses pendulums with her clients to help dialogue with their energetic bodies about blockages that may exist. From relationships with others to relationships with our higher selves, she suggests we can learn to process negative events of the past and undo their effects to reset our mind-body health.
teaser: How can you access the intelligence of your energy body to heal? Jean Slatter returns to Gaia to share how the subconscious insights held within our bodies help heal both physical and emotional injuries.

title: Angelic Peace & Clarity
body: How can we find peace and abundance in a world that feels chaotic? Spiritual messenger Belinda Womack shares messages from the 12 archangels directed toward humanity's destiny, divine nature, and true wealth. Through Womack's voice, the angels share meditations and answer questions about awakening to our highest nature. Learn how to manifest clarity through a channeled meditation with the 12 archangels.
teaser: How can we find peace and abundance in a world that feels chaotic? Spiritual messenger Belinda Womack shares messages from the 12 archangels directed toward humanity's destiny, divine nature, and true wealth.

title: Healing the Sacred Masculine & Feminine
body:
How can trauma be a catalyst of discovery to heal and balance the sacred feminine and the sacred masculine? Author Sophie Strand discusses her journey of overcoming child abuse and a serious medical condition through the perspectives gained from her study of various wisdom traditions. From Buddhism and Judaism to Christianity and the wild wisdom of nature, Strand has found a place of healing in the spiritual world. 

Sophie Strand is a wisdom teacher and the author of the book The Flowering Wand: Rewilding the Sacred Masculine.
teaser: How can trauma be a catalyst of discovery to heal and balance the sacred feminine and the sacred masculine? Author Sophie Strand discusses her spiritual journey and connection to nature.

title: Transcending the Biblical Narrative Part 1
body:
How can ET contact represented in the Bible help us see beyond the illusions of religious control?
 
Sharing their decades of experience, Theologians Paul Wallis and Sean O’Laoire discuss stories to help us see beyond the veil of fear-based religious doctrines and understand the benefits of indigenous perspective in reshaping our worldview.
 
They highlight how the creation myths and stories from tribal people depicted a much different interaction between sky beings and humans, which led them to a more enlightened perspective and connection to self and community. In Part 2 of the interview, Wallis and O'Laoire explore more deeply into how indigenous tribes view the gods and our natural state of being. 
 
Sean O'Laoire is the spiritual director of Companions on the Journey, and author of the book Setting God Free: Moving Beyond the Caricature We've Created in Our Own Image. Paul Wallis is a bestselling author of many books, including Escaping from Eden and Echoes of Eden.
teaser: Sharing their decades of experience, Theologians Paul Wallis and Sean O’Laoire discuss stories to help see beyond the veil of fear-based religious doctrines and understand the benefits of indigenous perspective in reshaping our worldview. Part 1 of 2.

title: Transcending the Biblical Narrative Part 2
body:
Could mythological encounters with Celtic fairies connect to Biblical ET contact?

Continuing their conversation from Part 1 of the interview, theologians Sean O'Laoire and Paul Wallis describe how humanity can spiritually evolve from the medieval traditions of western civilization by recognizing the effects of human contact experiences with non-human entities. O'Laoire shares Celtic myths of human encounters with the fairy people, or Tuatha De Danann, as Wallis explains African legends of the mysterious architects of human civilization.

Sean O'Laoire is the spiritual director of Companions on the Journey, and author of the book Setting God Free: Moving Beyond the Caricature We've Created in Our Own Image.
Paul Wallis is a bestselling author of many books, including Escaping from Eden and Echoes of Eden.
teaser: What is our human place in the cosmos? Continuing their conversation from Part 1 of the interview, theologians Sean O'Laoire and Paul Wallis describe how humanity can spiritually evolve by recognizing the effects of human contact experiences with non-human entities.

title: Practicing Elemental Witchcraft
body:
How can we connect with the etheric elemental beings controlling our natural world? Psychic medium Salicrow has been on a path of extrasensory perception for her entire life, entering mediumship at a young age and connecting individuals on all sides of our reality through harmony within nature. Salicrow helps bridge the gaps between elemental forces of unseen realms (such as energies, elves, gnomes, and the fae) to empower individuals' extended perceptions of the natural world. She offers insight on how we can stay grounded during trying times by uniting with spirit through intentions and mindfulness.

Salicrow is a psychic medium, seer, and author of the book The Path of Elemental Witchcraft: a Wyrd Woman's Book of Shadows.
teaser: How can we connect with the etheric elemental beings controlling our natural world? Psychic medium Salicrow shares her path of extrasensory perception for her entire life, from mediumship to elemental witchcraft.

title: Awakening Through Group ET Contact
body:
How can ET contact lead to a spiritual awakening beyond the dualistic nature of this three-dimensional reality? Citing her years of experience as a clinical hypnotherapist, Laurie McDonald offers insight into what humanity can learn from ET encounters revealed through hypnotherapy regression work.

Groups who use meditative manifestation techniques to consciously experience UFO and ET phenomena have reported increased extrasensory abilities and a connection to a higher spiritual potential.

Laurie McDonald is a consciousness researcher and clinical hypnotherapist and president of OPUS: Organization for Paranormal Understanding and Support. She has previously appeared on Gaia on both Open Minds and Beyond Belief, discussing her journey with ET contact experiences.
teaser: How can ET contact lead to a spiritual awakening beyond the dualistic nature of this three-dimensional reality? Laurie McDonald offers insight into what humanity can learn from ET encounters revealed through hypnotherapy regression work.

title: Mechanics of Dreaming & Astral Travel
body: Where do we go in dream travel? Sheila Gillette is the world renowned spiritual medium and channel for the twelve archangels collectively known as THEO. In questions to and answers from THEO, Gillette shares insights on how to use travel during sleep and out-of-body-experience (OBE). When the physical body is sleeping, the astral or etheric body is capable of connection to other dimensions and other conscious entities. THEO describes how humanity can better reach our vast potential by reaching beyond our physical selves to receive communication and help from angels.
teaser: Where do we go in dream travel? Spiritual medium and channel Sheila Gillette shares insights on how to use travel during sleep and out-of-body-experience (OBE).

title: Tuning Your Voice for Transformation
body: Discover how the most famous woman in the world found her voice with Stewart Pearce. Pearce returns to Gaia to discuss his professional voice work with the late Diana, Princess of Wales, and how he taught her to use her voice to express herself. As part of the British royal family, she represents an archetypal key that we can all benefit from. Pearce shares how individuals can learn to use their own genuine voice (which he calls our true note) and can attune to a larger resonant field that allows us to speak from the heart.
teaser: Discover how the most famous woman in the world found her voice with Stewart Pearce. Pearce returns to Gaia to discuss his professional voice work with the late Diana, Princess of Wales.

title: Balancing the Chaos
body:
What is the current direction of humanity's evolution?
Legendary channeler Lee Harris returns to Gaia to share profound and timely insights from his channeled guides, The Z’s. These are some of the many gems of wisdom the Z’s share to guide us through this planetary transition:

Earth is coming online in ways we have never experienced.
This transmission is multidimensionality in action.
The bliss bunnies are bringing balance to emotional rage machines.
If we could show you how many things have been averted when it comes to destruction, you would feel horrified at first and then relieved.
We are witnessing the push and pull between the forces that want to divide us and the future of consciousness.

While humanity is experiencing an unstable world, we are moving beyond our "war imprint" and discovering our heart- energy gifts for healing and spiritual connection.

Lee Harris is a channeler and empath who has been receiving communication from his guides, the Z’s, since 1999. He is an accomplished author of many books including Conversations with the Z’s, Book One: The Energetics of the New Human Soul.
teaser:
What is the current direction of humanity's evolution?
Legendary channeler Lee Harris returns to Gaia to share profound and timely insights from his channeled guides, The Z’s.

title: Enneagram & Relationships
body: How can the Enneagram model help us to understand and improve our relationships with others? Clinical psychologist Frank DeLuca, Ph.D., explores his research and recent book – A Field Guide to Humans: Enriching Relationships Through the Enneagram. This model provides a way for us to understand our tendencies and how we can grow. Sharing details of the nine Enneagram personality types, DeLuca emphasizes how this tool can be used to connect with others through greater kindness and understanding.
teaser: How can the Enneagram model help us to understand and improve our relationships with others? Clinical psychologist Frank DeLuca, Ph.D., explores his research and recent book – A Field Guide to Humans: Enriching Relationships Through the Enneagram.

title: Akashic Enhancement of Psychic Abilities
body:
How can we pull from the Akashic Records to enhance psychic abilities?  Bonni McCliss is a psychic medium and Akashic Records reader who began developing her gifts as a young child. Through her experiences she awakened to an “interdimensional highway” of entities and knowledge. As a medium and guide, McCliss describes the potential we each have to awaken to psychic dimensions around us.

Bonni McCliss is a psychic medium and hypnotherapist. She is the author of the book The Other Side of Normal.
teaser: How can we pull from the Akashic Records to enhance psychic abilities? Bonni McCliss is a psychic medium and Akashic Records reader sharing her personal journey.

title: Shifting Consciousness with ET Guidance
body:
If extraterrestrial beings exist beyond our current perceptions, how can we communicate with them? Is it possible that superior civilizations can help us to bring peace to Earth? ET contactee and experiencer Tim Tactical Advisor describes his face-to-face experiences, which began at an early age. 

He provides an overview of learning to connect with ET intelligences and explains how government projects may be using interfrequential contact as a tool to aid peaceful evolution. Outlining his understanding of levels of consciousness, Tim describes the goal of reaching conscious unity with a consciousness he knows as Being 6.
teaser: If extraterrestrial beings exist beyond our current perceptions, how can we communicate with them? Is it possible that superior civilizations can help us to bring peace to Earth? ET contactee and experiencer Tim describes his face-to-face experiences.

title: Transcending Narcissistic Conditioning
body: How do we reclaim our connection to the soul in a world laden with fear? There has been an increase in gaslighting and narcissistic behavior from all walks of life. Tiffany Barsotti, Ph.D., describes what it takes to break free of these relationships and tendencies and make a deeper commitment to ourselves. She explains how younger generations lack community and a sense of togetherness which leads to a delay in realizing your potential. Societies outside of the western world rarely face this issue. Rather, everyone is “self-actualized” at birth and works together without being focused on ego. Barsotti explains how the soul’s dharma can’t be realized until a commitment to the path has been made.
teaser: How do we reclaim our connection to the soul in a world laden with fear? Tiffany Barsotti, Ph.D., describes what it takes to break free of these relationships and tendencies and make a deeper commitment to ourselves.

title: Atlantis & Indigenous Tribes of America
body:
How are the tribal people of Northern America connected to the ancient civilization of Atlantis and Lemuria? Regression therapist and QHHT practitioner Sarah Breskman Cosme shares her clients' perspectives of their past lives from Atlantis to the Native American tribes.			
			
Cosme brings this story to you with the voice of Aniwaya, a Native American man from the 1800s, who from the Trail of Tears, speaks through a female client under hypnosis. Aniwaya describes how the native people of America lost their traditions and how these practices and knowledge of ancient times can be regained as we reach out to understand our deep human past.			
			
Sarah Breskman Cosme is the author of the book A Hypnotist's Journey from the Trail to the Star People. Her previous interviews on Gaia are: Waves of Karma from Atlantis, Regression to Atlantis, Atlantean Secrets of the Sphinx.
teaser: How are the tribal people of Northern America connected to the ancient civilization of Atlantis and Lemuria? Regression therapist and QHHT practitioner Sarah Breskman Cosme shares her clients' perspectives of their past lives.

title: Vibration, Resonance, & Your Past Lives
body:
How do emotions create a thread of energy that connects past life experiences? Matias De Stefano awakened the memories of his many past lives, in ancient times that predated the dynasties of ancient Egypt. Sharing his thoughts on the nature of time, memory, and emotion, De Stefano explains how every moment resonates throughout the universe as a vibration that is stored as energy. When we remember the events of the past, we are also bringing back the emotional energy of that past life. As we learn to better tap into the coherence of our mind and body consciousness, we become better equipped to transmute the stress of a global transition. 

Since early childhood, Matías De Stefano has had perfect past-life recall of incarnations spanning thousands of years throughout many galaxies. He is the host of the Gaia series Initiation, and the subject of the documentary series Journey of Remembering.
teaser: Matias De Stefano awakened the memories of his many past lives, in ancient times that predated the dynasties of ancient Egypt. Sharing his thoughts on the nature of time, memory, and emotion, De Stefano explains how every moment resonates throughout the universe as a vibration that is stored as energy.

title: Paranormal Encounters With Shadow People
body:
Who are the shadow people that we may see in dark corners? Do these appearances point to our contact with other dimensions? Mike Ricksecker, author of A Walk in the Shadows, began experiencing contact from an early age with interdimensional beings. Ricksecker discusses the beings originating from 11 dimensions who we may encounter, including Mantis beings and a mysterious entity who some refer to as "The Hat Man". Describing the portal phenomenon and mysterious disappearances in Alaska, he shares how his research affirms the multidimensional nature of our reality.

Mike Ricksecker is an author and researcher focused on the paranormal. He has previously appeared on Gaia in an interview titled Portals & Disappearances in Alaska.
teaser: Who are the shadow people that we may see in dark corners? Do these appearances point to our contact with other dimensions? Researcher Mike Ricksecker discusses these phenomena.

title: Interplanetary Soul Origins
body:
What are the differences between Earth-based souls (EBs), interplanetary souls (IPs), and souls from the angelic realm (AR)? Regression therapist Linda Backman shares her insights on soul origins and why we are all incarnating on Earth during this dynamic, challenging time. Through her work, she offers a unique perspective of the traits and sensitivities manifesting on the autism spectrum which may point to an interplanetary origin. As we explore our various soul origins, we can learn to recognize our individual and collective purpose.

Linda Backman, Ed.D., has been a regression therapist for more than 40 years. She is the author of the book Souls on Earth: Exploring Interplanetary Past Lives, and was previously featured on Gaia’s Inspirations with Lisa Garr in Spiritual Healing Through Past Life Exploration and on Beyond Belief with George Noory in Past Lives, Soul Groups & Our Purpose.
teaser: Where do our souls come from? Regression therapist Linda Backman shares her insights on soul origins and why we are all incarnating on Earth during this dynamic, challenging time.

title: Understanding Your Starseed Nature
body:
Enhance overall health and wellbeing by understanding your unique star lineage. Starseed Intuitive and Galactic Historian Debbie Solaris returns to share further details of her experience with human soul origins in star systems such as Arcturus, Andromeda, Lyra, the Pleiades, and Orion. Through thousands of Galactic Akashic Record readings, Solaris has been able to guide her clients to better alignment of their personal and cosmic goals based on their past incarnations.
Learn how to:
Enhance your meditation practice
Find the right diet for your soul origin
Develop optimal emotional health
Raise your vibrational energy 

Debbie Solaris is an Arcturian Starseed who helps others awaken their potential for ascension. Her previous Open Minds interviews are: Cosmic Connections & Collective Destiny as well as Arcturians, Pleiadians, and Lyrans.
teaser: Enhance overall health and wellbeing by understanding your unique star lineage. Debbie Solaris returns to share further details of her experience with human soul origins in star systems such as Arcturus, Andromeda, Lyra, the Pleiades, and Orion.

title: ET Contact: Breaking Through the Fog
body:
For decades, stories of ET abduction and UFO sightings have been suppressed. How can we bring more accounts of human experience with ETs to light?

As the stories of Disclosure continue to be told in our modern era, more perspectives are appearing. Roderick Martin, an African-American investigator with MUFON (Mutual UFO Network) describes the UFO sighting that first inspired him to ask questions about the presence of ETs decades ago. Martin discusses the  African-American community and his opinion about what he believes the traditional song Swing Low, Sweet Chariot represents.  

Roderick Martin is the host of the Youtube podcast Why The Big Secret ™️. He previously appeared on Gaia’s original series Beyond Belief in the interview titled Uniting UFO Narratives.
teaser: For decades, stories of ET abduction and UFO sightings have been suppressed. How can we bring more accounts of human experience with ETs to light? UFO investigator Roderick Martin shares his experiences.

title: The Spiritual Lives of Scientists
body:
Can science help us understand the spiritual order of the universe? Paul J. Mills, Ph.D., has been a student of metaphysics and science for many years. Mills shares his personal journey that inspired him to study esoteric knowledge such as Vedanta and Ayurveda in addition to his scientific work in biomedicine and integrative health. Detailing the results of the transformational power of gratitude practice in a study in collaboration with the Chopra Foundation.

Paul J. Mills, Ph.D., is a Professor of Public Health and Family Medicine, and Director of the Center of Excellence for Research and Training in Integrative Health at the University of California, San Diego. He has over 400 scientific publications in the fields of pharmacology, oncology, cardiology, psychoneuroimmunology, behavioral medicine, and integrative health. He is the author of the book Science, Being, & Becoming: The Spiritual Lives of Scientists
teaser: Can science help us understand the spiritual order of the universe? Paul J. Mills, Ph.D. shares his study of metaphysics and the inspiration for his book Science, Being, & Becoming: The Spiritual Lives of Scientists.

title: Genetic Blueprints Across Lifetimes
body:
Could our personalities from past lives try to rectify their experiences in our current lives? Exploring timelines, consciousness, genetic blueprints, and quantum awareness, author Joseph Selbie dives deep into the nature of being. Explore how our understanding of reality continues to evolve and how we can learn to co-create expressions consciously. 

Joseph (Puru) Selbie is the author of The Physics of God. An avid follower of the unfolding new paradigms of science, he is known for creating bridges of understanding between the modern evidenced-based discoveries of science and the ancient experience-based discoveries of the mystics.
teaser: Could our personalities from past lives try to rectify their experiences in our current lives? Exploring timelines, consciousness, genetic blueprints, and quantum awareness, author Joseph Selbie dives deep into the nature of being.

title: Beyond the Autism Spectrum
body: How do we reach beyond the confines of the autistic spectrum to understand what individuals are experiencing on a multidimensional level? Integration specialist Suzy Miller has been working with clients on the autistic spectrum for over 20 years, going outside typical treatments and perspectives. Examining the very nature of being in terms of frequency spectrums that might not align person-to-person, we explore alternative theories and research to learn more about a growing, yet misunderstood phenomenon.
teaser: How do we reach beyond the confines of the autistic spectrum to understand what individuals are experiencing on a multidimensional level? Integration specialist Suzy Miller has been working with clients on the autistic spectrum for over 20 years.

title: Shadow Work & the Higher Self
body: What is shadow work and how does it help us in our everyday lives? Author, paranormal expert, and shadow worker Kaedrich Olsen explains how ego attachments create unconscious spells which affect us. Dive deep into the subconscious mind, the lies we tell ourselves, and how facing our shadow side can make space for more light in our lives.
teaser: What is shadow work and how does it help us in our everyday lives? Author, paranormal expert, and shadow worker Kaedrich Olsen explains how we can circumvent ego attachments that create unconscious spells which affect us.

title: The Valiant Thor Contact
body:
What evidence do we have of extraterrestrial social engagements with humanity? Paola Harris recounts her visit to a historic ET contact site where Valiant (Val) Thor, his brother Donn, and the mysterious Jill once attended a lecture by Howard Menger. Harris offers insight on the story of Val Thor and shows rare photographs of the alleged humanoid extraterrestrials. 

Harris delves deep into the stories relating to famous books such as “From Outer Space to You” by Howard Menger, “Stranger in the Pentagon” by Frank Stranges, and the works of George Adamski.
teaser: What evidence do we have of extraterrestrial social engagements with humanity? Paola Harris recounts her visit to a contact site where Valiant (Val) Thor, his brother Donn, and the mysterious Jill once attended a lecture by Howard Menger.

title: Homeopathy: Before Psychiatry Lost Its Mind
body: How has natural homeopathy been obscured from the public?  Jerry Kantor wrote his book “Sane Asylums: The Success of Homeopathy before Psychiatry Lost Its Mind” to go beyond the pharmaceutical industry and expose the benefits of holistic health. Explore root causes of illness, how existential issues lead to disease in the body, and how we can holistically approach mental health within and without.
teaser: How has natural homeopathy been obscured from the public?  Jerry Kantor wrote his book “Sane Asylums: The Success of Homeopathy before Psychiatry Lost Its Mind” to go beyond the pharmaceutical industry and expose the benefits of holistic health.

title: The New Timeline of Humanity
body: What verified and validated evidence is rewriting history as we know it? Piece together the new story of humanity over the centuries with authors and researchers Billy Carson and Matthew LaCroix as they discuss their latest collaborative book, The Epic of Humanity. From Sumerian tablets to the excavation of archeological wonders across the world, LaCroix and Carson share their research into lost knowledge linking Egypt to Atlantis and beyond.
teaser: What verified and validated evidence is rewriting history? Piece together the new story of humanity over the centuries with authors and researchers Billy Carson and Matthew LaCroix as they discuss their latest collaborative book, The Epic of Humanity.

title: Medical Intuition & Human Biofields
body:
How can medical intuition help us break free of standard medical models? Certified Medical Intuitive Practitioner Wendie Colter explains how she energetically identifies the underlying, root causes of medical conditions. Colter shares how to go beyond the physical into the emotional and spiritual aspects of being. Learn why science is beginning to support energy healing and how tuning our biofield can help us link with our higher selves. 

Step into your power and enhance your biofield to shield yourself energetically and open yourself up to your most ideal life.
teaser: How can medical intuition help us break free of standard medical models? Certified Medical Intuitive Practitioner Wendie Colter explains how she energetically identifies the underlying, root causes of medical conditions. Learn why science is beginning to support energy healing.

title: Alchemical Evolution
body:
How can we use alchemy and art to heal trauma?

Author and alchemical artist Marlene Seven Bremner reveals how hermetic philosophy and alchemical principles can help us liberate our authentic, creative selves. Offering her own experiences and expertise, Bremner explains how we can transmute alchemical energies to gain intuition, gnosis (self-knowledge), and creative expression. Explore the complicated yet beautiful symbolism of alchemical art.

Marlene Seven Bremner is the author of “Hermetic Philosophy and Creative Alchemy: The Emerald Tablet, The Corpus Hermeticum, and the Journey Through the Seven Spheres.”
teaser: How can we use alchemy and art to heal trauma? Author and artist Marlene Seven Bremner reveals how hermetic philosophy and alchemical principles can help us liberate our authentic, creative selves. Bremner shares how we can transmute alchemical energies.

title: Floating Souls & Aligned Evolution
body:
What is required of humanity to move into our next steps of balanced evolution? Legendary channeler and author Lee Harris rejoins Regina Meredith to channel the Zs and offer their higher dimensional perspective on how humanity must release base emotions to transcend trials and tribulations. The Z’s share how there are no fixed species, only floating souls, and how our evolution fits into an interwoven cosmic tapestry of our Universe.

Explore the higher dimensional messages conveyed in Harris’ new book: “Conversations with The Z's: The Energetics of the New Human Soul - Part 1” – coauthored with Dianna Edwards.
teaser: What is required of humanity to move into our next steps of balanced evolution? Channeler and author Lee Harris channels the Zs to offer their higher dimensional perspective on how humanity must release base emotions to transcend trials and tribulations.

title: A Psychic Paramedic
body: Some souls may not immediately realize that they have passed away after a sudden or traumatic death. This is where author, medium, and former emergency paramedic Sarah Grace uses her extra-sensory perceptions and telepathic abilities to ease the transition. Through her personal journey out of an abusive childhood and self-destructive behaviors, she learned to harness her sensitivities and allow these innate abilities to heal and guide her life. In vivid detail, Grace describes many profound experiences as an emergency paramedic and how these life-or-death situations reignited her relationship with her subtle senses and with the angelic realms.
teaser: Some souls may not realize when they have passed away after a sudden or traumatic death. This is where author, medium, and former emergency paramedic Sarah Grace uses her extra-sensory perceptions and telepathic abilities to ease the transition.

body:
How can we learn to understand our challenges as gifts? Influencer and podcaster Blu joins Regina Meredith to dive deep into Gene Keys and how these genetic pathways of our DNA are interconnected with our energy fields and fate. Sharing details around adjusting to her loss of hearing in her 20s, Blu looks at her life path as a gift so she can educate, inspire, and connect through somatic healing.

Attune yourself to leave toxicity behind and enter new realms of awareness as Blu shares how we can change our lives by focusing and monitoring distractions to attain deeper listening and inner peace.
teaser: How can we learn to understand our challenges as gifts? Influencer and podcaster Blu joins Regina Meredith to dive deep into Gene Keys and how these genetic pathways of our DNA are interconnected with our energy fields and fate.

body: Is our fate predetermined or can we define our own destiny through our choices? Author Maren Muter discusses her incredible metaphysical gifts she discovered as a child, which allowed her to gain access to higher realms. Muter shares how these gifts helped her to see and understand reality in a way few others around her could, transforming her life forever. From theories of quantum mechanics, to the power of consciousness and the divine path of the human soul, Muter reminds us that we are all playing a creator role in the theater of our lives.
teaser: Is our fate predetermined or can we define our own destiny through our choices? Author Maren Muter shares from her own experiences accessing higher realms and reminds us that we are all playing a creator role in the theater of our lives.

body: How can the forces of the universe be understood through the Enneagram and the power of three, six, and nine? According to author and clinical psychologist Frank DeLuca, Ph.D., the Enneagram is a key that opens new ways of perceiving ourselves and others. Discover the profound truths of the nine energies illustrated throughout the Enneagram, learn how we are intricately connected with one another, and tap into your true nature.
teaser: How can the forces of the universe be understood through the Enneagram and the power of three, six, and nine? According to author and clinical psychologist Frank DeLuca, Ph.D., the Enneagram is a key that opens new ways of perceiving ourselves and others.
