body: How can humanity best interface with rapidly expanding artificial intelligence and could it unlock the secrets of the human mind? Celebrated engineer Sir Charles Shults III joins Regina Meredith to discuss AI in relation to human consciousness at the dawn of neurotechnologies. Diving into the ethical and philosophical quandaries of artificial intelligence and nano-neurons in particular, Shults offers his expertise and experience from the technical to the esoteric. Explore the implications of cutting-edge technologies as Shults poses the question of where we draw the line of what consciousness or humaneness even means.
teaser: How can humanity best interface with rapidly expanding artificial intelligence and could it unlock secrets of the human mind? Celebrated engineer Sir Charles Shults III discuss3w AI in relation to human consciousness at the dawn of neurotechnologies.

title: Overcoming Imposter Syndrome
body: How can we follow our gut instincts to move beyond imposter syndrome and replace self-doubt with self-worth? Author and master dowser Jean Slatter offers her expertise on how we can best heal ourselves on a soul level to realize the art of proclamation. Learn how to soothe your own energy field to help your soul heal so you can find innate self-worth and authentic fulfillment.
teaser: How can we follow our gut instincts to move beyond imposter syndrome and replace self-doubt with self-worth? Author and master dowser Jean Slatter offers her expertise on how we can best heal ourselves on a soul level to realize the art of proclamation.

title: The Collective Dark Night of the Soul
body: What do we all need to learn from the dark night of the soul? Mystic and religious scholar Andrew Harvey shares the larger-than-life lessons we can all learn from painful and difficult times, both collectively and as individuals. Through his transformative work, Harvey teaches us how we can burn away illusions to connect with sublime divine intelligence, find out who we really are, and go forward in sacred compassionate action.
teaser: What do we all need to learn from the dark night of the soul? Mystic and religious scholar Andrew Harvey shares the larger-than-life lessons we can all learn from painful and difficult times, both collectively and as individuals.

title: The Neuroscience of Conscious Practices
body:
How can we rewire and optimize our brain potential through taking conscious action with our health? 

Learn how spiritual practices are being proven scientifically-effective as neuroscientist and MIT professor Tara Swart, Ph.D., shares her journey from medical science to neuroscience. Learn how mindfulness and simple practices such as exercise, oxygenation, and hydration can help us minimize stress and maximize productivity to allow us happier and healthier lives.
teaser: How can we rewire and optimize our brain potential through taking conscious action with our health? Learn how spiritual practices are being proven scientifically-effective with neuroscientist and MIT professor Tara Swart, Ph.D.

title: Parallel Realities of Potential
body: How can the power of visualization reshape our physical reality? Author and speaker Jon Gabriel shares his journey of incredible weight loss and the creation of his signature Gabriel Method. Formerly a stock-broker who was over-stressed and over 400 pounds, Gabriel shed the weight by shifting his entire potential to a parallel existence. Gabriel explains there are thousands of parallel realities for every problem we face and how we can manifest our ideal path. Discover the transformative power of rewiring your mind and creating a harmonious heart-mind-body connection through visualization to unlock optimal wellbeing and reclaim control over your body and life.
teaser: How can the power of visualization reshape our physical reality? Author Jon Gabriel shares his journey of weight loss and transformation. Formerly a stock-broker who was over 400 pounds, Gabriel shifted his entire potential to a parallel existence.

title: Spirit Speaker
body: Renowned medium and author Salicrow rejoins Regina Meredith to delve into the realm of spirit communication in her latest book, Spirit Speaker: A Medium's Guide to Death and Dying. Shedding light on the distinctions between psychics and mediums, Salicrow offers unique perspectives on bridging the gap between life and death. Expand your understanding of existence on both sides of the veil and explore the profound transitions of life's ultimate journey.
teaser: Renowned medium and author Salicrow rejoins Regina Meredith to delve into the realm of spirit communication in her latest book, Spirit Speaker: A Medium's Guide to Death and Dying.

title: Pink & Gray Ascension Paths
body:
What is the difference between pink and gray ascension? Exploring gnostic perspectives on organic evolution versus artificial intelligence and technological hybridizations, author and investigative mythologist William Henry rejoins Regina Meredith to discuss the future of humanity and the different potential paths ahead of us. Learn different perspectives on “perfected humans” from divine Angelic hybrids to how our rapidly unfolding advancements in technology are changing our reality.

Discover how we can transcend existential threats to humanity and achieve organic evolution despite living through what feels like science fiction and what was prophesied in the Book of Revelations.
teaser: What is the difference between pink and gray ascension? Exploring gnostic perspectives on organic evolution versus artificial intelligence and technological hybridizations, author William Henry rejoins Regina Meredith to discuss the future of humanity.

title: Gene Keys & Human Design
body:
What are the greatest challenges keeping you from discovering your own genius? Richard Rudd delves into the origin of the 64 Gene Keys system as a language that expands upon Human Design. These tools can better help you understand who you are and why you are here. Discover how you can unlock the secrets of your shadows, your talents, and your divine gifts.


A teacher, mystic and award-winning poet, and author of the Gene Keys. In his twenties, he experienced a life changing state of spiritual illumination over 3 days and nights. Today he continues to expand the wisdom that he was gifted while teaching all around the world.
teaser: Richard Rudd delves into the origin of the 64 Gene Keys system as a language that expands upon Human Design. These tools help you understand who you are and why you are here. Discover how to unlock the secrets of your shadows, talents, and divine gifts.

title: Channeling Theo: Waves of Rapid Change
body:
Acclaimed medium Sheila Gillette returns to Open Minds to channel the angelic collective known as THEO, shedding light on the profound shifts unfolding in our global landscape. 

Amidst the challenges of rapid metamorphosis, THEO's messages resonate with hope and empowerment. Emphasizing that these changes are ultimately destined for the betterment of humanity, the dialogue navigates through the uncertainties and growing pains that accompany such monumental shifts. Gillette, acting as a vessel for THEO's wisdom, imparts profound insights on embracing evolution and overcoming the fear of change that often holds us back.

THEO's celestial guidance offers a profound perspective on how we can align ourselves with this grand cosmic dance. Discover how to embrace and thrive amidst these transformative times, ushering in a brighter future for ourselves and our planet.
teaser: Acclaimed medium Sheila Gillette returns to channel the angelic collective known as THEO, shedding light on the profound shifts unfolding on our planet. Amidst the challenges of rapid metamorphosis, THEO's messages resonate with hope and empowerment.

title: Karmic Recovery
body:
How can we release karmic debt? 

Robert Bannan joins Regina Meredith to discuss how homeopathy can heal us physically as well as relieving us of painful karmic cycles and debt. With over three decades of experience across five diverse countries, Bannan delves into the intricate connection between our external experiences, internal energies, and what our organs are trying to tell us. 

Discover how practical practices and remedies, rooted in quantum information, hold the keys to unlocking our innate ability to heal ourselves on all levels.
teaser: How can we release karmic debt? Robert Bannan shares how homeopathy can heal us physically as well as relieving us of painful karmic cycles and debt.

title: Ancient Secrets for Modern Manifestation
body:
How can a 300-year-old book help you manifest in the modern world? 

Healer and mystic Steven Ross returns to Open Minds to share excerpts from his personal library passed down to him from Manly P. Hall, and he delves into how these ancient alchemical secrets can guide us into greater contact with our higher selves and miraculous healing abilities. Witness evidence of a life-changing, before-and-after miracle as Ross illustrates how the power of belief can help us manifest healing and true transformation.

Steven A. Ross, PhD is co-founder and CEO of the World Research Foundation. For nearly 40 years he has researched and lectured around the world. He has delivered over 200 lectures making presentations to various worldwide government agencies, hospital networks, and has been interviewed on more than 150 radio programs and 15 regional and national television programs. He has been an expert witness for the City of Los Angeles and consulted for the insurance industry.
teaser: Healer and mystic Steven Ross returns to Open Minds to share excerpts from his personal library and delves into how these ancient alchemical secrets can guide us into greater contact with our higher selves and miraculous healing abilities.

title: Love & Destiny Cards in a Common Deck
body:
What if a common fifty-two card deck holds the clues to a soul’s destiny and love in this lifetime? 

Author Robert Lee Camp reintroduces an original divination tool found in Diamonds, Spades, Hearts, and Clubs based on quadratic spreads of Atlantean origin.

Robert Lee Camp gives simple guidelines for anyone to access an ancient, accurate divination system using a common deck of fifty-two cards. He shares tips from his book, The Cards of Your Destiny, to unlock connections to astrology and numerology.

Episode includes the history of playing cards as a cloaked, underground system of divination with roots pre-dating Chinese and Indian claims of invention. Detailed breakdown of card meaning and corresponding to the Gregorian calendar, as well as astrological and numerological correlations.
teaser: What if a common card deck holds the clues to a soul’s destiny and love in this lifetime? Author Robert Lee Camp reintroduces an original divination tool found in Diamonds, Spades, Hearts, and Clubs based on quadratic spreads of Atlantean origin.

title: The Astral Method & Intuitive Astrology
body:
If we deepen our understanding of horoscopes, can we work with astrological influences to shape outcomes? 

Mercedes Arnus Arraut, an intuitive astrologer born to read the stars, says yes – it is possible to harness the power of the zodiac. In her interview with Regina Meredith, they explore how astrological signs and houses interact with planetary bodies to reveal individual soul codes and break down collective generational patterns according to Pluto transits across Boomers, Xers, Millennials, and Z. Arraut’s approach, The Astral Method, proposes that astrology is “five percent knowledge and ninety-five percent intuition.” She reads her client’s charts from a heart-based perspective, believing we each choose the biggest and brightest path for our soul’s journey. Arraut proposes the Age of Aquarius could engage the power of the mind to create our experience and propel humanity to unimaginable heights.
teaser: If we deepen our understanding of horoscopes, can we work with astrological influences to shape outcomes? Mercedes Arnus Arraut, an intuitive astrologer born to read the stars, says yes – it is possible to harness the power of the zodiac.

title: Dream State & Rescripting Reality
body:
What if our dreams are expressions of future memory?

Déjà rêvé, translated from French, means already dreamed. According to Theresa Cheung, an expert decoder of dreams, when we feel like we’ve done something before that’s because we have — in our dreams.

“Your dream journal is the most sensational book you’ll ever read,” says Cheung. She discusses with Regina Meredith how writing down our dreams unlocks access to non-linear space and time. Drawing on an unprecedented volume of research on the dream state during lockdown, Cheung cites evidence of collective precognition and retrocausality. She shares that dreams are a neglected manifestation tool treasured for millennia by royalty and military leaders. Cheung describes how our dream state offers a safe way to shape our unconscious by rescripting nightmares and rehearsing threats as part of shadow work.
teaser: What if our dreams are expressions of future memory? According to Theresa Cheung, an expert decoder of dreams, when we feel like we’ve done something before that’s because we have — in our dreams.

title: Hypnotherapy & Entity Attachment
body:
How can we use hypnotherapy as a tool to heal unexplained trauma? 

Hypnotherapist Laurie McDonald discusses misdiagnosed entity attachment, weaponized telepathy, and the increase in reports by humans who feel non-humans around us. She believes hypnotherapy helps us dive into our own personalities, without shame, to find a place of neutrality… and let go of trauma. She explains why “we cannot change what we cannot accept.” 

We may notice our bodies and emotions expressing ingrained programs masked by our mind. Our physical senses are always listening and adjusting to our environment, so our bodies become a profound tuning fork for altering mental programs. In addition, the words we use hold a powerful vibration to free us according to universal law.
teaser: How can we use hypnotherapy as a tool to heal unexplained trauma? Hypnotherapist Laurie McDonald discusses misdiagnosed entity attachment, weaponized telepathy, and the increase in reports by humans who feel non-humans around us.

title: Hacking Human Biology
body:
Gaia's new original series, 'Biohacking' with Dave Asprey, will release on October 16th.

What if plant-based diets, chronic cardio workouts, and relentless routines at home and work are the cause of fatigue, burnout, and dysregulation… instead of the cure?

Dave Asprey, bestselling author and host of the new Gaia series “Biohacking,” has dedicated his adult life to deep research and testing of humanity’s natural efficiencies. When we change the quality of our biology to match animal instincts, Asprey believes it’s possible to save our energy and spend it more efficiently.

Discover Asprey’s reasoning behind “hard work is a toxic belief,” and dive into his accessible technologies like reduced exertion training. Hear how he hacks sleep, offers new nutritional guidance, balances hormones, and manages histamine response.
teaser: What if plant-based diets, chronic cardio workouts, and relentless routines at home and work are the cause of fatigue, burnout, and dysregulation… instead of the cure?

title: Hopi Prophecy & Transhumanism
body:
An indigenous hieroglyph on a stone in Arizona shows two paths representing humanity’s choicepoint… between revhumanism and transhumanism. 

Mystic Cynthia Sue Larson returns to Open Minds and continues a conversation with Regina Meredith about quantum possibilities represented in Hopi Prophecy. If transhumanism is a vanishing timeline, Larson proposes we tune into conscious agency and unify our will, which she defines as revhumanism.

“How good can today get?” This question frames our focus and allows us to apply intention, explains Larson. She follows-up on past interviews with Meredith, expanding on new academic inquiry into The Mandela Effect.
teaser: An indigenous hieroglyph on a stone in Arizona shows two paths... revhumanism and transhumanism.

title: How to Navigate Being an Empath
body:
Anita Moorjani recounts a near-death experience that spontaneously healed her terminal lymphatic cancer. Moorjani recalls reaching an ecstatic state of pure bliss during a 36-hour coma which enlightened her to the power of living fearlessly. 

The bestselling author of “Sensitive is the New Strong” advises that empaths with healthy egos are necessary to share their gifts with the world. “What if instead of seeing empathy and sensitivity as a weakness, we decided it was a strength?”
teaser: Anita Moorjani recalls reaching an ecstatic state of pure bliss during a 36-hour coma which enlightened her to the power of living fearlessly.

title: King Tut, DNA Codes & Prophecies
body:
Can past-life regression tell us when a new human species will arrive to herald the coming Golden Age?

Master Hypnotist Sarah Breskman Cosme returns to Open Minds to discuss ancient history, extraterrestrial contact, and DNA activation. A protege of Dolores Cannon, Breskman-Cosme carries the message from her clients telling a different story of the life of Tutankhamen after the fall of Atlantis. She also explores the Druids, their role in preserving knowledge during the fall of Atlantis, and their connection to Avalon. Is it true that our DNA is being reactivated by codes held by places and artifacts?
teaser: Is it true that our DNA is being reactivated by codes held by places and artifacts?

title: A Queen’s Secret Son
body:
Was the dark secret of the Virgin Queen’s heir an illicit page of Shakespearean drama?

Alan W. Green, host of Gaia’s “Shakespeare Decoded,” joins Regina Meredith to expand on the mysterious, royal lineage of the Bard. Green draws upon evidence from anagrams and cryptography to speculate that the 17th Earl of Oxford was the son and lover of England’s Elizabeth I.

Hear Green’s theory that Shakespeare’s works were scripture written by an enlightened being — who may have fathered an heir to the throne with his own mother. Was the 17th Earl of Oxford a collaborator of Francis Bacon? What can Green’s life mission reveal about the Bard’s true identity?
teaser: Was the 17th Earl of Oxford a collaborator of Francis Bacon?

title: Communicating with Water
body:
Does human saliva hold an imprint of the frequency of the words we use?

Veda Austin, researcher, shares crystallographic images to demonstrate how frozen water from a variety of sources - including the human body - communicates with us. From verbal intentions to memories and feelings, Austin captures water’s consciousness through frozen responses to words, thoughts, and intentions using a glass petri dish. 

Her studies explore ancestral information held by amniotic fluid, as well as the impact of 5G technological interference on water’s resilience and coherence. Austin also shares her findings on water’s ability to heal by proximity, as well as the unique properties found in the primary water held by Earth’s mantle. What secrets does “the rebel element” hold about DNA teleportation and extraterrestrial life.
teaser: Does human saliva hold an imprint of the frequency of the words we use?

title: Questioning Biblical Authority
body:
How has Biblical interpretation led to manipulation or empowerment of our collective consciousness?

Paul Wallis, Anglican pastor and author, and Regina Meredith discuss analytical tools known as Hermeneutics to extract intention and meaning from Biblical texts. Wallis discusses the importance of transcending fear and the invitation to explore the powers and principles of the cosmos within oneself. Challenging traditional religious interpretations can prevent low self-esteem and test our unquestioning attitude towards authority. 

Are Biblical scholars reshaping what many Christians learned in Sunday school?
teaser: How has Biblical interpretation manipulated or empowered our consciousness?

title: Pleiadians, Frequency Wars & Earth Ascension
body:
Does humanity’s unique access to compassion have a healing ripple effect in response to the frequency wars?

Regina Meredith welcomes a new channeler to Gaia, Wendy Kennedy, who answers this and other illuminating questions on behalf of the Pleiadian collective.

Kennedy provides a detailed history of Pleiadian light beings on Earth, as well as insight into Pleiadian souls currently incarnated. As she channels “the P’s”, they explain key elements of Earth’s ascension, including information on the frequency wars underway and the significance of the year 2026 on our collective consciousness. Hear Kennedy’s Language of Light embedded with a message of peace.

Discover the simple, small adjustments that could help us release judgment and pulse from our heart’s operating system.
teaser: Does humanity’s unique access to compassion have a healing ripple effect?

title: Harmonizing Lower Frequencies
body:
If we stop demonizing lower frequencies, will we harmonize our full energetic spectrum?

Eileen McKusick is a healer and practitioner of biofield tuning, a method to identify and release blockages which are root causes of disease. This subtle work helps individuals become more regulated, coherent, and resilient by clearing trauma held by the subconscious so we become less reactive when faced with perceived difficulties. 

McKusick explains raising our vibration does not necessarily reduce noise in the energy field. Instead, harmonizing lower frequencies can increase the electrical current in the body to balance our energy. McKusick believes the power of voice and use of specific words can heal our “sonic anatomy” and offer protection from illness.
teaser: If we stop demonizing lower frequencies, will we harmonize our energetic spectrum?

title: Human Design: A Framework for Alignment
body:
Can working with the personality types within the Human Design System help create a profound acceptance of self and harmonious tolerance of others?

Emma Dunwoody, a behavioral coach and expert in Human Design, joins Regina Meredith to explore a functional framework for living in alignment with our true blueprint for individual purpose. Dunwoody believes that when we “make the unconscious conscious,” resistance falls away and we find transformative flow. She outlines how a channeled guide known as “the black book” provides specifics to honor our unique template. Dunwoody invites us to live in the experiment of our design type as a manifester, generator, projector, manifesting generator, or reflector, so we can let go of society’s rules, break habits, and expand into sovereignty.
teaser: Can working within personality types of Human Design create profound self-acceptance?

title: Reclaiming Sophia: Quantum Creation
body:
Are humans the descendants of Sophia, intended to relay energy within the quantum field as a bridge between Matter and Spirit?

Merging quantum science with ancient spiritual traditions, author Peter Canova and host Regina Meredith trace the Gnostic origins of the Judeo-Christian story of Eve’s fall. Drawing upon the “ivy league” of mystery schools, from India to the British Isles, Canova explains how thought forms linked to eternal attributes are the same God particle validated by physicists. What aspects of Sophia, or Wisdom, and her male counterpart known as Will, can help humanity reclaim light and reckon with shadow?
teaser: Are we descendants of Sophia, intended to relay energy within the quantum field?

title: Afterlife & the Cult of Skepticism
body:
What if an ordinary household voicemail recording actually revealed a hidden message sent from a long-deceased loved one reaching out from the afterlife?

Daniel Drasin joins Regina Meredith to share footage of instrumental transcommunication and Electronic Voice Phenomenon as material proof of direct contact with the dead. See photos of physical beings from lower densities discovered by Drasin on an undeveloped roll of film. 

From his early life exploring precognition to his career as a filmmaker documenting ufology — and most recently, his book publication — Drasin has always believed in the open inquiry of our physical senses and our greater reality. Drasin speculates: what if the established “cult of skepticism” no longer precluded us from embracing afterlife transition? 

Daniel Drasin is a filmmaker and author of A New Science of the Afterlife.
teaser: What if a voicemail recording revealed a hidden message sent from the afterlife?

title: EMF Pollution of Our Immune System
body:
If frontier science finds a direct link between increased autoimmune illness and exposure to electro-magnetic frequencies, can the corporate will to maintain a wired world be curbed?

Regina Meredith welcomes Nicolas Pineault, The EMF Guy, to unpack a critical examination of the roll-out of 5G technology during the recent pandemic. Pineault cites international investigation and legislation of telecommunications devices as a possible path for US citizens to defend against potential heart and DNA damage caused by frequency bombardment. What shielding tools and proximity strategies can be used right now to reduce harm and protect us?
teaser: Can the corporate will to maintain a wired world be curbed to defend against EMFs?

title: Psychedelic Journeys Into Galactic Creation
body:
Is there a diamond light of consciousness and a singularity of galactic creation, which can be intentionally explored using psychedelic protocols?

Host Regina Meredith dives deep into the therapeutic, intellectual, and spiritual findings of Chris Bache, an author and theologian, who dared to embark on a psychedelic quest lasting two decades. Bache shares his excruciating LSD session methods inspired by Stanislav Grof and cautions against casual attempts by viewers at home. From meeting “The Great Mother” and witnessing an ocean of suffering to encountering principal beings responsible for creating the singular universe, Bache recounts his transformative journeys beyond egoic identity. 

What if it’s possible to unravel the incarnations of a soul, from individual karma and collective trauma, to reach an energetic frequency stronger than the sun?
teaser: Is it possible to unravel soul incarnations & reach a frequency stronger than the sun?

title: Venusians, Oppenheimer & Einstein
body:
Did Albert Einstein and Robert Oppenheimer write a letter to President Truman about ETs? What exactly did these two wunderkind scientists envision for our encounters with “celestial beings?”

Paola Harris, author and boots-on-the-ground ufologist, returns to Gaia and takes Oppenheimer’s blockbuster notoriety beyond the Hollywood big screen. Regina Meredith and Harris connect the dots between: the first Trinity experiment and Roswell, atom bombs dropped in WWII and mysteriously thwarted cold war games, and contactee warnings and presidential peace proclamations. Is it possible Venutian influences are preventing a nuclear meltdown to protect against a multidimensional impact?
teaser: Did Albert Einstein and Robert Oppenheimer write a letter to Truman about ETs?
